courses.title: De-escalation for Workplace Violence
courses.bio: How to Calm Anyone Down Before Violence Occurs
objectives: Understand the importance of de-escalation and the role it can play to deflect potential instances of workplace violence
Learn the technique of deflecting the energy of confrontation rather than directly countering it
Learn why it's important to seek the "win win" solution in any confrontation
Learn to read the behavioral signs of potential escalation so you can head it off before it occurs
Understand the power of empathy to calm upset individuals
Learn how to use questions and paraphrasing to lead a confrontation to a calm resolution
Understand the importance of posture and presence and to use them to your advantage in a confrontation
Learn techniques for assuring your own personal safety and to increase your situational awareness
Learn the three types of people you are likely to encounter in a confrontation
requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome
courses.description:
Welcome to our online course, "De-escalation for Workplace Violence." We are a successful risk management, security, and safety firm with decades of experience in dealing with workplace violence incidents.
In today's dynamic work environments, effectively managing and de-escalating confrontational situations is essential for maintaining a safe and productive workplace. This course is designed to equip you with the communication tools and strategies necessary to defuse tense situations and prevent potential acts of violence.
Throughout this course, we will explore various key concepts and techniques to promote peaceful resolutions and ensure the safety of all parties involved.
We emphasize the importance of seeking a "win-win" solution that addresses the concerns of both your agency and the confrontational individual.
We cover the "verbal judo" concept, which involves using strategic communication techniques to redirect and diffuse hostile energy toward more constructive outcomes. You will learn how to recognize and respond to behavioral and verbal cues that may indicate escalating aggression, allowing you to intervene early and prevent violence.
Empathy will be a central theme throughout the course as we explore the power of understanding and acknowledging the emotions of the confrontational individual. You can build rapport and create a foundation for peaceful dialogue by expressing empathy and actively listening to their concerns.
Effective communication strategies, such as asking questions and seeking to understand the underlying issues, will be emphasized as essential tools for resolving conflicts and finding workable solutions.
Students taking this course will learn the importance of controlling their own emotions and avoiding confrontational language or behavior that could exacerbate the situation.
By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge and skills to effectively de-escalate confrontational situations and promote a workplace culture of respect and safety. Our course curriculum has been designed by our in-house subject matter experts based on their own experiences in the field and with standard de-escalation methodology.
Let's work together to create a safer and more harmonious work environment for everyone.
target_audience: Security personnel
Anyone who serves as a gatekeeper or who works directly with clients and customers
Supervisors, managers, or authority figures
All employees, as these skills would be useful for anyone who must potentially interact with upset individuals in the workplace

courses.title: Mastering AED: A Life-Saving Essential
courses.bio: Learn AED! Created by board-certified physicians and adheres to the latest ILCOR Standards and Guidelines

Save a Life by NHCPS & Disque Foundation: Introducing Save A Life by NHCPS & the Disque Foundation
Introduction to AEDs: Importance of AEDs in Cardiac Arrest
AED Components and Safety: Safety Precautions when Using an AED
Legal Considerations and Good Samaritan Laws
Knowledge Assessment: AED Components and Safety
Performing CPR and Using an AED for Adul: Knowledge Assessment: Performing CPR and Using an AED for Adult
Performing CPR and Using an AED for Chil: Knowledge Assessment: Performing CPR and Using an AED for Children
How to Save a Life in 5 minutes: How to Save a Life in 5 minutes
How to Get CPR, AED, and First Aid Train: How to Get CPR, AED, and First Aid Training Online

requirements: No previous training or special materials are required
courses.description:
AED stands for "Automated External Defibrillator." It is a portable medical device that treats sudden cardiac arrest (SCA) by delivering an electric shock to the heart to restore its normal rhythm. Sudden cardiac arrest occurs when the heart's electrical system malfunctions, causing it to beat irregularly or stop altogether. This can be a life-threatening condition.
AEDs are designed for easy to use by individuals with minimal medical training. They typically come with visual and audio instructions to guide the user through the process. When someone experiences sudden cardiac arrest, bystanders or trained individuals can use an AED to assess the person's heart rhythm and, if necessary, deliver a controlled electric shock to the heart. This shock, known as defibrillation, can help restore the heart's normal rhythm and increase the chances of survival.
AEDs are commonly found in public places such as airports, schools, sports facilities, and other areas where people gather. Their widespread availability has contributed to improved outcomes for individuals experiencing cardiac arrest, as prompt defibrillation can be crucial in saving lives.
The course package includes:
An AED and additional learning about CPR and choking presentation.
CPR, AED, & First Aid Provider Handbook
Note: This course is for training in AED.

Disaster and Protection Awareness Seminar aims to provide participants with comprehensive information about natural disasters, which frequently occur both in our country and globally, and the precautions to be taken against them. Turkey is a country exposed to the risk of various natural disasters, such as earthquakes, floods, forest fires, and mass movements. Therefore, being prepared for such disasters is vital for both individual and societal safety.


This training covers in detail the safe behaviors that should be implemented before, during, and after disasters. Understanding the nature, effects, and risks of disasters will instill in participants the awareness of how to minimize loss of life and property by taking proactive measures. Furthermore, making accurate and swift decisions during a disaster significantly increases the chance of survival.


During the training, participants will acquire both theoretical knowledge and practical knowledge supported by real-life examples. This will equip them with the ability to act calmly and effectively in the event of a potential disaster. This training will not only raise individual awareness among participants but also strengthen social solidarity.

This course is interactive, with questions for the instructor, simple and effective quizzes, and complete with actual job site inspections.
This course is designed with the busy, hardworking, family-provider in mind in that it is formatted to be taken anywhere. Take it with you on your phone, tablet, or computer.
Once enrolled this course is yours to keep and use and you see fit. Use it to impress supervisors and colleagues by conducting your own safety trainings and workshops. Print up the slides for field trainings, enroll in the course and play it for groups, or enroll employees and colleagues into it, this course is yours.

courses.title: Workplace Violence Prevention Plan Training for 2024
courses.bio: Understanding The Basics of Workplace Violence
objectives: Learn how the standard governing workplace violence prevention has changed with the implementation of SB553.
Learn how workplace violence can impact the environment of the workplace and employee health and well-being
Learn to identify what behaviors qualify as workplace violence under the standard
Learn to identify who can perpetrate workplace violence
Learn to combat workplace violence with training, planning, and policy
Understand the importance of reporting workplace violence, how to report incidents, and who to report them to
Learn what the Violent Incident Log is, what the new recordkeeping requirements are under SB553, and how to obtain copies of pertinent records and logs
requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
In our comprehensive online course, "Workplace Violence Prevention Plan Training for 2024," we guide you through the intricacies of California's latest workplace safety law. As of July 1, 2024, employers and employees are mandated to undergo annual training in accordance with SB553, a stricter workplace violence prevention law recently implemented by the State of California.
This course isn't just about meeting legal requirements; it's about ensuring a safe and harmonious work environment. Taught by seasoned experts with two decades of real-world experience in risk management and loss control for public agencies, our training goes beyond the basics.
Key Course Highlights:
Understanding SB553: Delve into the details of the law, from definitions and related terminology to identifying behaviors that qualify as workplace violence.
Identifying Aggressors and Victims: Learn to spot potential aggressors and victims, gaining insights into the impact of workplace violence on the job.
Reporting Incidents: Explore the process of reporting workplace violence incidents, including the necessary details and the appropriate authorities to contact.
Violent Incident Log: Understand the importance of the Violent Incident Log, how to obtain it, and other crucial documents to ensure compliance.
OSHA Compliance: Our course not only fulfills SB553 requirements but also provides safety and health training in compliance with Federal OSHA and State OSHA standards. Ask our experienced instructors any questions, and receive prompt responses as outlined by OSHA standards.
Trusted Instructors: Developed by our in-house trainers with a proven track record, trusted by public agencies throughout California.
No prerequisites are required. Whether you're an employer or an employee, this course is designed to guide you through every step, ensuring your success in meeting or exceeding the minimum required training. Invest in the safety and well-being of your workplace – enroll today!
target_audience: Anyone working with others, and of particular use for supervisors, safety managers, security personnel, and HR professionals
All employees working in California

courses.description:
LATEST: Course Updated Again for April 1st, 2023

Your Family Isn't Ready For A Terrorist Attack, Hurricane, Flood, or Tornado! Will They Survive ? If The Government Collapsed Tomorrow Can You Feed & Protect Them?
Will They Die Because You Have Idea how to Survive?
Disaster preparedness and survival skills are enjoying a resurgence in popularity, not only because of popular movies and television shows, but simply because the world as we know it is becoming more and more chaotic and more and more unstable.
There have been an increasing number of natural disasters, from tropical storms to earthquakes and wildfires, hurricanes and tornadoes and everything in between and people are becoming more cognizant of these facts, each and every day and have a desire to learn the skills necessary to survive disasters, whether they are natural or man-made, such as a riot stock market collapse or electrical grid collapse. 30 Day 100% Risk Free Offer!
Think about these things for a minute ...
What would you do if there was a terrorist attack that caused mass chaos and panic, and all the stores and places of food were closed? Do you want to be the one that is begging your neighbors, friends, or family for help? Do you want to be shipped off to a FEMA “camp?"
Could you provide for your family if severe weather like hurricanes, snowstorms or a flood caused your area to go into a panic -- buying up everything off of stores and creating shortages? What if the stores were empty for weeks… or months?
Could you protect your family if there were massive power outages or rolling blackouts or brownouts -- disrupting electricity and making it nearly impossible to get food from stores or provide heat or energy in your home?
What would happen if the road system was destroyed by floods or other natural disasters in your area? Could you survive without food or other essentials for weeks?
Could you protect and provide for your family if an earthquake hit and the area was devastated?
Many people mistakenly believe that the  government or emergency services will provide all the help they need.  When the time comes, however, it could take emergency service response  teams hours days, weeks and even months to respond effectively to the  disaster.
So in the meantime, you and your loved ones will have to fend  for yourselves but, if you don't know how to survive in an urban  environment, this is going to be rather difficult.
Give yourself a fresh start by enrolling in this life-changing course now. Every moment you delay, you lose out. Simple as that.
“WARNING: Your Survival Could Depend On Your Next Choice"
The  Basic survivalist and disaster  preparedness course will teach you everything that you need to know  about surviving a man-made or natural disaster in urban settings.  Everything from medicine to food supplies, shelter building and other  primitive construction, basically everything you need to know to be a  21st-century urban Daniel Boone or Davy Crockett and not only will you  learn to survive in an urban disaster setting but you will learn to  thrive.
Here's Exactly What YOU Get Inside The Newbies Basic Survival Skills Course:
How to properly store and can food supplies

How to navigate using a magnetic compass and topography (landmarks and the environment)
How to set up and sustain a small urban farm consisting of fruits and vegetables chickens and/or fish

How to make alternative fuel sources such as bio diesel to power your home and increase your travel radius
How to fortify your home and protect yourself and your family from looters, or worse using dogs battery-operated cameras and floodlights and close quarters combat techniques such as firearms and martial arts
Even how to keep up morale when you are at your mental breaking point and your spirits are low.
Click the "Take This Course" button, on the top right because every hour you delay is jeopardizing not only your Safety but the Safety of Those You love!!!...Scroll up and Enroll Now!
It has been said that a person can only survive in any given  situation or environment for 90 days, because after this period of time,  you are no longer surviving in a given environment but living in it.  And in the urban Ranger course will teach you exactly that, how to live  in your new urban environment.
P.S. We're living in some of the craziest times in history and many experts agree that it's not a matter of “if" but “when" you will face an emergency that is beyond what you and your family have prepared for. There's a famous truism among instructors getting soldiers ready for war.“When the bullets start flying, you WON'T rise to the occasion. You will perform half as well as you did during your best training."

courses.title: First Aid at Work - Level 3
courses.bio: Your Path to Workplace Safety Starts Here

Learn the noble responsibility of a first aider.
Capability to administer first aid for suspected bone and muscle.
Ability to face real-life medical emergencies.

requirements: There are no formal prerequisites to take this course.
courses.description:
Become a Lifesaver at workplace


Hazards can occur in any work environment. It is crucial to know what to do in an emergency situation. Your knowledge of First Aid may save many lives one day. This course will enhance your knowledge to become a noble lifesaver in your workplace.


First Aid at Work - Level 3 benefits any first aider at the workplace. Also, this course is ideal for organisations who are looking for emergency first aid training for their employees.
You will get to know about the responsibilities of a first aider and how to be calm in an emergency time.


You will receive unlimited access to course materials. You can progress through the course at your own pace. Additionally, you will have a 30-day money-back guarantee.


The course curriculum covers below topics;
- What is First Aid?
- First Aid in the Workplace
- Responsibilities of the First Aider
- Action in an Emergency
- Disorders of The Circulation
- Bones, Joints and Muscle Injuries


Engage through a series of theory videos, one for each unit of the course. These videos provide insights into First Aid Practices. Benefit from in-depth content within the theory videos to reinforce your knowledge in First Aid. Assess your knowledge with a 40-question mock exam.


Join us for a demo course and elevate your journey to becoming a noble lifesaver. We’ll take you step-by-step through engaging and informative theory videos and comprehensive course materials to help you step into a role as a proficient First Aider.


This demo course is inspired by the First Aid Level 3 Course awarded by CPD. In this demo course, you will cover 5 out of 17 modules discussed in the main course. You can enrol in the full course to gain a broader knowledge of First Aid


Now, you can enrol in the Level 3 First Aid full course through the trusted course provider, Global Edulink.

courses.title: أساسيات السلامة والصحة المهنية Occupational Health & Safety
courses.bio: دليلك إلى بيئة عمل آمنة | Your Guide to Occupational Health & Safety
objectives: Understand the basic concepts of health, safety, and environmental awareness in the workplace.
Identify workplace hazards and learn how to apply simple control measures to reduce risk.
Demonstrate the correct use of personal protective equipment and its role in incident prevention.
Recognize emergency situations and apply the correct procedures for reporting and response.

التعريفات الاساسية: ما الفرق بين الحادث والحادث الوشيك؟
المفاهيم الأساسية في الصحة والسلامة المهنية
الاسباب الاخلاقية: أي من التالي يُعتبر من المبادئ الأخلاقية الأساسية في الصحة والسلامة المهنية؟
الاسباب القانونية: أي من التالي يُعد خرقًا قانونيًا وفق أنظمة الصحة والسلامة المهنية؟
الاسباب المالية: ما السبب الرئيسي الذي يجعل الاستثمار في أنظمة الصحة والسلامة قرارًا ماليًا ذكيًا
المسئؤليات: أهمية تحديد الأدوار والمسؤوليات في السلامة والصحة المهنية
من هو المسؤول الأساسي عن توفير بيئة عمل آمنة داخل المنشأة؟
الاختبار: اختبار تدريبي – دورة الوعي بأهمية السلامة والصحة المهنية

requirements: No prior HSE knowledge or experience is required – this course is suitable for complete beginners.
A willingness to learn and improve personal and team safety behavior.
Access to a computer or mobile device with internet connection to watch course materials.
Basic understanding of workplace operations is helpful but not mandatory.
courses.description:
تم تصميم هذه الدورة لتوعية المتدربين بأساسيات مبادئ إدارة الصحة والسلامة والبيئة (HSE) في مكان العمل. وهي مثالية للمبتدئين، والموظفين الجدد، والمقاولين، وأي شخص يرغب في بناء أساس قوي للسلامة المهنية والبيئية.
خلال هذه الدورة، ستتعرف على أهمية حماية الأرواح والممتلكات من خلال الوقاية من الحوادث والحد من المخاطر في بيئة العمل. ستتعلم كيفية التعرف على المخاطر الشائعة مثل: الانزلاقات والسقوط، والمخاطر الكهربائية، والمخاطر الكيميائية، والضوضاء، والمخاطر البيئية، وكيفية تقييمها وتطبيق تدابير السيطرة والتحكم المناسبة باستخدام التسلسل الهرمي للضوابط (Hierarchy of Controls).
تغطي الدورة أيضًا:
الاستخدام الصحيح لمعدات الحماية الشخصية (PPE): كيف تختارها، متى تستخدمها، وكيف تتأكد من فعاليتها.
السلوك الآمن والتصرفات الإيجابية داخل بيئة العمل.
كيفية الإبلاغ عن الحوادث والحالات الخطرة والإصابات الوشيكة Near Misses.
الاستجابة الفعالة للطوارئ مثل الحرائق، وتسرب المواد الكيميائية، وانفجارات الغاز، والإخلاء الآمن.
كما تعزز هذه الدورة ثقافة السلامة الإيجابية في المؤسسة، وتساعدك على إدراك دورك ومسؤوليتك في دعم نظام إدارة السلامة والبيئة، والتفاعل الإيجابي مع تعليمات وإرشادات السلامة.
تم تضمين مفاهيم رئيسية مستمدة من المعايير الدولية مثل:
ISO 45001:2018 لإدارة الصحة والسلامة المهنية.
ISO 14001:2015 لنظام الإدارة البيئية.
ستتمكن في نهاية الدورة من:
تمييز وتقييم المخاطر في بيئة العمل.
اتخاذ قرارات فورية للحد من المخاطر.
المشاركة بفعالية في برامج السلامة المؤسسية.
التحلي بالمسؤولية والالتزام بالإجراءات الوقائية.
لا تتطلب الدورة أي خبرة سابقة — فقط الرغبة في التعلم والمشاركة. وهي مناسبة للعاملين في مختلف القطاعات مثل الإنشاءات، والصناعة، والنفط والغاز، والخدمات اللوجستية، والتعليم، والرعاية الصحية.
ابدأ رحلتك الآن نحو بيئة عمل آمنة ومستدامة — لنحمي الأرواح، ونحافظ على البيئة، ونبني ثقافة وقائية قوية.
target_audience: This course is designed for workers, supervisors, and students in high-risk sectors such as construction, oil & gas, manufacturing, and logistics.
It's ideal for new employees, interns, and contractors who need to meet safety induction or onboarding requirements.
Also suitable for office staff or support teams who want to raise their safety awareness and contribute to a safe work culture.
Anyone interested in understanding basic HSE principles to improve workplace health, prevent accidents, and promote environmental responsibility.

courses.bio: تعرف على المعايير الاوروبية والعالمية للسلامة والصحة المهنية وسلامة البيئة في دورة مشرف السلامة والصحة المهنية والبيئة
objectives: معرفة اهم المصطلحات في السلامة والصحة المهنية
اكتساب القدرة على تقييم المخاطر

القدرة على عمل تحقيقات الحوادث واصدار التقارير
معرفة الادوات اللازمة لقياس اداء انظم السلامة
معرفة اهم الطرق اللازمة لتحكم والسيطرة على مخاطر البيئة

الدرس الرابع: التعرف على مخاطر بيئة العم: التعرف على مخاطر بيئة العمل المختلفة
الدرس السادس: مؤشرات قياس الاداء لانظمة: مؤشرات قياس الاداء لانظمة السلامة والصحة المهنية
الدرس الثامن: مثال تطبيقي لعمل تقييم مخا: مثال تطبيقي لعمل تقييم مخاطر لمنطقة عمل افتراضية وعمل تحقيق لمثال تطبيق

requirements: لا حاجة الى وجود مؤهل علمي بمجال السلامة والصحة المهنية ستتعلم كل شئ هنا
courses.description:
دورة في السلامة والصحة المهنية وسلامة البيئة تهدف إلى تعزيز وتعميق المعرفة والمهارات اللازمة لضمان بيئة عمل آمنة وصحية للعاملين في جميع القطاعات المهنية.
تعتبر السلامة والصحة المهنية أمرًا بالغ الأهمية في أي مكان عمل، حيث تهدف إلى حماية العاملين من الإصابات والأمراض المهنية وضمان سلامتهم ورفاهيتهم.
يشمل محتوى الدورة مجموعة واسعة من المواضيع التي تتعلق بالسلامة والصحة المهنية، مثل تحليل المخاطر والتقييم، وسائل الوقاية والحماية الشخصية، إجراءات السلامة في العمل، إدارة الحوادث والمخاطر، السلامة في استخدام المعدات والآلات، والتعرف على المواد الخطرة والمخاطر الموجودة في بيئة العمل وكيفية التعامل معها.
يتم تقديم المعلومات من خلال محاضرات وامثلة افترضية تحاكي الواقع العملي.
اضفة الى شرح ومناقشة سلامة البيئة فهي مجال يهتم بحماية البيئة والحفاظ على صحة النظم البيئية والتقليل من التأثيرات الضارة التي قد .تحدث نتيجة لأنشطة العمل البشرية وغيره من الانشطة البشرية
وتعتبر سلامة البيئة جزءًا هامًا من التنمية المستدامة والحفاظ على صحة كوكب الأرض للأجيال الحالية والمستقبلية.
وتشمل سلامة البيئة مجموعة واسعة من المواضيع والمخاطر التي قد تؤثر على البيئة.
تتضمن هذه المخاطر التلوث الهوائي والمائي والتربة، والتصحر، وتغير المناخ، وفقدان التنوع البيولوجي، وتأثيرات النفايات الخطرة، وتأثيرات استخدام المواد الكيميائية الضارة. يهدف العمل في مجال سلامة البيئة إلى تقييم هذه المخاطر وتطوير استراتيجيات وسياسات للحد منها والحفاظ على صحة البيئةوهذا ايضا سيتم شرحه في محضرة سلامة البيئة في هذه لدورة
تهدف سلامة البيئة إلى تحقيق توازن بين النمو الاقتصادي والحفاظ على البيئة .
هدف الدورة هو تعزيز الوعي بأهمية السلامة والصحة المهنية وسلامة البيئة وتزويد المشاركين بالمعرفة والمهارات اللازمة لتقديم بيئة عمل آمنة وصحية من خلال القدرة على ادارة انظمة السلامة والصحة المهنية وسلامة البيئة.
يتم تعزيز فهم المشاركين لتطبيق أفضل الممارسات في مجال السلامة والصحة المهنية وسلامة البيئة في المنشآت الصناعية والمؤسسات التجارية وجميع اماكن العمل.


تعتبر الدورة مهمة جدا للعاملين في مجموعة متنوعة من الصناعات والمجالات، بما في ذلك البناء والتشييد، والهندسة وشركات التامين وجميع  المدراء وقادة الفرق والمشرفين في جميع الشركات
target_audience: المبتدئين الراغبين بدخول مجال السلامة والصحة المهنية وسلامة البيئة

courses.title: First Aid Masterclass: A Complete Guide to First Aid
courses.bio: The Complete Guide to First Aid and Emergency Medicine: Learn CPR, Heimlich, How to Stop Bleedings, Baby Care & More!
objectives: You will be able to perform CPR (according to the latest guidelines).
You will be able to save people from choking using the Heimlich Maneuver.
You will be able to stop bleedings. Whether it is with bandages or tourniquets you will know when to use what.
You will be able to improvise your own tourniquets quickly in an emergency.
You will know which things are the most dangerous, and be able to prioritize you treatment correctly - "What Kills First Will Be Treated First".
You will be able to treat different climatic injuries. You will also know the science behind them and how to avoid them in the first place.
You will understand the principles behind first aid. You will be able to improvise in unfamiliar situations by following these principles.
You will be able to treat a variety of different injuries. Whether they are burns, head injuries, fractures or animal bites, you will know what to do.
You will be able to recognize many different medical emergencies, and you will know when you could treat them yourself and when you should call an ambulance.
You will be able to provide high quality first aid until helps arrive in a variety of emergencies, like a heart attack, stroke, asthma attack, diabetes, allergy attack, fainting, epilepsy and more.
You will be able to confidently use different first aid equipment, and you will know which equipment to get for your needs.
You will be able to build your very own first aid kit while knowing the principles to make it fit your exact needs.

And there's a ton more inside! Like a LIFETIME 1 on 1 support from an expert in first aid. Guides on how to carry injured people. Articles on getting the best first aid equipment, and honestly much much more!

First Aid Foundations - CPR: Heart Attack & Cardiac Arrest - Are They The Same Thing?
Further CPR Skills & Dealing with Specia: How to Use an AED (Automated External Defibrillator)
Further CPR Skills & Special Situations Quiz!
Heimlich Maneuver (How to Save People Fr: The "How to Save People From Choking" Quiz!
Applying Bandages, Tourniquets and Dress: How to Stop Bleeding - Direct Pressure
How to Stop Bleeding - Indirect Pressure
How to Place a Russian Tourniquet - Further Explanations
The Trauma Treatment Scheme (How to Trea: The Trauma Treatment Scheme (How to Treat Injuries)
How to Use The Practice Sheets
Awesome Extras!: How to Use The Z-Fold Bandage
Essential First Aid Equipment for CPR
How to Make a First Aid Kit
How to Carry an Injured Person
How to Redeem Udemy's CPR/First Aid Certification

requirements: Students don't need any previous experience in first aid.
courses.description:
First aid is probably one of the most essential life skills that everyone should have. The knowledge of first aid can literally be the difference between life and death when an emergency occurs.
Nonetheless, people often put off getting first aid training because:
They don't have the time to drop everything and do a first aid course.
They don't know where to begin.
It's expensive to take a first aid course.
They only need a refreshment.
But most importantly:
They don’t believe that accidents will ever happen to them or those close to them.
I can understand all of those reasons, and there's no doubt that it's true that many real life first aid courses are expensive, too basic, too rigid, or often just plain boring. However the last statement is unfortunately not very likely.
Every year around half a million people die from a cardiac arrest in the United States alone. Every five days a baby dies there from choking, and young people dying from unintentional injuries aren't an uncommon sight (with over 3.9 million deaths and over 138 million disability-adjusted life-years worldwide in 2004 alone).
We all want to believe that these things won't happen to us, and hopefully they won't. However if we put off learning first aid until we will actually need it, it will already be too late.
I've designed this course to give you the perfect solution to learn how to keep yourself and your loved ones safe.
In this course I am going to teach you everything you need to know from A - Z, to give you some peace of mind.
We are going to cover:
How to perform CPR (using the latest guidelines), with 2 different methods.
How to use an AED (Automated External Defibrillator) to make our CPRs even more effective.
How to save people from choking using the Heimlich Maneuver.
How to treat bleeding wounds using different bandages and tourniquets.
How to improvise our very own tourniquets from random cloth rags or the shirts that we are wearing.
The correct order of action - We will learn the correct steps so that what kills first will be treated first.
How to save people from different climatic injuries like dehydration, hyperthermia, frostbite or hypothermia, including how to avoid them.
How to handle different kinds of injuries, from head injuries, burns, fractures, to chest injuries and animal bites.
How to deal with different medical emergencies like a heart attack, stroke, allergy attack, epilepsy and many more.
The principles and the science behind what we do and why we do it, so you could improvise yourself if you'll need to.
All of which could be applied to adults, as well as children and babies.
And I've even included bonuses like how to carry an injured person, use different equipment or build your very own first aid kit!
My goal with this course was to make high quality first aid training more interesting and accessible to people around the world.
In this course I made sure there aren't going to be any boring slide shows. I will neither force you to remember a bunch of medical terms. But instead we will focus on the practical side of things, and we will learn how to actually apply real first aid, while learning the principles along the way.
With this course you will be able to learn at your own pace, investing your time whenever you feel comfortable. You'll be able to jump between lessons and dive into the stuff that is most relevant and interesting to you. And compared to real life first aid courses, not only that the price is extremely convenient (especially on a sale), but also it's almost certain that you will get more advanced training than any other courses that you can find (unless you're learning to become an EMT or actually becoming a Combat Medic yourself).
If first aid is something that is interesting to you, if you want to take your and your loved ones destiny in your own hands, and if you want to feel more confident knowing that you took your time to prepare, then I honestly believe that you will not regret signing up for this course. - However you could always refund with Udemy's 30 days guarantee if you will :)
I hope to see you inside.
Uri :D

Parents

People who want to be prepared to save a life
Anyone who is motivated to help others

courses.description:
تهدف ندوة التوعية بالكوارث والحماية إلى تزويد المشاركين بمعلومات شاملة حول الكوارث الطبيعية، التي تحدث بشكل متكرر في بلدنا والعالم، والاحتياطات الواجب اتخاذها لمواجهتها. تركيا بلد معرض لمخاطر الكوارث الطبيعية المختلفة، مثل الزلازل والفيضانات وحرائق الغابات والتحركات الجماعية. لذلك، يُعدّ الاستعداد لمثل هذه الكوارث أمرًا بالغ الأهمية لسلامة الفرد والمجتمع، ولا سيما في ظل التغيرات المناخية المتسارعة والتوسع العمراني الذي يزيد من تأثيرات هذه الكوارث.
يغطي هذا التدريب بالتفصيل السلوكيات الآمنة التي ينبغي اتباعها قبل الكوارث وأثناءها وبعدها. إن فهم طبيعة الكوارث وآثارها ومخاطرها سيغرس في المشاركين الوعي بكيفية تقليل الخسائر في الأرواح والممتلكات من خلال اتخاذ تدابير استباقية. كما سيتم التركيز على أهمية التخطيط الأسري للطوارئ، وتجهيز الحقائب الطارئة، ومعرفة نقاط التجمع الآمنة في الحي أو المدينة. علاوة على ذلك، فإن اتخاذ قرارات دقيقة وسريعة أثناء الكارثة يزيد بشكل كبير من فرص النجاة، ويقلل من الفوضى والتوتر الناتجين عن غياب المعلومات الصحيحة.
خلال التدريب، سيكتسب المشاركون المعرفة النظرية والمعرفة العملية مدعومة بأمثلة واقعية، وتمارين تفاعلية، ومواقف محاكاة تحاكي الواقع إلى حد كبير. سيُمكّنهم ذلك من التصرف بهدوء وفعالية في حال وقوع كارثة محتملة، وفهم كيفية مساعدة الآخرين دون تعريض أنفسهم للخطر. لن يقتصر هذا التدريب على رفع الوعي الفردي لدى المشاركين فحسب، بل سيعزز أيضًا التضامن الاجتماعي، ويشجع على بناء شبكات دعم محلية تُمكن المجتمع من التعامل المشترك مع الأزمات.
من خلال هذا التدريب، نهدف إلى بناء مجتمع أكثر وعيًا واستعدادًا للكوارث المستقبلية المحتملة. نأمل أن يتزود الجميع بمعلومات منقذة للحياة، وأن يساهموا في بناء مستقبل آمن ومتماسك، حيث يصبح كل فرد فاعلًا ومسؤولًا في الحفاظ على سلامة محيطه ومجتمعه.
بصفتنا أكاديمية الهلال الأحمر التركي، نتمنى لكم التوفيق في رحلة تعليمكم مدى الحياة، وندعوكم إلى مواصلة تطوير معارفكم ومهاراتكم، لتكونوا جزءًا من التغيير الإيجابي نحو مجتمع أكثر أمنًا واستعدادًا.

requirements: Basic understanding of workplace safety principles (recommended but not mandatory)

courses.description:
Falls remain the leading cause of workplace injuries and fatalities across construction and general industry. OSHA’s fall protection standards are clear; employers have a duty to protect their workers from these preventable hazards. This engaging online course, OSHA Essentials: Fall Prevention and Protection, is designed to equip you with the knowledge and confidence to recognize fall hazards, apply the right controls, and ensure full compliance with OSHA requirements.
Through four focused modules, you’ll gain a practical understanding of OSHA’s duty for fall protection, the most common hazards faced on worksites, and how to apply the hierarchy of controls to eliminate or reduce risks. You will explore the full range of fall protection systems; from guardrails and safety nets to personal fall arrest systems; while learning OSHA’s criteria for their use, inspection, and anchorage requirements. The course also highlights essential practices for ladders, scaffolds, and aerial lifts, ensuring you can put compliance into action where it matters most and ensure workplace safety.
Finally, you’ll learn OSHA’s mandatory training requirements, emergency planning, and rescue strategies, including suspension trauma awareness. Whether you are a frontline worker, supervisor, safety officer, or employer, this course will give you the skills to protect lives, avoid costly OSHA citations, and build a stronger safety culture.
Join today and take a vital step toward mastering OSHA fall protection compliance. Keep your workplace safe, your team confident, and your projects on track; because when it comes to working at heights, safety is never optional.
target_audience: Construction workers and supervisors
General industry workers exposed to fall hazards
Safety officers, HSE professionals, and site inspectors
Maintenance and facility management staff
Contractors and subcontractors working at heights
Employers and managers responsible for OSHA compliance

courses.description:
Human beings are created to face adversities or challenges at a point in our life, l must say  that no body pray for troubles or problems. At a point in our life we all need survival skills to enable as to cope in a situation that we will find ourselves, this survival techniques or strategies may be use basically in order to save and sustain life in any kind of natural environment or built environment. In times of challenges, the most important basic necessities is what we want so that it can sustain our life for us to pool true, such as food, water and shelter. In times of disaster situations its not about the basic necessities of life but now its about the ability to even live in situations such as earthquake etc. being lost in a forest and you cannot find your way home for a couple of days without basic amenities, this are time that demand that individuals should learn now so that in such a challenging  times and circumstances we are able to develop all the needed surviving skills to aid as pool through in all areas and come out successfully. One area that we have all taken for granted that am part is knowing more about first aid, this are areas we turn to take for granted but is a very important way to protect one selves during a time of crisis or injury in the wilderness. The basic thing like how to treat our wound during critical stages are the essential remainders why we all should know more now about first aid.
How we can create shelter in the forest during survival times is very essential in ensuring that, we can use cave in the forest to sleep or use wood and some leaves to built our own shelter and sleep there whilst we find a way to come home. l must say that food and fire and water are the most present need when one want to survive at any critical stage, this is sure for everybody but another thing we all forget about is the preparation of the individual mind, the mind processes are very critical to survival, at a point the will to live or death is in the stage of the mind preparedness, this is why all of us should  be mentally and physically prepared to ensure that we are strong to face any challenges that we find ourselves in. Let all of us be strong and less stressful so that we can stand such situations and built on our survival skills. Surviving in the woods demand carefully planning, you need to have water to drink and food to eat etc. The more time you have dedicated to forming a plan when disaster does strike, the better. When preparing the supplies, think in two categories: basic survival and getting by.

Learners will be able to implement proper control measures such as atmospheric testing, ventilation, isolation, and emergency preparedness.
Learners will be capable of following step-by-step entry procedures, including the use of entry permits, PPE, standby personnel, and rescue plans.
n addition, participants will learn about the dangers of flammable materials and gain insights from past accidents to enhance workplace safety.

Confined Spaces hazards and safety contr: The 10 Golden Safety Steps for Confined Space Entry.
Confined Space Safety Essentials part one
Confined Space Safety Essentials second part
Hazards of flammable materials, cases st: Hot work near fiery materials two Parts
Hot work near fiery materials Part 2

requirements: There is no specific requirement other than having interest in occupational safety and health.
courses.description:
Workplace safety is one of the main foundations for the success and sustainability of any organization. A safe work environment not only protects employees but also plays an important role in increasing productivity and improving employee satisfaction.
By reducing the risk of accidents and injuries, organizations can avoid both direct and indirect losses. Committing to safety standards also shows the organization’s professionalism and responsibility, which builds trust with employees and partners.
Training program will focus on confined space work, identifying potential hazards within such environments, and effective control measures. In addition, it will highlight essential safety practices that can be applied across various job sites to promote a safer working environment.
Learners will be able to recognize the various physical, chemical, and atmospheric hazards associated with confined spaces that you and your colleagues can work in a safe manner .


Who should attend this course:-
Professionals in the field of occupational safety and health.
Managers, supervisors, engineers, and technicians at work sites.
Individuals new to the field of occupational safety and health.
Anyone with an interest in safety and health practices.
By applying this knowledge, all personnel can actively contribute to safer confined space operations and help prevent accidents and injuries in high-risk environments.
target_audience:  Professionals in the field of occupational safety and health  Managers, supervisors, engineers, and technicians at work sites  Individuals new to the field of occupational safety and health  Anyone with an interest in safety and health practices

courses.title: OSHA Compliance - Material Handling, Storage and Disposal
courses.bio: Lift Smart, Store Safe, Stay Compliant with OSHA 29 CFR 1910 Subpart N
objectives: Identify and describe different types of material handling equipment used in workplaces.
Recognize common hazards and safety risks associated with manual and mechanical material handling tasks.
Apply effective control measures and best practices to minimize material handling risks.
Explain safe storage, stacking, and disposal techniques to prevent workplace incidents.
Understand employer obligations related to material handling, including training, inspections, and compliance with regulations.
requirements: Basic workplace safety knowledge – Familiarity with general workplace hazards is helpful.
Experience in material handling – Not required, but beneficial for understanding real-world applications.
English proficiency – Course materials and instructions will be in English.
courses.description:
Efficient material handling is essential for workplace safety and productivity; but without proper training, it can lead to serious injuries, equipment damage, and costly disruptions. Whether you're lifting materials manually or using slings or operating cranes or powered industrial trucks, understanding the risks and best practices is crucial to preventing accidents.
Our OSHA Material Handling and Storage Training is designed to equip workers, supervisors, and safety professionals with the knowledge and skills to handle, store, and transport materials safely. This comprehensive course, aligned with OSHA 29 CFR 1910 Subpart N, will help you identify potential hazards, implement effective control measures, and ensure compliance with workplace safety standards.
Participants will learn safe lifting techniques, hazard recognition strategies, proper handling storage and disposal practices, and equipment operation protocols to reduce risks and enhance overall productivity. Real-world case studies and interactive scenarios are included to reinforce key concepts and promote active learning. Whether you're in manufacturing, warehousing, or logistics, this training provides essential tools to manage material handling safely and effectively.
By completing this training, you’ll reduce workplace injuries, improve efficiency, enhance compliance, and contribute to a safer work environment.
Don’t wait until an accident happens; enroll today and take control of safety in material handling!
target_audience: Warehouse and logistics personnel – including forklift operators, loaders, and material handlers.
Workers – working with conveyors, cranes, and industrial equipment.
Supervisors and site managers – responsible for overseeing material handling operations.
Safety officers and HSE professionals – ensuring compliance with OSHA standards.
Maintenance and facility management teams – involved in inspecting and maintaining material handling equipment.
Anyone involved in material handling and storage – looking to enhance workplace safety and efficiency.

courses.description:
En este curso vas a aprender, de la mano de un capacitador profesional

Es un curso ideal para quienes desean capacitarse para sí mismos, para ayudar en su entorno familiar o laboral o para refrescar conocimientos aprendidos previamente. Se dictan normativas actualizadas según la American Heart Association.  El capacitador, de amplia experiencia en el ámbito de la salud pediátrica y salud ocupacional lleva dictado mas de 200 cursos de RCP, Primeros auxilios, entre otros, para particulares, instituciones educativas y empresas dedicadas a la exploración y explotación de minerales, petróleo, servicios de transporte de energía, servicios de transporte de cargas peligrosas, transporte de personal. Se ha volcado toda esta experiencia en módulos actualizados y fácilmente entendibles, con una perspectiva eminentemente práctica y dirigido al público general. courses.title: First Aid: A Comprehensive Guide to Saving Lives
courses.bio: Learn First Aid online! Created by board-certified physicians and adheres to the latest ILCOR Standards and Guidelines

Save a Life by NHCPS & Disque Foundation: Introducing Save A Life by NHCPS & the Disque Foundation
Environmental Injury and Illness: Knowledge Assessment: Environmental Injury and Illness
Additional Learning: How to Get CPR, AED: Additional Learning: How to Get CPR, AED, and First Aid Training Online
Ways to Give: Join Us in Our Mission of Furthering Education!

requirements: No previous training or special materials are required
courses.description:
First aid refers to the emergency or immediate care you should provide when a person is injured or ill until complete medical treatment is available. For minor conditions, first aid care may be enough. For serious problems, first aid care should be continued until more advanced care becomes available. The decision to act appropriately with first aid can mean the difference between life and death. Begin by introducing yourself to the injured or ill person. Explain that you are a first aid provider and are willing to help. The person must permit you to help them; wait to touch them until they agree to be helped. If you encounter a confused person or someone critically injured or ill, you can assume they would want you to help them. This is known as “implied consent.”
Knowing the process of First Aid is critical in responding to life-threatening emergencies. The newest First Aid course guidelines focus on doing several tasks simultaneously with a group process that promotes efficiency and minimizes errors.
This course will teach participants how to perform life support techniques, including chest compressions, basic airway management, rescue breathing, and the use of an AED for defibrillation.
The course package includes:
A First Aid instructional presentation
CPR, AED, & First Aid Provider Handbook
Note: This course is for first aid training.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to be prepared in a medical emergency
Health Care Professionals
Nursing and Allied Health Care Students
Emergency Responders
Medical Students

courses.title: Curso primeros auxilios para bebés y niños
courses.bio: Estate preparado/a ante cualquier situación de peligro o emergencia infantil
objectives: Entenderás de forma fácil y práctica los procedimientos de primeros auxilios específicos para bebés y niños
Tendrás la capacidad de evaluar rápidamente la gravedad de una situación de emergencia
Estarás preparado/a para practicar medidas que permitan salvar vidas, como es el RCP o la Maniobra de Hemlich
Verás videotutoriales prácticos que te ayudarán a replicar y aplicar lo aprendido
requirements: No es necesario tener experiencia previa
Aprenderás las nociones básicas y más importantes
courses.description:
Bienvenido al curso de Primeros Auxilios Infantiles, diseñado específicamente para padres, cuidadores y cualquier persona interesada en garantizar la seguridad y bienestar de los más pequeños. Este programa integral aborda situaciones de emergencia que pueden surgir en bebés y niños, brindándote las habilidades esenciales para actuar de manera rápida y eficiente.
Impartido por Nacho Leal, enfermero SAMU con más de 10 años de experiencia trabajando en Hospitales y servicios de emergencia.
A lo largo de este curso, explorarás una variedad de temas críticos, desde técnicas de RCP adaptadas a bebés y niños hasta la gestión de atragantamientos, quemaduras, cortaduras y otras lesiones comunes en la infancia. Nuestro enfoque práctico se centra en la prevención, identificación y respuesta adecuada a situaciones de emergencia, proporcionándote la confianza necesaria para enfrentar cualquier eventualidad.
Además de las habilidades técnicas, también abordaremos la importancia de mantener la calma en situaciones de crisis, comunicarte efectivamente con servicios de emergencia y trabajar en colaboración con otros cuidadores. Entenderás la importancia de la seguridad en el hogar y aprenderás a crear un entorno que minimice los riesgos para los niños.
Este curso se presenta de manera accesible y amigable, con lecciones interactivas, videos instructivos y evaluaciones para consolidar tu aprendizaje. ¡Únete a nosotros y haz de la seguridad infantil una prioridad!
target_audience: Este curso esta dirigido a padres y madres, cuidadores, niñer@s, profesionales de la salud, educadores, familiares y amigos.

courses.title: First Aid, and Children's Health: Your Complete Guide
courses.bio: Taught by a Doctor: Mandatory first aid course covering all of the common injuries and illnesses especially of children
objectives: Identify emergency medical situations that can happen to children
Administer potentially life saving treatment to children in dangerous situations
Know which red flags to look for, and when to call for professional help
Properly manage the situation until professional help arrives

Introduction: Goals of first aid, and role of first responder
Basic gear you should have in your home
A few good things to know about childrens vaccines
Items for home first aid kit
Child with a fever: What constitutes a fever, how to check temperature
How to treat at home, and what to monitor
Dislocations, sprains, fractures, and cu: Treating cuts, and wounds with object still in the wound
Closed vs Open fractures, open needs special attention, clean to avoid infection
Advanced video: Checking radial pulse with fractures of the humerus
Allergic Reactions: How to respond to allergic reactions
Q&A: How do you put young kids to sleep?
Seizures: Recognizing and responding to a seizure
What to know about febrile seizures
Choking: Properly differentiating between partial and complete obstruction
Treatment of child over the age of 2 choking
Asthma: Signs and symptoms of asthma attack

requirements: There are no prerequisites for this course
courses.description:
Taking care of kids can be scary, because they are very accident prone.
This is true for children of all ages, from newborn infants to older kids who are almost fully grown.
Anybody who has the responsibility of taking care of kids, whether you be a parent, teacher, babysitter, older sibling, or even a neighbor who is asked every so often to look after the kids, should know the very basics of how to act in an emergency situation.

This course is not designed to make you a professional medical provider, and it will not teach you how to diagnose your child’s illness. This course is basic and necessary, and will cover the most common situations that can and will arise, as well as less common but dangerous situations that require immediate response. After taking this course you will feel more comfortable and confident, that if something should happen to a child and you are in the area, you will be able to properly assess what needs to be done and take the right steps to control the situation until help arrives.
There are many situations where appropriate steps taken immediately can save lives, prevent future complications, prevent bad situations from getting worse, and make sure that the healing process starts effectively and immediately.
This course will include:
An hour and a half of instructional video designed to make sure you come away with the key points to know and remember
Tests along the way to make sure you understand the material, and will be ready to act when necessary
Sources in order to further enrich those who choose to read extra with the necessary tools to do so
You need to know the basic steps of treatments in order to be prepared for a number of situations that can and will arise.
Things like:
Choking
Fractured Bones
Allergic Reactions
Serious Infections
Seizures
These are some very common scenarios that happen daily around the world, and with the proper immediate response you can prevent these situations from getting much worse. This course will provide you with the necessary knowledge to know how to act in these situations, along with many others.
First aid is essential knowledge that every person should have.
First aid specific to children is a skill set that everybody that deals with children either personally or professionally should have.
target_audience: Current Parents
Future Parents
Teachers
Babysitters
Caregivers
Anybody else who wants to feel more confident in their ability to administer first aid to children

requirements: pharmacist
courses.description:
اليقظة الدوائية (pharmacovigilance) هي جزء أساسي من أنظمة الرعاية الصحية في جميع أنحاء العالم، وهي تركز على مراقبة وتقييم سلامة الأدوية بعد الموافقة عليها. post marketing surveillance
تستكشف هذه الدورة الشاملة مبادئ وممارسات وتشريعات اليقظة الدوائية (pharmacovigilance) لضمان استخدام الأدوية بطريقة آمنة وفعالة.
سيتعرف الطلاب على السياق التاريخي وتطور اليقظة الدوائية، مفهوم أهميتها في الصحة العامة وصناعة الادوية. سيتعلمون عن التفاعلات الدوائية الضارة، تصنيفها، وطرق اكتشافها وتسجيلها والإبلاغ عنها. سيتم التركيز على أهمية
1- data collection جمع البيانات
2- signal management كشف الإشارات
3- Risk management  تقييم المخاطر واستراتيجيات إدارتها.
4- Risk/Benefit analysis  التوازن بين الخطر والمنفعة
5- reporting of deferent types of cases الابلاغ عن الحالات المختلفة وما هي الحالات التي يجب الابلاغ عنها
6- Documents and records  المستندات والتقارير التي يجب تسجيلها والاحتفاظ بها خلال وبعد عمليات اليقظة الدوائية
من خلال دراسات الحالات والأمثلة العملية،
سيعرفون أيضًا دور مختلف الأطراف المعنية، بما في ذلك الجهات التنظيمية وشركات الصناعات الدوائية والمهنيين الصحيين health care professionals  والمرضى، في ضمان سلامة الأدوية على مدار دورة حياة المنتج.
ستغطي الدورة التشريعات والإرشادات الدولية والمحلية لليقظة الدوائية واشتراطات هيئة الدواء المصرية،
بنهاية الدورة، سيمتلك المشاركون فهمًا شاملاً لمبادئ وممارسات اليقظة الدوائية، مما يمكنهم من المساهمة بفعالية في تقييم سلامة الأدوية وإدارة المخاطر والامتثال التنظيمي في منظومة الرعاية الصحية
target_audience: pharmacists

courses.bio: Kalp masajı, acil bakım, yoğun bakım, CPR bilinci, temel yaşam desteği
objectives: Öğrenciler, CPR'nin ne olduğunu, neden önemli olduğunu ve hangi durumlarda uygulanması gerektiğini öğrenecekler.
Öğrenciler, acil bir durumla karşılaştıklarında hızlı ve doğru kararlar alabilecek bilgi ve özgüvene sahip olacaklar.
Öğrenciler, AED cihazlarının ne olduğunu, nasıl çalıştığını ve nasıl kullanılacağını öğrenecekler.

Giriş: CPR Çocuk ve Bebek Hastalarda Nasıl Uygulanır?
İlk Yardım ve CPR Eğitimi Nasıl Alınır?

requirements: Kursumuzu almak için herhangi bir gereksinim veya ön koşul bulunmamaktadır. CPR eğitimi, yeni başlayanlar için tasarlanmıştır ve önceden bilgi veya deneyim gerektirmez. Bu kurs, herkesin hayat kurtarma becerilerini kazanabilmesi için bariyerleri düşürmeye yönelik bir fırsattır.
courses.description:
CPR (Kardiyopulmoner Resüsitasyon) Yapmayı Öğren kursu, acil durumlarda hayat kurtarma becerilerini kazanmak isteyen herkes için tasarlanmış kapsamlı bir eğitim programıdır. Bu kurs, katılımcılara CPR'nin temel tekniklerini, otomatik eksternal defibrilatör (AED) kullanımını ve acil durumlarda hızlı ve etkili müdahale yöntemlerini öğretir.
Öğrenim Hedefleri:
- Temel CPR tekniklerini anlama ve uygulama.
- Acil durumlarda hızlı ve etkili müdahale edebilme.
- Otomatik eksternal defibrilatör (AED) kullanımını öğrenme.
- Çocuklar ve bebekler için CPR tekniklerini uygulayabilme.
Bu kurs, genel halk, ebeveynler, bakıcılar, sporcular, spor antrenörleri, iş yerinde ilk yardım görevlileri, öğretmenler, eğitimciler ve sağlık alanına ilgi duyan herkes için uygundur.
Kurs İçeriği:
1) Giriş ve CPR'nin Önemi: CPR'nin tanımı, tarihçesi ve hayat kurtarmadaki önemi.
Acil durumlarda doğru müdahale prensipleri.
2) Temel CPR Teknikleri: Göğüs kompresyonları ve kurtarma nefeslerinin doğru uygulaması.
CPR uygulamalarında dikkat edilmesi gereken noktalar.
3) Acil Durumlarda Hızlı Müdahale: Acil durumlarda sahne güvenliği ve hızlı değerlendirme yapma.Acil servislerle etkili iletişim kurma.
4) Otomatik Eksternal Defibrilatör (AED) Kullanımı: AED cihazlarının tanımı ve işlevi. AED kullanım prosedürleri ve dikkat edilmesi gereken hususlar.
5) Çocuklar ve Bebekler İçin CPR: Çocuklar ve bebekler için CPR tekniklerinin farkları.Yaş gruplarına göre CPR uygulamaları ve adaptasyonları.
6) Pratik Uygulamalar: Gerçekçi senaryolar üzerinde pratik yapma. CPR ve AED kullanımı ile ilgili çeşitli uygulama çalışmaları.
CPR yapmayı öğrenmek, sevdiklerinizi ve çevrenizdeki insanları korumanın en etkili yollarından biridir. Bu kursla birlikte, acil durumlarda doğru müdahale tekniklerini öğrenerek kendinize ve başkalarına güvenli bir ortam sağlayabilirsiniz. Hayat kurtarma becerilerini geliştirmek için bizimle bu yolculuğa katılın!
target_audience: Hemşirelik Öğrencileri
Sağlık Çalışanları
Acil Servis ve Yoğun Bakım Personeli
Genel Halk
Ebeveynler ve Bakıcılar
Sporcular ve Spor Antrenörleri
İş Yerinde İlk Yardım Görevlileri

courses.title: NR 05 Comissão Interna de Prevenção de Acidentes

objectives: Identificar e Avaliar os Riscos no local de Trabalho
Entender as Atribuições e Deveres da CIPA
Elaborar Mapa de Riscos
Investigar Eventos Adversos de Forma Adequada
requirements: Não é necessário nenhum pré-requisito
courses.description:
Este curso visa a instrução sobre as atribuições da Comissão Interna de Prevenção de Acidentes para todos os colaboradores que foram designados ou eleitos para o cargo. Cumprindo todos os requisitos da norma em seu conteúdo programático exigido. Dentre os assuntos que serão abordados nesse curso, estão: Legislação, Atribuições da CIPA, Riscos e Acidentes do Trabalho, Análises de Eventos Adversos, entre outros.


Conforme a NR 05, A Comissão Interna de Prevenção de Acidentes - CIPA - tem como objetivo a prevenção de acidentes e doenças decorrentes do trabalho, de modo a tornar compatível permanentemente o trabalho com a preservação da vida e a promoção da saúde do trabalhador.


Devem constituir CIPA, por estabelecimento, e mantê-la em regular funcionamento as empresas privadas, públicas, sociedades de economia mista, órgãos da administração direta e indireta, instituições beneficentes, associações recreativas, cooperativas, bem como outras instituições que admitam trabalhadores como empregados.


Veremos cada um dos pontos exigidos para serem ministrados no treinamento, conforme a norma estabelece. Qualquer dúvida, você poderá estar conversando comigo, mandando uma mensagem através dos comentários disponibilizados na plataforma. Este curso também conta com exercícios de fixação par ajudar você a entender melhor o conteúdo. Fique à vontade também para recomendar melhorias e inclusões!


Obrigado pela sua escolha e tenha um bom curso!
target_audience: Este curso é destinado para trabalhadores que foram Designados ou Eleitos para o cargo da CIPA

courses.title: First Aid & CPR Basics: Non-Certified Training for Everyday
courses.bio: Learn CPR steps, first aid responses, and emergency actions to keep loved ones safe— no prior training required.
objectives: Recognize common emergency situations that require first aid or CPR.
Perform basic, non-certified CPR techniques for adults, children, and infants.
Apply essential first aid procedures for wounds, burns, choking, and more.
Respond confidently and calmly in everyday health emergencies.
requirements: No prior medical training or certification is required.
You’ll learn everything you need through clear video instruction.
Just bring a willingness to learn and stay calm under pressure.
courses.description:
Accidents and medical emergencies can happen at any time—would you know what to do?
First Aid & CPR Basics: Non-Certified Training for Everyday is a beginner-friendly course designed to teach you essential life-saving skills without the pressure of formal certification. Whether you're a parent, caregiver, teacher, or just someone who wants to be prepared, this course empowers you with the confidence to take action when it matters most.
In under an hour, you’ll learn:
How to recognize and respond to common emergencies like choking, bleeding, or burns
Step-by-step CPR techniques for adults, children, and infants
Basic first aid procedures for cuts, fractures, shock, allergic reactions, and more
How to stay calm and effective while waiting for emergency services
This course is not a replacement for official certification, but it is an excellent supplement or starting point for anyone looking to become more confident and capable in emergency situations.
No experience or equipment is required—just your time, attention, and commitment to helping others. You’ll gain lifelong knowledge that could benefit your family, workplace, or community. Enroll today and walk away with simple, practical skills that could save lives, reduce panic, and make a real difference in someone’s moment of need—whether at home, work, school, or out in public.
You’ll also receive downloadable materials to reinforce key takeaways, support hands-on practice, and serve as helpful reminders for real-world application.
Disclaimer: This course is for informational and educational purposes only. It does not provide official CPR or First Aid certification and should not replace certified training required by employers or professional organizations.
target_audience: Parents, babysitters, and caregivers seeking everyday safety knowledge.
Teachers, coaches, and community members looking for emergency preparedness.
Anyone who wants to feel confident handling basic medical emergencies without needing certification.

courses.title: Asbestos Awareness Safety Training
courses.bio: The ultimate asbestos awareness safety course
objectives: Learn what asbestos is
Learn how to identify asbetsos
Learn the relevant OSHA standards related to this topic
Learn how to work safely around asbestos
Learn how to work safer when doing work related to this topic
Increase your workplace safety and health skill set
Get certified and become more valuable in the workforce
requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
Asbestos has a very bad reputation and for good reason.  This course provides you with everything you need to know to work safely around asbestos and what to do if you encounter asbestos in a place it shouldn't be.
This course is intended to provide safety and health training in compliance with Federal OSHA and State OSHA training requirements such as CalOSHA. If you have questions, you may ask our instructors and they will respond to you within a short period of time as is outlined by the OSHA standards.
The training will cover all of the required elements outlined in Federal and State OSHA standards to ensure that your training meets or exceed the minimum required training. If your training has a time requirement, the content of the training has been designed to meet that requirement.
The training is developed by our in-house, real trainers with twenty years of experience, working in the field and with real crews and is trusted by public agencies throughout California.
There are no prerequisites required for this course. The course will walk you through all of the elements required to be successful and complete any questions or quizzes or testing that may be required.
target_audience: Anyone working with or around asbestos

courses.title: Autism (ASD) & Learning Disability Awareness for Everyone
courses.bio: Detailed Learning About: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) + Autism Diagnosis + Learning Disability - Autism Awareness
objectives: Gain a solid understanding of Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD).
Identify learning disabilities commonly associated with autism.
Recognise autism symptoms and diagnosis methods in students.
Apply cognitive approaches to support autistic learners.
Implement autism-friendly teaching methods in the classroom.
Create a positive, inclusive environment for autistic students.
requirements: This Autism Awareness course doesn't require prior experience and is suitable for diverse learners. To study the course, all you need is a passion for learning and a good understanding of English, numeracy, and IT skills.
courses.description:
➥ Learn to Make a Real Difference!
Did you know 1 in 54 children has Autism? Understanding Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) is more vital than ever. Join our Autism Awareness course to gain essential knowledge, professional skills, and effective strategies. Step forward to support autistic individuals and become a true advocate!"



❖ Latest Update in the Course (January 2025):
Quiz Added for Each Lesson
Autism Awareness Brochure Added
Printable Weekly Study Plan Added

❖ What is Covered in this Course?
This Autism Awareness course from Study Booth Academy explains Autism Spectrum Disorder and strategies to support autistic individuals. It provides insights into Autism, Learning Disabilities, and effective autism-friendly approaches.
Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD): Understand autism and its key characteristics.
Learning Disabilities in Autism: Discover how autism and Learning Disabilities may affect individuals.
Autism Diagnosis as a Teacher: Learn how teachers can identify autism and provide support.
Cognitive Approaches to Autism: Practical strategies to help manage autism through cognitive methods.
Dealing with Autistic Students: Guidance on working with autistic individuals in school settings.
Autism-Friendly Classrooms: Skills to create autism-supportive environments for inclusive learning.
This curriculum offers practical techniques and insights into autism care, empowering you to make a positive difference in supporting autistic individuals.


❖ Why Learn About this Topic?
Autism Awareness is essential as autism affects millions globally. Understanding autism and Learning Disabilities builds strong support systems in homes and schools. Autism Awareness provides skills to help autistic people thrive and succeed. By learning about autism, you can foster better environments and understanding. Autism-friendly spaces help autistic individuals navigate daily life more comfortably. Knowledge of autism empowers teachers and families to make a positive difference.



❖ Reasons Why You Should Choose this Course:
Practical and Focused: This Autism Awareness course provides specific insights for autism care.
Helpful for Educators and Families: This course supports autism care at home and school.
Additional Resources: The Autism Awareness Brochure adds further learning on autism.
Easy Application: The autism techniques in this course suit everyday needs.
Quality from Study Booth Academy: We bring trusted autism education with this course.


❖ Our Promise to You:
At Study Booth Academy, we are committed to Autism Awareness. Whether for personal or professional purposes, our Autism Awareness course on Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) provides clear support. Reach out with any questions about autism or Learning Disabilities. Our goal is to help you feel ready to support autistic people.



❖ Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):
Q1: What is Autism?
A1: Autism is a condition affecting behaviour and social skills.
Q2: Is Autism and Learning Disability the Same?
A2: No, autism and Learning Disabilities are different challenges.
Q3: Why is Autism Awareness Important?
A3: Autism Awareness builds understanding to help autistic people feel included.
Q4: How Should We Support an Autistic Person?
A4: Support by creating clear and calm routines and learning spaces.
Q5: What is Autism Acceptance?
A5: Autism Acceptance means valuing autism and respecting neurodiversity.
Q6: What is Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)?
A6: ASD is a developmental disability caused by differences in the brain. It can cause significant social, communication, and behavioral challenges.
Q7: Can adults be diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)?
A7: Yes. Diagnosis in adults can be more challenging due to the lack of early developmental history.
Q8: Are vaccines linked to Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)?
A8: No, extensive research has shown that vaccines do not cause ASD.


❖ Recent Student Review:
★★★★★ "The Autism Awareness course gave me skills for classroom autism support. I learned new autism-friendly methods. This is a valuable Autism Awareness course for anyone interested in supporting autism." - Louis Green
target_audience: Teachers and educators working with autistic children.
Teaching assistants in special education settings.
Parents seeking to understand autism better.
School administrators aiming to create inclusive environments.
Anyone 16 years or older wanting to take the course.
Individuals looking for a related career.
Professionals seeking to enhance skills at this field.

courses.title: Learn Emergency Drugs for Healthcare Providers

courses.description:
Emergency Medications Course is a dynamic, case-based course designed for medical students, residents, and healthcare professionals who want to confidently manage drug therapy in critical situations.


What You’ll Learn:
Mechanisms of Action (MOA) Decoded – Go beyond rote learning with clear, visual explanations of how each drug works at a cellular level.
Emergency Indications with Precision – Learn exactly when and why to reach for drugs like epinephrine, amiodarone, or naloxone—no second-guessing.
Dosing Done Right – From weight-based pediatric calculations to ACLS protocols, never freeze on dosage again.
Deadly Pitfalls & Key Considerations – Avoid fatal mistakes with red-flag warnings on drug interactions, contraindications, and special populations.


Why Enroll?
High-Yield, Practical Learning – No fluff, just what you need for real emergencies.
Expert-Designed Content – Created by emergency physicians, pharmacologists and nurses.
Case-Based Scenarios – Apply knowledge in simulated emergencies for better retention.
Who Needs This?
Med Students: Ace your clerkships and crush shelf exams.

Attendings: Refresh your knowledge with 2024 guidelines.
Enroll Now and Get:
