courses.title: Aprende a suturar heridas en la piel correctamente.
courses.bio: Curso completo y práctico sobre todo lo que necesitas saber para realizar puntos de sutura en la piel.
objectives: Distinguir entre las diferentes heridas de la piel, saber cuáles son susceptibles de ser suturadas, crear un campo estéril, infiltrar anestesia local correctamente, realizar nudos quirúrgicos y dar puntos de sutura correctamente.
requirements: Utilizar PC a nivel básico.
¡Tener muchas ganas de aprender!
courses.description:
Quiero darte la bienvenida a este novedoso curso sobre cómo suturar las heridas de la piel correctamente. Imagina que, siendo médico, enfermero/a, estudiante de enfermería, estudiante de medicina, o alguien que tiene contacto o interés por el mundo de la asistencia médica, llama a la puerta de tu casa un familiar con una herida en la piel tras una caída casual. Sabes que acuden a ti por tu contacto e interés con el mundo médico. ¿Te gustaría poderle ayudar y ser tú quien le suturase correctamente y de forma estética la herida que presenta? ¿Te gustaría poder aplicar estos conocimientos en tu puesto de trabajo hospitalario? Con este curso aprenderás la anatomía de la piel, distinguir los tipos de heridas e identificar aquellas susceptibles de ser suturadas, ponerte los guantes estériles correctamente, crear un campo estéril, identificar el instrumental y material de sutura necesario, conocer los diferentes tipos de sutura, infiltrar anestesia local en la herida que queremos suturar y realizar diferentes puntos de sutura paso a paso.
Nuestro equipo ha enseñado a más de 200 estudiantes de Medicina a suturar correctamente, en cursos realizados de forma presencial. En nuestras ganas de llegar a más personas para divulgar este conocimiento hemos creado este vídeocurso con todo el contenido necesario para que puedas aumentar tus conocimientos.
Sólo nos queda decirte una última cosa; Bienvenido, ¡Y vamos a aprender!


Palabras clave: Sutura, herida, Medicina, Enfermería, puntos, seda, material quirúrgico, cicatrización, nudos, estética, porta, pinzas, piel.
target_audience: Este curso va dirigido a ti si eres: Estudiante de Medicina, Estudiante de Enfermería, Enfermero o enfermera, Médico, otro personal sanitario (miembros de la Cuz Roja, socorristas...), o cualquier otra persona con interés y que desee aprender a realizar puntos de sutura correctamente.

courses.title: Gestión de seguridad en trabajos de izajes
courses.bio: Herramientas preventivas para el control de trabajos en maniobras e izajes
objectives: Prevención de accidentes en trabajos de alto riesgos
Seguridad en trabajos de izajes
Certificación de operadores y rigger
Plan de izajes para maniobras
requirements: No
courses.description:
La gestión de seguridad en maniobras e izajes es una prioridad en cualquier empresa que realice trabajos de este tipo, ya que estos procesos pueden ser altamente peligrosos si no se llevan a cabo de manera adecuada. Para garantizar la seguridad de los trabajadores y el éxito de la operación es necesario llevar a cabo una serie de medidas preventivas.


En primer lugar, es fundamental realizar una evaluación de riesgos en la zona de trabajo, identificando los posibles peligros y estableciendo las medidas necesarias para minimizarlos. Asimismo, es importante contar con el equipo adecuado y en buenas condiciones para realizar la maniobra o izaje, siguiendo siempre las especificaciones técnicas del fabricante.


Otro aspecto clave es la capacitación del personal involucrado en la operación, garantizando que posea el conocimiento y habilidades necesarias para llevar a cabo la tarea con seguridad. Además, es crucial establecer una comunicación efectiva entre los miembros del equipo durante todo el proceso, a fin de evitar confusiones o errores que puedan poner en riesgo la seguridad de los trabajadores.


Por otro lado, es importante contar con una política clara de mantenimiento y revisión periódica del equipo utilizado, para evitar fallas y prevenir accidentes.
Finalmente, es imprescindible contar con un plan de emergencia en caso de algún incidente, el cual debe incluir los procedimientos para atención médica, evacuación y rescate.


En resumen, la gestión de seguridad en maniobras e izajes debe ser una prioridad para las empresas y seguir siempre los lineamientos técnicos y de seguridad para evitar accidentes.
target_audience: Profesionales en seguridad industrial, brigadistas de emergencias y Miembos del Comité de SST

courses.title: Curso de Prevenção e Combate a Incêndios
courses.bio: Aprenda técnicas adequadas e eficientes de prevenção e combate à incêndios, elas serão decisivas em situações críticas
objectives: Teoria do Fogo
Elementos que Formam o Fogo e Produtos da Combustão
Pontos de Temperatura dos Combustíveis
Classes de Incêndios
Equipamentos de Prevenção e Combate a Incêndios
Evacuação de Emergência
Medidas para Evitar Incêndios

Módulo I: Introdução, Capacitação das Pessoas e Grandes Incêndios Brasileiros
Conceitos Básicos e Elementos do Fogo
Mecanismos de Transmissão do Calor e Combustíveis
Temperatura dos Combustíveis - Ponto de Fulgor, Combustão e de Autoignição
Módulo II: Equipamentos de Proteção e Combate a Incêndios
Composição e Sinalização do Extintor de Incêndio
Localização e Mobilidade do Extintor de Incêndio
Tipos de Extintores e Finalidade de Uso
Sistemas de Hidrantes e Identificação das Mangueiras
Outros Componentes, Utilização do Sistema de Hidrantes e Sprinklers
Detectores e Sistemas de Alarmes e Alertas
Porta Corta Fogo e Inspeções nos Equipamentos de Prevenção e Combate a Incêndios
Módulo III: Procedimentos e Orientações para Uma Evacuação de Emergência

requirements: Não é necessário experiência prévia.
courses.description:
O curso de Prevenção e Combate a Incêndios da Ambiente Safety é para fornecer ao aluno conhecimento e habilidades necessárias para prevenir incêndios e lidar com eles em caso de emergência. Isso inclui o entendimento dos princípios de prevenção de incêndios, a identificação de riscos e perigos potenciais, a utilização de equipamentos de combate a incêndios e técnicas para evacuação segura.
O objetivo geral é capacitar os alunos para atuar de forma preventiva e eficaz em situações de emergência, contribuindo para a proteção de vidas e bens. Pois nenhum sistema de prevenção de incêndio será eficaz se não houver pessoas treinadas e capacitadas para operá-lo. Pessoas que, com conhecimento de prevenção e combate a incêndio, com capacitação para situações imprevistas e de emergência, com controle emocional e ainda com conhecimento de técnicas adequadas de combate, serão decisivas em situações críticas salvando empresas de sucumbirem diante do fogo e evitando que vidas e materiais sejam perdidos.
O curso foi dividido em três módulos, a saber:


No primeiro módulo o aluno aprenderá sobre a importância de ter pessoas capacitadas para atuar na prevenção e no combate a incêndios, os grandes incêndios ocorridos no Brasil, a teoria do fogo, elementos do triângulo e tetraedro do fogo, mecanismos de transmissão do calor, os tipos de combustíveis, as fases de um incêndio, as temperaturas dos combustíveis e as classes de incêndios;
No segundo módulo o aluno aprenderá sobre os equipamentos de prevenção e combate a incêndios e suas finalidades de uso; e
No terceiro módulo aprenderá sobre os procedimentos que devem ser adotados para a realização de uma evacuação de emergência correta.
Ao ter conhecimento sobre prevenção e combate a incêndios, esperamos que nossos alunos possam ajudar a disseminar informações para outras pessoas, contribuindo para a conscientização e prevenção de incêndios nas comunidades em que vivem.
target_audience: Técnicos de Segurança do Trabalho, Bombeiros Civis e Trabalhadores em Geral

courses.title: Gestão de Riscos Ambientais e Ocupacionais
courses.bio: Aprenda como gerenciar os riscos ambientais e ocupacionais de forma eficaz
objectives: Identificar, avaliar e compreender os diferentes tipos de riscos ambientais e ocupacionais que podem afetar uma organização.
Os alunos serão capazes de desenvolver e implementar estratégias e medidas preventivas para mitigar esses riscos.
Ao implementar práticas eficazes de gestão de riscos, os alunos poderão reduzir os custos associados a acidentes de trabalho e multas por não conformidades;
Além disso, o curso proporcionará aos alunos uma base sólida para avançar na área de gestão de riscos, saúde e segurança ocupacional.
requirements: Não é necessário nenhum tipo de experiência anterior para fazer este curso.
courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao curso de Gestão de Riscos Ambientais e Ocupacionais!
Este curso foi projetado para promover aos alunos conhecimentos necessários para identificar, avaliar e mitigar riscos ambientais e ocupacionais.
Durante o curso, os alunos mergulharão em uma análise dos diferentes tipos de riscos enfrentados em ambientes laborais, incluindo riscos físicos, biológicos, químicos, ergonômicos e mecânicos. Compreenderão também, a natureza e as fontes desses riscos, bem como os potenciais impactos na saúde dos trabalhadores.
Uma ênfase particular será colocada nas medidas preventivas associadas a cada tipo de risco. Os alunos aprenderão as melhores práticas para implementar medidas preventivas eficazes, desde a modificação de processos de trabalho até o uso adequado de equipamentos de proteção individual (EPIs).
Além disso, com os conhecimentos adquiridos no curso, poderão elaborar ações e estratégias que visem reduzir a probabilidade de ocorrência de acidentes e incidentes prejudiciais.
Ao final do curso, os alunos sairão capacitados não apenas com o conhecimento teórico necessário para entender os riscos ambientais e ocupacionais, mas também com um modelo de inventários de riscos e um modelo de plano de ação para que o aluno consiga planejar a aplicação das medidas preventivas em seus ambientes de trabalho.
Este curso é essencial para profissionais que buscam melhorar a segurança, saúde e sustentabilidade em suas organizações.
Junte-se a nós nesta jornada de aprendizado!
target_audience: Este curso é indicado para qualquer pessoa que deseja aprender sobre como fazer uma gestão de riscos ambientais e ocupacionais com eficiência.

courses.title: Curs de Prim Ajutor Online
courses.bio: Fă diferența! Învață să salvezi o viață!
objectives: Primul ajutor premedical de bază
Cum să salvezi o viață.
Primii 4 pași în acordarea primului ajutor premedical
Cum să pui victima într-o pozitie laterala de siguranță în cazul leșinului sau a altor situații.
Cum să aplici CPR - Resuscitarea Cardio - Pulmonară pe adult, copil, sugar și femeie înscărcinată.
Cum să aplici primul ajutor în cazul hemoragiilor, arsurilor, hipotermiilor, fracturilor, afecțiunilor la inimă și în cazul altor situații.
Despre Înecul cu obiecte și Manevra Hemilich pe adult și sugar.
Cum să ajutăm victimele cu diabet, astm, epilepsie și altele.
Cum să îți creezi propria trusă de prim ajutor de bază.
Cum să comunici eficient cu Serviciul de Ambulanță.

Primii 4 pasi de baza in Primul Ajutor P: Primii 4 pasi de baza in Primul Ajutor Premedical
Clasamentul Leziunilor si Starea de Lesi: Clasament Leziuni si Starea de Lesin + Pozitia Laterala de Siguranta
Inecul cu obiecte si Manevra Heimlich: Inecul cu obiecte si Manevra Heimlich

requirements: Cursanții nu au nevoie de pregătire anterioară, ci doar de dorința de a învăța cum să salveze o viață. Acest curs va acoperi toate informațiile necesare pentru a aplica primul ajutor premedical.
courses.description:
Te-ai gândit vreodată ce ai face dacă cineva s-ar îneca cu mâncare chiar lângă tine? Dacă ar leșina? Si apoi dintr-o dată nu ar mai putea sa respire din cauza asta? Ai știi cum sa reacționezi? Cum să-l ajuți?
Te-ai gândit că poți învăța să salvezi vieți?
Din cursul acesta vei învăța cum să faci diferența dintre viață și moarte! Vei acumula informații și vei dobândi abilitățile necesare pentru a putea interveni într-o situație de urgență. Știind să acorzi primul ajutor premedical, vei putea salva viețile oamenilor din jurul tău și oamenilor apropiați ție, oriunde, oricând!


ACEST CURS ÎȚI VA ARĂTA CUM SĂ:
Aplici manevrele de Resuscitare Cardio-Pulmonară (CPR)
Oprești orice tip de  hemoragie prin bandaje, garou, hemostază
Salvezi oameni de la inecul cu obiecte
Reacționezi când cineva leșină - Poziția Laterală de Siguranță
Imobilizezi o fractură
Tratezi situații cauzate de arsuri sau hipotermie
Comunici eficient cu Serviciul de Ambulanță
Cum să verifici semnele vitale.
Ajuți persoanele care suferă de diferite afecțiuni: accident vascular cerebral,
infarct miocardic acut, diabet, astm, epilepsie
Creezi propria trusă de prim ajutor


Toate acestea livrate pe o cale practică, dinamică și detaliată. La finalul acestui curs, vei obține propriul Certificat de Prim Ajutor Premedical pe care îl poți adăuga chiar acum la CV-ul tău. Vom fi activi pentru a-ți răspunde la orice întrebare ar putea să apară astfel încât să te simți pregătit pentru orice situație.
Nu mai amâna! Oricând poţi fi tu intr-o situaţie de urgenţă!
Fă diferența! Învață să salvezi o viață!
target_audience: Cursul este pentru oricine dorește să învețe cum să facă diferența dintre viață și moarte.
Toate categoriile de vârstă care permit aplicarea primului ajutor premedical.

Akut tıbbi durumlar veya ani hastalıklara müdahale

Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Boğazda Yabancı Cisi: Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Boğazda Yabancı Cisim

Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Cpr / Temel İlk Yardım

Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Kırık ve Çıkıklar: Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Kırık ve Çıkıklar
Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Boğulma ve İlk Yardı: Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Boğulma ve İlk Yardım

requirements: Not tutmak için kağıt ve kalem
courses.description:
Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Temel İlk Yardım Eğitimi
Merhaba ve Çocuk ve Bebeklerde Temel İlk Yardım Eğitimine hoş geldiniz!
Ben Dr. Münir Bilgehan, bu eğitimi oluştururken hem bir sağlık profesyoneli hem de bir eğitimci olarak hedefim, çocuklarımızın ve bebeklerimizin karşılaşabileceği acil durumlarda hızlı ve etkili müdahaleler yapabilmeniz için gerekli bilgi ve becerileri sizlere sunmaktır.
Bu Eğitim Neden Önemli?
Çocuklar ve bebekler, gelişim çağında enerjileri ve meraklarıyla çevrelerini keşfederken, kazalara ve beklenmedik sağlık sorunlarına açık hale gelirler. İşte bu noktada, ilk yardım bilgisi hayat kurtarabilir. Ancak, ilk yardım yalnızca bir kriz anında yapılması gereken müdahalelerden ibaret değildir; bu bilgi, aynı zamanda kendinize ve çevrenize duyduğunuz sorumluluğun bir yansımasıdır.
Bu eğitim, özellikle çocuklarla birebir çalışan veya onların güvenliğinden sorumlu olan herkes için tasarlanmıştır.
Kimler İçin Uygun?
Bu eğitim, başta ebeveynler, anaokulu ve ilkokul çalışanları, ve çocuk bakıcıları olmak üzere, çocuklarla ilgilenen herkes için uygundur.
Ebeveynler: Çocuklarınızın sağlığını korumak ve acil durumlarda en doğru müdahaleyi yapabilmek için bu eğitimi mutlaka tamamlamalısınız.
Anaokulu ve İlkokul Çalışanları: Sınıflar ve oyun alanları, sıkça küçük kazaların meydana geldiği yerlerdir. Bu eğitim, profesyonel yaşamınızda karşılaşabileceğiniz acil durumlar için sizi hazırlayacaktır.
Çocuk Bakıcıları: Kariyerinizde daha yetkin ve profesyonel bir konuma gelmek istiyorsanız, bu eğitim sizin için büyük bir fırsattır. İlk yardım bilgisine sahip olmak, hem güvenilirliğinizi artırır hem de iş fırsatlarınızı genişletir.
Eğitimde Neler Öğreneceksiniz?
Eğitimimizde, çocuklar ve bebekler için özel olarak tasarlanmış ilk yardım uygulamalarını adım adım öğreneceksiniz. Şu konular üzerinde duracağız:
Boğulma durumlarında ilk yardım: Solunum yolunun açılması ve temel yaşam desteği.
Kanama ve yaralanmalarda ilk müdahale: Kanamayı durdurma, kırık ve çıkık yönetimi.
Yanıklar, zehirlenmeler ve suda boğulma: Doğru tekniklerle hızlı ve güvenli müdahale yöntemleri.
Psikolojik destek: Çocukları ve çevrenizdeki insanları sakinleştirme teknikleri.
Bu eğitim aynı zamanda, bilgilerinizi teorik olarak öğrenmekle kalmayıp pratik uygulamalara da odaklanacaktır. Adım adım rehberlik sağlayarak, kendinizi acil durumlarda daha hazırlıklı hissetmenizi sağlayacağız.
Bu Kursun Sizin İçin Sağlayacağı Avantajlar
Hayat Kurtarma Bilgisi: Acil durumlarda bilgi ve müdahale becerilerinizle çocukların hayatını kurtarabilirsiniz.
Profesyonel Gelişim: Özellikle çocuklarla çalışan bireyler için ilk yardım bilgisi, mesleki yeterliliğinizi artırır ve sizi bir adım öne taşır.
Güven Sağlama: Bu bilgiyi edinerek hem kendinize hem de çevrenizdekilere güven verebilirsiniz.
Eğitim süresince, sizi ilk yardım konusunda yetkin hale getirecek bilgilerle donatmayı ve kendinizi güvenle bir kurtarıcı olarak hissetmenizi sağlamayı amaçlıyoruz. Bu eğitimle birlikte, hayat kurtarma becerisini yalnızca bir bilgi değil, aynı zamanda bir sorumluluk olarak da benimseyeceksiniz.
Şimdi, hayati önem taşıyan bu yolculuğa hep birlikte çıkalım. Hazırsanız, eğitime başlayalım!
target_audience: Çocuk ve Bebeklerde ilk yardıma meraklı her insan için uygundur.

courses.title: First Aid & CPR - An in Depth Guide to CPR, AED and Choking
courses.bio: Learn the most important first aid fundamentals to keep your loved ones safe. A practical first aid course for anyone.
objectives: The basics of first aid: How to perform CPR (using the latest guidelines).
How to save a baby from choking
Hands only CPR - we'll learn 2 different methods of CPR and when is it best to use each.
Dealing with situations where we might have people around us that we can use to help us, and how to perform CPR with 2 responders.
How to confidently use an AED (automated external defibrillator)
How to perform the Heimlich maneuver
requirements: Students don't need any previous experience in first aid.
courses.description:
First aid is probably the most underrated life skill there is.
In the US, the average time it takes for an ambulance to arrive is about 8 minutes. The average time it takes for a person, from the moment he experienced a cardiac arrest, until the moment he starts to receive permanent brain damage, is about 4-6.
By doing this math, we can safely assume that in the average case, a person is basically guaranteed to not survive.
Is it a surprise then that only around 10% of people who received a cardiac arrest and didn't receive CPR get lucky?
CPR can more than triple the chances our patients have to survive. And it is probably worth learning if we look at how common it is.
While most people are glued to the TV worried about wars and terrorist attacks, cardiovascular diseases are currently killing around half a million Americans each year, and they are considered the number one cause of death in the world. Almost twice as much as cancer, and around 600 times more than those terrorist attacks we keep being so worried about.
And the worst part about all of this? 80% of cardiac arrests happen within our homes, which means that other people are unlikely to assist us in such a time sensitive situation.
Knowing CPR can literally be the thing that saves our loved ones in an emergency like this. And this course isn't just about CPR.
In First Aid & CPR, you will learn:
How to perform traditional CPR (using the latest guidelines)


How to perform Hands Only CPR


How to perform CPR with multiple responders


How to confidently use an AED (automated external defibrillator)


How to perform the Heimlich maneuver


And all of this will be applicable to adults, as well as children and babies!
By taking the time to educate yourself about these life saving practices, you can keep yourself and your family safe from these horrible disasters, you could walk the street confidently, knowing that you could give a hand if you'll encounter such emergencies, and have your own peace of mind knowing that people can depend on you.
I created this course to help widespread the knowledge of the importance of CPR, and I honestly hope that as many people as possible would educate themselves about it.
I made sure to make this course practical. Without boring slideshows, or impossible to remember medical terms, but with a ton of demonstrations and a grounded world view of what is necessary. I also made sure to make it light and fun (with lots of stupid jokes hidden along the way) to make it easy to digest and fun to watch!
Hopefully you will take the chance to join the people who want to take their fate in their own hands, and you will take action to learn CPR in some way or another. If you do choose to learn with me, I'll make sure you get the best learning experience possible!
This is Must have information for everyone, and it is 30 days money back guaranteed if you're not satisfied.

Hopefully I'll see you inside :D
Uri
target_audience: Caregivers
Parents
Teachers
Hospitality workers
Beginners in the first aid field
Emergency responders who want to refresh their knowledge
People who want to be prepared to save a life
Anyone who is motivated to help others

courses.title: Primeros Socorros Urbanos con RCP y DEA
courses.bio: Este curso está dirigido a personas que deseen formarse en Socorrismo Urbano.
objectives: Identificar y tratar eficazmente las emergencias en adultos, niños y bebés en los primeros minutos críticos hasta la llegada del personal de salud.
Adquirir conocimientos sobre cómo tratar lesiones y enfermedades frecuentes.
Socorrer víctimas cuando el centro de atención más cercano esté a menos de una hora de distancia.
Aprender a salvar vidas.

Resucitación Cardio Pulmonar y Obstrucci: Resucitación Cardio Pulmonar (RCP) y Obstrucción de las Vías Aéreas (OVA)
Emergencias Cardiovasculares, ACV, Desma: Emergencias cardiovasculares: Ataque Cardíaco y Angina de Pecho. ACV.

requirements: Poseer interés en adquirir conocimientos para salvar vidas.
courses.description:
¿Alguna vez estuviste ante una situación grave en la que no supiste cómo actuar o ayudar? En la vida cotidiana, en tu casa o en la vía pública, podés ser testigo de algún incidente o lesión.
Este curso está diseñado para puedas reconocer y tratar eficazmente las emergencias en adultos, niños y bebés desde los primeros minutos críticos hasta la llegada del personal de los servicios de emergencias médicas. Es una guía para obtener los conocimientos sobre cómo tratar lesiones y enfermedades frecuentes cuando el centro de atención más cercano está a menos de una hora de distancia.
Entre el 80% y 90% de las personas, reaccionan incorrectamente ante una emergencia, accidente o enfermedad súbita. ¡Estos conocimientos te permitirán saber cómo reaccionar ante estas situaciones, protegerte y salvar vidas!
A continuación presentamos los contenidos del curso:
Conceptos generales:
Introducción a los Primeros Socorros; socorrer en una emergencia; identificar el problema.
Secuencia de atención del paro cardiorrespiratorio y de la obstrucción de la vía aérea: RCP; desfibrilación externa automática.
Emergencias específicas:
Hemorragias; lesiones en el tejido blando; quemaduras;
Emergencias cardiovasculares; desmayos y escala AVDN; shock.
Lesiones de columna y cabeza; lesiones torácicas, abdominales y pélvicas; lesiones óseas, articulares y musculares.
Intoxicaciones y envenenamientos; picaduras y mordeduras.
Hipertermia e hipotermia; emergencias médicas
Clasificación de víctimas en masa; rescate y traslado de víctimas.
Al finalizar el curso, aprenderás qué observar y cómo actuar en el caso tanto de lesiones como de problemas médicos, el curso de entrenamiento te brindará las competencias necesarias para salvar una vida.
Instructora Natalia Azarko - Matrícula AIDER AR-1/2021-322
target_audience: Público en general y personas interesadas en adquirir conocimientos de socorrismo para brindar asistencia a otra persona durante una emergencia.
Madres, padres, y toda la familia interesada en brindar asistencia al prójimo.
Estudiantes de enfermería o medicina, policias, personal civil, guardafaunas, guardavidas.
Deportistas, corredores y nadadores.

requirements: To enroll in the course, the basic requirements generally include having a minimum educational qualification such as a high school diploma (12th pass) or graduation, depending on the course level. Basic knowledge of healthcare, biology, or hospital operations may be helpful but is not always mandatory. Some courses may require prior experience in healthcare settings, especially if they are advanced or specialized. Additionally, good communication skills, a willingness to learn infection prevention practices, and the ability to follow safety protocols are important. Specific prerequisites, if any, are usually mentioned in the course announcement or brochure.

requirements: No se necesitan requisitos
courses.description:
El Curso de Prevención de Riesgos Laborales es una formación fundamental para cualquier persona que vaya a trabajar, independientemente del sector. Su objetivo principal es proteger la salud y seguridad de los trabajadores, enseñando a identificar los riesgos del entorno laboral y aplicar medidas para evitarlos o controlarlos de manera eficaz.
Durante el curso se aprenden conceptos básicos como qué es un riesgo, un accidente de trabajo o una enfermedad profesional. También se estudian los diferentes tipos de riesgos laborales, como los físicos, químicos, biológicos, ergonómicos, mecánicos o psicosociales, y se explican las medidas preventivas necesarias, como el uso de equipos de protección individual (EPIs), la señalización de seguridad, el orden, la limpieza y la organización del puesto de trabajo.
El curso incluye formación sobre actuación ante emergencias, como incendios, accidentes, cortes eléctricos o derrames, así como primeros auxilios, evacuación de personas y planes de emergencia. Además, se presenta la normativa legal vigente, especialmente la Ley de Prevención de Riesgos Laborales, y se explican los derechos y deberes del trabajador y del empresario dentro del sistema preventivo.
Al finalizar el curso, se entrega un certificado , obligatorio para trabajar en muchos sectores. Esta formación ayuda a crear un entorno de trabajo más seguro y saludable, reduce los accidentes y mejora la calidad laboral y humana de todos los empleados.
target_audience: A toda persona que quiera saber sobre prevención de riesgos laborales

courses.title: Sport First Aid Training
courses.bio: A first aid course for the sports person. Learn how to treat common sporting injuries and illnesses
objectives: Know how to administer lifesaving first aid in a sporting emergency
Learn how to assess an emergency situation
First aid for a casualty who is unresponsive and breathing normally (recovery position)
First aid for a casualty who is unresponsive and NOT breathing normally (CPR)
Treatment for a choking casualty

requirements: This course is suitable for anyone who would like an increased knowledge in first aid.
courses.description:
The training enables a first-aider to give emergency sports first aid to someone who is injured or becomes ill while watching, playing or officiating sport.
First aid is probably one of the most essential life skills that everyone should have. The knowledge of what to do in a first aid emergency can literally be the difference between life and death.
This Sports First Aid Course will cover all the major injuries and illnesses a person could come across when taking part in sport.
The syllabus is:


Aims of First Aid
Dealing with an Emergency
What is in a first aid box
Responsibilities of the First Aider
Priorities of Treatment
Primary Survey
Secondary Survey
Recovery Position
CPR Adult, Child,
Choking Adult, Child
Bleeding and Wounds
Asthma
Diabetes
Head Injuries
Sprains and Strains
Fractures and spinal injuries
Drowning


This course allows you to learn first aid skills in the confront of your own home. The course is completely unique and a totally new concept in First Aid training allowing you to learn these vital skills when it suits you. The course consists of videos that encourage you to practice the skills you are learning. There are numerous handouts you can download and keep for future reference as well as short tests to check your learning after various sections. We will keep you entertained and engaged throughout and will always be on hand to help answer any questions you have - just email info@emtfirstaid.com or use the Q&A section. The course is fully compatible with all computers and mobile devices. You will be able to stop and start as often as you like and on completion you will be able to print your Certificate.
EMT First Aid and Lifeguard Training provides this course for guidance and it is not in any way a substitute for medical advice. EMT First Aid and Lifeguard Training is not responsible or liable for any diagnosis made, or actions taken based on this course.  We strongly recommend that you attend a practical First Aid course to understand what to do in a medical emergency.
Please be aware that the information is correct at the time of filming June 2021 and relates only to UK Resuscitation and First Aid guidelines. If you are outside the UK please refer to your countries guidelines and governing board.

courses.description:
Life has its own ups and downs, must often we all pray and think for the best but in must situations nature shows as that circumstances in life is not always what we want, in such case most often man face adversities, challenges, pain, sorrow and grief. In this world sometimes we become happy and also get sad especially during bad times sometimes you feel like giving up, especially when all your parents are dead or when there is miscarriage of your child, all these and many more put as in great sorrow and pain, but l must say that as human beings we should never give up because the sky is our limit. There are many mechanisms we must adopt to ensure that we cope and come out of all this challenges. These mechanism includes mere sharing of your pain to others or friends because problem shared is problem solved, sometimes you have to let yourself cry because crying will bring the pains out and let you become free, you also need to be kind to yourself because kindness is a great sign of self protection and emotional healer.
The internet and social media is contributing greatly in aid of people who are grief, because the world has become a global village and we are each others keeper. Great social media platforms life Facebook even have policies that strongly assist people who are even dead whilst being their customers and allowed their followers to console their families. l most say that anytime you are grief and the burden is to much for you connect to your professionals to seek help and try self meditation.

courses.title: Curativo de Feridas Simples e Complexas
courses.bio: Curativos ao alcance de todos.
objectives: Auxiliar profissionais da área da saúde e pessoas leigas no cuidados de feridas

Ajudaremos a identificar os tipos de feridas e os melhores produtos que podem ser encontrados nas farmácias e podem ajudar no processo de recuperação
Diferenciaremos cicatriz hipertrófica de queloide, e o que pode ser usado como tentativa de tratamento sem recorrer a procedimento cirúrgico
requirements: Não é necessário ter nenhuma formação na área de saúde para usar os métodos aqui ensinados. Objetivo é que qualquer pessoa possa desmistificar o tratamento de feridas, acelerando o processo de recuperação e diminuir as idas aos hospitais.
courses.description:
O CURSO MAIS COMPLETO E DE FÁCIL ACESSO PARA QUALQUER PESSOA, CRIADO POR UM CIRURGIÃO PLÁSTICO QUE CONVIVE DIARIAMENTE FAZENDO USO DESSAS TÉCNICAS E MELHORANDO A VIDA DE SEUS PACIENTES E DAS PESSOAS EM GERAL.
Esse curso é apenas para profissionais de saúde? A resposta é não. Vendo a dificuldade e a insegurança da maioria das pessoas em fazer curativos simples, resolvemos criar esse curso para ser útil e usado no dia a dia nas mais diversas situações.
No curso será dado noções básicas de cicatrização, anatomia da pele, uso de curativos simples e complexos. Além disso, abordaremos uma pequena noção e diferenciação entre queloide e cicatrização hipertrófica, além de trazer algumas maneiras de melhorar o aspecto dessas cicatrizes e deixa-las menos aparente.
Dividiremos o curso em etapas:
INTRODUÇÃO: aqui abordaremos anatomia da pele e cicatrização, evoluindo para classificação das feridas e como identificar casos de gravidade.
Materiais Fundamentais: na sequência, mostraremos os materiais fundamentais de curativos básicos e curativos mais elaborados que podem ser achados em qualquer farmácia.
TIPOS DE CURATIVOS: falaremos sobre os curativos simples como pro exemplo, uso de gases e micropore, até curativos mais complexos, como placas de alginato, placas de hidrocoloide, entre outras.
TÉCNICAS DE CURATIVOS: a parte mais importante de nosso curso, aqui iremos mostrar as várias técnicas de curativo, além de demonstrar em qual tipo de ferida cada curativo pode e deve ser usado.
Por fim, concluiremos nosso curso, abordando um pouco sobre as feridas cirúrgicas, além de cicatrização hipertróficas, queloide e como melhorar a qualidade desse tipo de lesão.
O mais importante é que esse curso serve tanto para profissionais da área da saúde como para pessoas de qualquer área. Traremos uma linguagem bastante simples e de fácil entendimento para todas as pessoas.
Usaremos figuras reais para facilitar a compressão e o próprio entendimento dos níveis de feridas e quando usar cada tipo específico de curativos.
target_audience: Todas as pessoas em geral, usaremos uma linguagem bastante simples e acessível.

courses.description:
LATEST: Course Updated Again for April 1st, 2023

Your Family Isn't Ready For A Terrorist Attack, Hurricane, Flood, or Tornado! Will They Survive? If The Government Collapsed Tomorrow Can You Feed & Protect Them?
Will They Die Because You Can't Even Survive 48 Hours on Your Own?
Survival and survival training are enjoying a renewed popularity thanks to all the pseudo-reality television shows floating around on the airwaves and digital universe. Many people are beginning to wonder again whether or not they have what it takes to survive in the wilderness or deserts or in an urban environment during the man-made or natural disaster. But contrary to popular belief the act of survival is nothing like what is depicted on television or in movies. While it is possible to generate fire by rubbing sticks together to create friction even the most experienced survivalists cannot make it happen in 3 seconds flat in a snowstorm starting a fire with friction takes a great amount of patience and practice and a willingness to survive above everything else. 30 Day 100% Risk-Free Offer!
Think about these things for a minute ...
What would you do if there was a terrorist attack that caused mass chaos and panic, and all the stores and places of food were closed? Do you want to be the one that is begging your neighbors, friends, or family for help? Do you want to be shipped off to a FEMA “camp?"
Could you provide for your family if severe weather like hurricanes, snowstorms or a flood caused your area to go into a panic -- buying up everything off of stores and creating shortages? What if the stores were empty for weeks… or months?
Could you protect your family if there were massive power outages or rolling blackouts or brownouts -- disrupting electricity and making it nearly impossible to get food from stores or provide heat or energy in your home?
What would happen if the road system was destroyed by floods or other natural disasters in your area? Could you survive without food or other essentials for weeks?
Could you protect and provide for your family if an earthquake hit and the area was devastated?
This survival 101 course will help you test your mental limits and teach you how to get in the proper survival mindset for any survival or emergency situation you might encounter. It will also teach you the basic and necessary physical skills for survival and help you to separate fact from fiction when it comes to what is actually possible in a given survival situation, such as exactly how to find food.
Give yourself a fresh start by enrolling in this life-changing course now. Every moment you delay, you lose out. Simple as that.
“WARNING: Your Survival Could Depend On Your Next Choice"
Try drinking water and build a primitive shelter and fire so that you can survive for a  minimum of 48 hours until you can either find help (referred to as a self-rescue) or be found by rescuers (assisted rescue). Although the minimum is 48 hours, suggested survival time until a rescue can be affected.
It could be as little as little as a few hours or as much as  several weeks, until rescue workers may be able to rescue you. It all  depends on the climate, the weather environment and a whole host of  other factors.
Click the "Take This Course" button, on the top right because every hour you delay is jeopardizing not only your Safety but the Safety of Those You love!!!...Scroll up and Enroll Now!
So the survival 101 course will teach you to take the  basic survival skills that you have learned and perfected one step  further and survive longer than 48 hours. If absolutely necessary on  limited resources and your basic fundamental survival skills to not only  survive but thrive in whatever survival scenario you find yourself in.
P.S. We're living in some of the craziest times in history and many experts agree that it's not a matter of “if" but “when" you will face an emergency that is beyond what you and your family have prepared for. There's a famous truism among instructors getting soldiers ready for war.“When the bullets start flying, you WON'T rise to the occasion. You will perform half as well as you did during your best training."
As with all my courses:
The initial low price will increase shortly - the course is currently $200, but will next increase to $250
You have unlimited lifetime access at no extra costs, ever
All future additional lectures, bonuses, etc in this course are always free
There's an unconditional, never any questions asked full 30 day money-back-in-full guarantee
My help is always available to you if you get stuck or have a question - my support is legendary in Udemy
30 Day 100% Risk Free Offer!

courses.description:
The purpose of this class is to teach you the safest and most effective way to move objects in the course of your job duties. Lifting objects improperly can have both short-term and long-term effects on your health and mobility, especially when older.
This training will help anyone who must lift objects at work, but it will be particularly applicable for workers who move heavier items on a regular basis, such as warehouse workers.
This course will teach you the best safety practices for material handling including maintaining form through a lift, identifying travel paths in advance, using lifting apparatus, and knowing when you need help.
This course is intended to provide safety and health training in compliance with Federal OSHA and State OSHA training requirements such as Cal OSHA. If you have questions, you may ask our instructors, and they will respond to you within a short period of time, as outlined by OSHA standards.
The training will cover all the required elements outlined in Federal and State OSHA standards to ensure that your training meets or exceed the minimum required training. If your training has a time requirement, the content of the training has been designed to meet that requirement.
The training is developed by our in-house, real trainers with twenty years of experience working in the field and with real crews and is trusted by public agencies throughout California.
There are no prerequisites required for this course. The course will walk you through all the elements required to be successful and complete any questions or quizzes or testing that may be required.

courses.title: ACLS: Core ECG Rhythms and Interpretations
courses.bio: Learn core ACLS rhythms entirely online! Created by physicians and adheres to the latest ILCOR Standards and Guidelines.
requirements: Healthcare background is helpful but not required
No special equipment or materials required
courses.description:
This ACLS: Core ECG Rhythms and Interpretations course will teach participants how to recognize and interpret the 15 core Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) ECG rhythms. It will also overview normal heart anatomy and physiology. Understanding normal cardiac anatomy and physiology is an important component of performing ACLS. Understanding the normal electrical function of the heart will make it easy to understand abnormal functions.
Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) will prepare you to respond to life-threatening emergencies in the adult population with advanced interventions. Designed by experienced providers in conjunction with board-certified physicians and veteran ACLS instructors, this course is an engaging and comprehensive approach to reviewing the core rhythms of ACLS practice. The course reviews the pathophysiology, defining criteria and ECG features, clinical manifestations, common etiologies, and ECG presentation for the 15 core rhythms, including ventricular fibrillation, accessory-mediated supraventricular tachycardia, and several atrioventricular blocks. This ACLS course is based on the latest guidelines, which focus on doing several tasks simultaneously with a group process that enables efficiency and minimizes errors.
The course package includes:
- ACLS Supplemental Study Aids
- ACLS Lectures and Video Presentations
- ACLS Supplemental Skills Training Videos
Note: This course is for Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) training.

Medical Students
Nursing and Allied Health Students
Emergency Responders

courses.bio: Diseño, Instalación, Inspección, Mantenimiento, Prueba y Uso de Extintores Portátiles para Protección contra Incendios
objectives: Conceptos sobre el fuego, la clasificación y los riesgos a considerar para la extinción apropiada.
Conceptos y clasificación de los extintores portátiles.

Ubicar, interpretar y aplicar de manera correcta los requisitos presentados en la NFPA 10.
Como y cuando colocar los diferentes tipos de extintores portátiles.
Conocer el funcionamiento de un Extintor Portátil
Utilizar correctamente un Extintor Portátil ante un incendio
Procedimientos de inspección, mantenimiento y recarga de los extintores portátiles
Cálculos y prácticas de diseño.
Documentación mínima requerida.
requirements: No existen requisitos previos para poder realizar este curso.
Muchas ganas de aprender
courses.description:
El curso más completo sobre Extintores Portatiles si buscas Certificarte en Uso de Extintores o certificación NFPA 10
Sabías que el 60% de los incidentes de incendio que se producen, no hubo necesidad de avisar al cuerpo de bomberos al contar con un extintor presente, accesible y en buenas condiciones.
Los extintores pueden apagar eficazmente el 80% de los incendios.
Cada año solo en Estados Unidos, casi 2 millones de incendios se resuelven totalmente con un extintor.
Esto se debe a que los extintores son la primera línea de defensa ante un incidente de incendio este puede salvar vidas y propiedades apagando un fuego controlado o conteniéndolo hasta que lleguen los bomberos. Ahora, dado que el fuego crece y se propaga rápidamente, la prioridad nº 1 para los ocupantes es salir sanos y salvos.
Este curso te enseña la adecuada selección y uso seguro de extintores portátiles como respuesta a un fuego incipiente, así como las habilidades técnicas para el mantenimiento tanto preventivo como correctivo. De igual manera, conocerás sobre los procedimientos de inspección, recarga y pruebas hidrostáticas que se les practican. Encontraras videos explicativos, diagramas de flujo de trabajo, formularios, prácticas de diseño y todo basado en la norma internacional NFPA 10.
Esta diseñado para estudiantes principiantes como profesionales con un conocimiento previo en sistemas de protección contra incendios; para personal de operaciones o de oficina que requiere conocimiento para manejar adecuadamente un extintor portatil o cualquier persona que busca prepararse ante un evento de incendio.
El curso utiliza una metodología teorico/practico por lo que estaremos trabajando en conjunto en un diseño de una ocupación, donde tendremos que realizar cálculos y ubicar los extintores en base a lo que nos dicta la norma NFPA 10; además te hemos dejado un ejercicio de diseño que tendras que trabajar por tu cuenta.
Al final de este curso obtendrás una mejora cualitativa en tus habilidades y experiencia; tendrás suficiente conocimiento para aplicar en el trabajo, vida o para ejercer de forma independiente.

courses.title: Basics of Industrial Hygiene & Occupational Health
courses.bio: Learn Industrial Hgyiene Basics, health hazards & effects, dose-response, hierarchy of control & important definitions
objectives: Basic concepts of Industrial Hygiene
Factors affecting exposures
Differentiate Safety Hazards with Health Hazards
Routes of entry & types of dusts
Dose-Response Concept
Risk-Hazard-Exposure Concept
Hierarchy of Control

Basics of Industrial Hygiene: Lecture 3 : Air Contaminants & Route of Entry
Lecture 4 : Dose-Response, Risk-Hazard-Exposure & Factors affecting exposures

requirements: An inquisitive mind
A willingness to learn
courses.description:
Health and Safety are the priorities within industrial setup as well as in our day-to-day life.  Industrial Hygiene or Occupational Health as widely known is essential to protect employees with various illnesses.  Industrial Hygiene also helps employers to ensure providing healthy workplace to the employees.  With years of working at a workplace, Industrial Hygiene ensures, employees retire with healthy body and mind.


Through this course you will be able to understand the concept of Industrial Hygiene and safety or occupational health and safety in practical way.  This course will assist you to implement Basic Industrial Hygiene Program within your workplace.  It will help you identify various health hazards and also their health effects.


This course also provides you with various worksheets which you will be appropriately using during practical sessions, while studying the concept.  You will also be able to identify exposure routes of entry and mitigate it through hierarchy of controls.  The Industrial Hygiene Qualitative Assessment program will help you to prioritize the areas with high health risk.  HSE or EHS professionals will benefit greatly from this course apart from other Safety courses.


Useful for the professionals from any type of industries or industrial background and also to non-industrial background students and / or professionals.


Who will benefit from this course:


Industrial Professionals
Health & Safety Students
Health & Safety Professionals (HSE or EHS Professionals)
Professionals appearing for Health & Safety competitive exams like NEBOSH / PGDIS, etc.

courses.title: Health and Safety Risk Management
courses.bio: A Practical Approach to Hazard Identification, Risk Assessment and Control (HIRAC)
objectives: Identify Workplace Hazards – Recognize physical, chemical, biological, ergonomic, psychosocial and other hazards present in various work environments.
Conduct Risk Assessments – Apply systematic approaches to assess risks associated with identified hazards using matrix method.
Implement Risk Control Measures – Develop and implement appropriate control measures using the hierarchy of controls to mitigate workplace risks.
Document and Review HIRAC Processes – Create comprehensive risk assessment reports and review them periodically or after significant changes in the workplace

Understand the Concepts and Importance o: Generic, Specific and Dynamic risk assessments
Risk Assessment for Specific Type of Risk
Identify who may be harmed and how: Identify Groups of People Who May be at Risk (Step 2 of risk assessment)
Identifying At-Risk Groups in a HIRAC
Evaluate the Risk and Decide on Precauti: Preparing to Carry Out Risk Assessment
Qualitative, Semi Quantitative & Quantitative Risk Assessment
Risk Evaluation – Likelihood x Consequences (Step 3 of risk assessment)
Semi Quantitative Risk Assessment – Risk Levels EXAMPLE
Risk Evaluation – Hazard Rating Number (HRN) (Step 3 of risk assessment)
Understanding the Hierarchy of Risk Control
Review HIRAC Processes and Update as req: Risk Assessment Review (Step 5 of risk assessment)

requirements: There is no pre-requisite as such but its beneficial if the participants have:
Workplace Experience – At least some experience in an industrial, construction, or office environment, preferably in an HSE role.
Understanding of Workplace Processes – Familiarity with operational workflows and workplace procedures.
Basic Knowledge of OHS Principles – Understanding of general occupational health and safety concepts.
Literacy and Numeracy Skills – Ability to read, interpret, and complete OHS documentation and perform basic risk calculations.
courses.description:
Workplace safety is a top priority in any industry, and understanding how to effectively identify, evaluate, and control hazards is essential for ensuring a safe and compliant work environment. Our course, "Mastering the H&S Risk Management: A Practical Approach to HIRAC," is designed to provide safety professionals, managers, supervisors, and anyone responsible for workplace health and safety with the essential knowledge and skills needed to proactively manage risks.
This comprehensive course takes a step-by-step approach to Hazard Identification, Risk Assessment, and Control (HIRAC), guiding learners through the entire process with practical tools, real-world case studies, and interactive exercises. You will gain a deep understanding of hazard recognition techniques, risk assessment methodologies, and the implementation of effective control measures to reduce workplace accidents and ensure compliance with occupational health and safety regulations.
This is not just another course. Here you will learn basics as well as advanced risk management strategies including 5 factors risk assessment, risk nomograms and more.
By the end of this course, you will be equipped with proven strategies to assess workplace hazards, implement control measures, and foster a culture of continuous health and safety improvement. Whether you're looking to strengthen your OHS expertise, enhance your organization's risk management framework, or comply with regulatory requirements, this course provides the knowledge and confidence to lead the way.
Enroll now to take control of workplace safety and create a safer, hazard-free environment!
Includes downloadable templates and resources for immediate application.
target_audience: HSE Officers and Supervisors – Responsible for workplace safety and risk management.
Managers and Team Leaders – Overseeing health and safety within their teams or departments.
HSE Consultants and Auditors – Providing advisory or auditing services related to workplace safety.
Employees in High-Risk Industries – Workers in construction, manufacturing, oil and gas, and other sectors exposed to hazardous environments.
Students/Graduates in OHS Programs – Seeking practical knowledge and skills in hazard identification and risk assessment.

Aplicar medidas preventivas para minimizar el riesgo de incendio, fomentando prácticas seguras en el uso de materiales y equipos.
Actuar correctamente ante un incendio, siguiendo procedimientos de evacuación y uso adecuado de extintores para una respuesta rápida y efectiva.
Conocer la normativa OSHA relacionada

Clasificación del fuego y tipos de extin: Clasificación del fuego y tipos de extintores
Uso de extintores y actuación ante incen: Uso de extintores y actuación ante incendios

requirements: No es necesario contar con conocimientos previos específicos.
courses.description:
En un mundo donde la seguridad es clave, este curso de Prevención y Extinción de Incendios en Entornos Educativos y Administrativos es una herramienta esencial para educadores, administradores y todo aquel que desee mantener su espacio seguro.
Los incendios pueden ocurrir en cualquier momento y lugar. Estar preparado no solo puede salvar vidas, sino también minimizar daños y garantizar la continuidad de las actividades. A lo largo de este curso, aprenderás a identificar riesgos de incendio, aplicar medidas preventivas y actuar de manera eficaz en caso de emergencia.
• Conocerás las clases de fuego (A, B, C, D y K) y cómo extinguirlas correctamente.
• Aprenderás a seleccionar y utilizar extintores de agua, polvo químico, CO₂ y más.
• Implementarás estrategias para prevenir incendios y reducir riesgos en tu entorno.
• Comprenderás la importancia de la evacuación segura y los protocolos de respuesta ante emergencias.
El curso incluye módulos interactivos, ejemplos prácticos, exámenes para validar el aprendizaje y material de apoyo para brindarte no solo conocimientos teóricos, sino también la confianza necesaria para actuar con seguridad.
No dejes la seguridad al azar. Protege tu entorno y actúa con confianza ante un incendio.
¡Inscríbete hoy y haz de tu espacio un lugar más seguro para todos!
target_audience: Personal administrativo que trabaja en oficinas, instituciones educativas o entornos similares, interesados en mejorar su conocimiento sobre la prevención y actuación ante incendios.
Docentes y personal educativo, tanto de escuelas primarias como secundarias, que desean conocer las mejores prácticas para prevenir y manejar situaciones de incendio en sus centros de trabajo.
Cualquier persona interesada en mejorar sus habilidades para identificar riesgos de incendio, usar correctamente los extintores y actuar de manera adecuada ante una emergencia.

courses.bio: Docteur en Pharmacie et Formatrice en Secourisme, je vous enseigne les méthodes clés pour réagir en cas d'urgence.
objectives: Importance de la préparation en cas de situation d'urgence

Fournir des premiers soins en attendant l'arrivée de l'aide professionnelle dans diverses situations d'urgence

requirements: Aucune compétences spécifiques nécessaires
Les étudiants n'ont pas besoin de posséder une expérience préalable en premiers secours.
Répartir sur plusieurs sessions pour une meilleure assimilation.
courses.description:
Pourquoi suivre ma formation en gestes de secours ?
Acquérir les compétences de premiers secours, c'est se donner les moyens de sauver des vies. Les urgences médicales peuvent survenir à tout moment, et savoir réagir rapidement peut faire toute la différence.


Ma formation est pensée pour être accessible à tous, particuliers comme professionnels, avec une méthode interactive et engageante.
Vous apprendrez à réagir efficacement face à une situation critique. À travers des jeux, des quiz et des mises en situation, vous développerez des réflexes essentiels pour identifier les dangers, reconnaître une urgence et alerter les secours.


Vous pourrez vous entraîner chez vous grâce à des exercices pratiques et découvrir des techniques pour gérer les brûlures, les chutes, l’étouffement, et même intervenir en cas de mort subite du nourrisson.


En rejoignant ma formation, vous bénéficierez d'un accès direct à ma messagerie personnelle, où je répondrai à toutes vos interrogations de manière personnalisée. En tant que Docteur en Pharmacie, Enseignante en Pharmacologie à l'université, Formatrice aux Gestes de Premiers Secours et Formatrice Sauveteur Secouriste du Travail en entreprise , je vous accompagnerai tout au long de votre apprentissage.


Ne laissez pas le hasard décider de l'issue d'une urgence. Investissez en vous, formez-vous, et soyez prêt à faire la différence. Rejoignez ma formation dès maintenant pour être prêt à agir.

courses.title: Clean Your Wound Correctly
courses.bio: For caregivers and clinicians
objectives: Learn to how clean properly
Which cleansers to use and avoid
Signs of infection
When it's time to change cleaning methods
requirements: For clients with wounds and caregivers
courses.description:
Open wounds are a portal of infection. The longer a wound stays open, the worse the resulting scar will be.
Cleaning a wound is the first step in caring for a wound. Appropriate cleaning is a critical, often overlooked step. In many instances, people use cytoxic cleansers that can cause more harm than good and slow the entire process.


Looking at the drugstore shelves may confuse you about what you should be using.


During this course, you can prepare to learn why we clean wounds a certain way, which solutions are best to use and what to avoid. Learn the cleaning method and see video examples of how to do it. Learners will identify early signs of infection to prevent further issues that may slow down or prevent you from healing.


The information presented can be used for scaps, surgical sites, pressure injuries and lower leg wounds.
Of course you should be following your Doctor's Recommendations but you may have been given limited information with an assumption that you know how to do it properly.


This course was initially designed for use by Physical Therapists for continuing education hours; however, anyone can care for a wound on themselves and others.


Basic wound care knowledge taught by a Certified Wound Specialist


For personalized recommendations, consider looking at Better Wounds online for video consultations.
target_audience: Anyone managing a with a post-op or pressure issue at home.
Clinicians like Physical Therapist may be eligible for CEU credits

A Importância Vital do Curso de Primeiros Socorros online


A Importância Vital do Curso de Primeiros Socorros online: Salvando Vidas com Conhecimento e Prontidão
Em situações de emergência, onde cada segundo conta, o conhecimento em primeiros socorros pode ser a diferença entre a vida e a morte.
O curso de primeiros socorros é uma ferramenta indispensável que capacita indivíduos a oferecer assistência imediata e adequada a alguém que esteja ferido ou doente. Essa habilidade vai muito além de ser apenas um conhecimento útil; ela é uma responsabilidade social e um poderoso instrumento para preservar vidas.
A seguir, exploraremos a importância inestimável desse curso em diferentes aspectos da vida cotidiana e em situações de crise.


Prevenção e Prontidão


O curso de primeiros socorros não se limita apenas a ensinar como lidar com acidentes, mas também a preveni-los. Ele oferece orientações sobre como identificar e minimizar riscos em ambientes domésticos, escolas, locais de trabalho e espaços públicos.
Ao adquirir esse conhecimento, os participantes aprendem a manter a calma diante de emergências, avaliar situações críticas e agir de forma rápida e eficaz.


Salvando Vidas
Claro, os primeiros socorros são um conhecimento fundamental que todos deveriam ter.
Os primeiros socorros são habilidades específicas que podem fazer uma diferença crucial em situações de emergência. Essa é a verdadeira Importância do Curso de Primeiros Socorros: Salvando Vidas com Conhecimento Avançado

objectives: Learn the basics of hearing conservation, including what levels of sound can cause hearing loss

Increase your workplace safety and health skill set
Get certified and become more valuable in the workforce

Hearing Protectors: How to Select the Proper Protector

requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
The purpose of this course is to teach you how to protect yourself from hearing loss due to excessive noise levels in the workplace.
It is common for workers to suffer hearing loss from being subjected to constant or irregular noise at the job site, especially for public works employees and construction workers.
You must be aware of safety standards for hearing conservation, what types of protectors are available to you, and what rights and protections you have under state and federal law.
This course is intended to provide safety and health training in compliance with Federal OSHA and State OSHA training requirements such as Cal OSHA. If you have questions, you may ask our instructors, and they will respond to you within a short period of time, as outlined by OSHA standards.
The training will cover all the required elements outlined in Federal and State OSHA standards to ensure that your training meets or exceed the minimum required training. If your training has a time requirement, the content of the training has been designed to meet that requirement.
The training is developed by our in-house, real trainers with twenty years of experience working in the field and with real crews. It is trusted by public agencies throughout California.
There are no prerequisites required for this course. The course will walk you through all the elements needed to be successful and complete any questions or quizzes, or testing that may be required.
target_audience: Anyone who works in environments with excessive noise or works with tools producing significant and potentially damaging levels of sound.

courses.bio: Building a Safer, Healthier Workplace

Ergonomic Control Methods: Hazards and Solutions - Reaching above the head/shoulders
Hazards and Solutions - Localized pressure on body part
Hazards and Solutions - Awkward body postures

requirements: A basic understanding of workplace environments and common tasks.
Proficiency in understanding English.

courses.description:
Tired of seeing preventable aches, pains, and injuries in your workplace? They're not just "part of the job"; they're a sign that your ergonomics need help. This dynamic, practical course is your essential guide to building a safer, healthier, and more productive work environment for everyone.
We'll move beyond theory and give you the tools you need to make a real impact. You'll learn to spot the early warning signs of musculoskeletal disorders (MSDs) like carpal tunnel and back strain, and uncover the hidden risk factors causing them; from repetitive tasks to poorly designed workstations.
Most importantly, you'll master proven strategies to fix these problems. Discover how to implement simple, cost-effective solutions using OSHA-aligned principles, from engineering controls like adjustable equipment to powerful administrative changes. We'll teach you how to conduct a basic risk assessment, promote early reporting, and foster a culture of safety that protects both your people and your bottom line.
Stop reacting to injuries and start preventing them. Enroll today and gain the confidence to transform your workplace into a model of comfort, efficiency, and well-being.
Learning outcomes:
· Explain workplace ergonomics its importance, and roles of employer and employee.
· Identify common work-related musculoskeletal disorders (MSDs).
· Recognize risk factors associated with work-related MSDs.
· Select appropriate ergonomic control methods to eliminate or reduce identified risk factors for MSDs.

courses.title: OSHA: Mastering Workplace Safety Training
courses.bio: A Guide to OSHA Regulations, Hazard Assessment, and Workplace Safety Protocols
objectives: Identify workplace hazards and assess risks, applying OSHA standards for comprehensive safety management.
Demonstrate proficiency in selecting, using, and maintaining Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) for various workplace scenarios.
Implement Lockout/Tagout (LOTO) procedures effectively, reducing the risk of accidents during equipment maintenance.
Develop a thorough understanding of fire prevention, emergency planning, and evacuation procedures to enhance workplace safety.
requirements: No prerequisites are required. This course is designed for learners of all levels. Beginners and professionals alike can benefit from this comprehensive guide to workplace safety. All you need is a curiosity about creating a safer work environment.
courses.description:
Welcome to "OSHA: Mastering Workplace Safety Training" a comprehensive course designed to empower individuals with the knowledge and skills needed to ensure a safe and compliant work environment. In this course, we go beyond the basics, providing a deep dive into key areas that are critical for workplace safety.


Why Choose Our Course?
This course provides practical insights and hands-on guidance to help you confidently manage workplace safety challenges. We cover everything from OSHA’s regulatory framework to detailed safety program development. Whether you're responsible for safety compliance or want to foster a culture of awareness, this course equips you with the tools to protect your team and workplace.
You’ll explore OSHA’s most critical standards and learn how to apply them effectively across industries. Our balanced approach combines regulatory knowledge with actionable strategies, ensuring you’re prepared for real-life scenarios and inspections.
1. In-Depth Understanding of Hazard Identification and Risk Management: Start by unraveling the complexities of hazard identification and risk management. From defining hazards and risks to conducting thorough workplace inspections, develop a keen eye for potential dangers.
2. Proficiency in Personal Protective Equipment (PPE): No safety program is complete without a comprehensive understanding of PPE. This course not only covers the requirements and types of PPE but goes further to teach the proper use, maintenance, and inspection of different protective equipment.
3. Lockout/Tagout Procedures for Equipment Safety: Understanding the importance of Lockout/Tagout (LOTO) procedures is crucial in preventing accidents during equipment maintenance. This course takes you through the intricacies of LOTO, covering procedures, devices, and comprehensive training.
4. Fire Hazard Prevention and Emergency Planning: Navigate the complexities of fire hazards with a dedicated module on prevention and emergency planning. Identify potential fire hazards, master fire prevention strategies, and develop effective emergency evacuation procedures. Learn about different types of fire extinguishers and their appropriate use, ensuring you are well-prepared for any fire-related scenario.
5. Holistic Approach to Workplace Safety: This course emphasizes a holistic approach to workplace safety. Whether you're a safety professional, manager, or employee, gain practical insights into creating a secure work environment. This includes addressing electrical hazards, fall hazards, machine hazards, and more.
Through engaging lectures, practical examples, and clear instructions, you will:
Identify workplace hazards and conduct effective inspections
Choose and maintain the right PPE for various risks
Apply Lockout/Tagout procedures to safeguard machinery
Develop emergency plans that save lives and property
Manage chemical safety and hazard communication programs
By the end, you’ll confidently navigate OSHA regulations and implement comprehensive safety measures that protect workers and reduce incidents.
Enroll today and become a workplace safety champion who transforms compliance into proactive prevention!
target_audience: Workplace Safety Professionals
Managers and Supervisors
Employees across industries
Individuals seeking OSHA compliance knowledge
Safety enthusiasts and those responsible for fostering a secure work environment

courses.description:
The purpose of this training is to help employees understand their rights under OSHA hazard communication regulations and help place them in a position to protect themselves from chemical hazards in the workplace. This training will empower students to look for the chemical signal words, pictograms, labels, and safety data sheet and inventory management their employer should be utilizing to ensure they are informed of the hazards of materials in their workplace. The materials in this training can also be applied to materials purchased at home, as manufacturer's are required to comply with hazard communication, safety data sheets, and the globally harmonized system. The training can also be used by employers to identify the major components and understand how to address compliance with the hazard communication regulation in their workplaces. Students can reach out to me with any questions regarding health and safety compliance.

Disclaimer: this training alone does not designate an employer as fully compliant with their duty to comply with the hazard communication regulation. Employers seeking hazard communication compliance with the hazard communication awareness can use this training content, but should also ensure that they train employees on the hazards, safety data sheets, and applicable chemical uses specific to their workplace.

courses.description:
This ISO 14001:2015 Practice Test is designed for professionals, auditors, consultants, and students who want to assess and strengthen their knowledge of the Environmental Management System (EMS) standard.
With over 100+ multiple-choice questions (MCQs) including real-world case scenarios, this practice test will help you:


Understand the structure and requirements of ISO 14001:2015
Evaluate your readiness for internal or external audits
Identify knowledge gaps related to EMS implementation, compliance, and continual improvement
Practice clause-based questions aligned with ISO 14001’s core themes


The test covers all key clauses, including:


Context of the organization
Leadership and planning
Environmental aspects and risks
Operational control and emergency preparedness
Internal audit, compliance evaluation, and management review


Every item is accompanied by a detailed explanation and direct clause reference, turning each answer review into an on-the-spot micro-lesson. This transforms the practice test from a simple score-tracker into a reusable learning resource.
Whether you are pursuing an EMS role, refreshing skills, or helping your organization achieve or maintain ISO 14001 certification, these timed quizzes provide the feedback loop you need. Attempt, review, learn, and improve—whenever you like, as often as you need—until ISO 14001 competence feels second nature.
Attempt, review, learn, and improve — as many times as you like!

courses.description:
Why is baby first aid important?
Many parents are worried about different conditions that could affect their baby. If you're a parent, grandparent, a carer or if you work with babies, learning baby first aid will give you confidence to save a life when it really counts.
Our baby first aid course teaches simple, lifesaving skills. First aid topics are taught in line with babies’ developmental stages, helping to reassure parents and prepare them for the first year and beyond.
We cover a whole range of different conditions and techniques; from knowing how to put an infant in the recovery position if they are unresponsive but breathing, to giving cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) if they’re not.
What will you learn?
Primary survey
What to do if your baby is choking
What to do if your baby is unresponsive
What to do if your baby has a seizure
What to do if your baby isn’t breathing
What are the requirements?
This course is suitable for parents, grandparents and anyone who spends time looking after babies.
Who are St John Ambulance?
St John Ambulance is the UK’s leading first aid charity.
Our volunteers provide first aid in their communities, keeping people safe at events, and working alongside the NHS in response to 999 calls. We’re also always campaigning to raise awareness of first aid and directly educate the public.
St John Ambulance training
Every year, more than 400,000 people learn how to save a life through our training programmes, including hundreds of thousands of young people.
We’re the leading provider of workplace training, reaching over 250,000 people a year and we also teach in the community, giving people access to important skills they wouldn’t otherwise get the chance to learn.
target_audience: Anyone who spends time with babies or children under the age of one and wishes to have a knowledge of first aid

courses.title: PEBC Evaluating Examination: 6 Practice Tests : 450+ Q&A
courses.bio: Pass Pharmacy Examining Board of Canada exam with Confidence: 6 Practice Test with Explanations Covering all Key Topics
courses.description:
The PEBC Evaluating Examination: 6 Practice Tests course is an expertly designed resource tailored for candidates preparing for the Pharmacy Examining Board of Canada (PEBC) Evaluating Examination. This comprehensive course includes six full-length, high-quality practice tests that reflect the structure, difficulty level, and topic distribution of the actual exam. It is ideal for international pharmacy graduates aiming to meet Canadian standards and achieve licensure.


This course provides rigorous and realistic assessments across the core domains tested in the PEBC Evaluating Examination, starting with
Basic Pharmaceutical Sciences (25%).


You'll be tested on Pharmacology, including drug-receptor interactions, dose-response relationships, and the mechanism of action for major drug classes, as well as autonomic, CNS, cardiovascular, and endocrine pharmacology.


In Medicinal Chemistry, you will analyze structure-activity relationships (SAR), the role of functional groups in pharmacokinetics and dynamics, and common drug metabolism pathways.
Biochemistry content includes enzyme kinetics, metabolic pathways such as glycolysis and the TCA cycle, and the role of vitamins, coenzymes, and acid-base balance.
Microbiology and Immunology coverage includes bacterial classification, antimicrobial mechanisms, vaccine response types, and recognition of fungal, viral, and parasitic pathogens.
In Pharmaceutics, you’ll review dosage forms, routes of administration, bioavailability concepts, and advanced drug delivery systems like liposomes and transdermal patches.


The next core section is Pharmacy Practice (55%),


which comprises the largest share of the exam.


In Clinical Therapeutics, questions simulate real-life scenarios across cardiovascular, respiratory, gastrointestinal, CNS, and endocrine disorders, emphasizing drug of choice, treatment guidelines, and patient-specific recommendations.
You'll also tackle Dosage Calculations, covering concentration, dilution, pediatric and renal dose adjustments, and IV infusion math.
The Prescription Analysis component tests your skills in evaluating prescription legality, identifying errors, contraindications, and drug interactions.
In Compounding, expect questions on weighing and mixing techniques, formulation stability, and extemporaneous preparation accuracy.
Drug Information and Counseling focuses on effective patient communication, counseling on dosage and side effects, OTC product selection, and culturally sensitive care delivery.


The final section,
Social, Behavioral, and Administrative Sciences (20%), builds your awareness of the broader healthcare environment.
In Health Systems & Policies, you’ll explore the structure of the Canadian healthcare system, the role of provincial regulatory bodies, and health insurance models.


The Ethics & Legal Framework section assesses your understanding of professional conduct, confidentiality, informed consent, and the ethical responsibilities of pharmacy practice.
Communication & Public Health challenges your ability to communicate with patients and professionals, promote health, prevent disease, and manage sensitive public health issues such as HIV, pregnancy, or addiction.
Management & Economics questions examine pharmacy inventory management, workflow optimization, and cost-effectiveness principles in pharmaceutical care.
Each practice test includes detailed answer explanations that not only clarify the correct choice but also reinforce important concepts and help identify areas that require improvement. The format, content, and level of difficulty are aligned with the official PEBC Evaluating Exam blueprint, ensuring you are well-prepared for test day.


Whether you’re in the early stages of your preparation or doing a final review before your exam, this course will sharpen your knowledge, boost your confidence, and significantly improve your readiness to succeed in your journey toward becoming a licensed pharmacist in Canada.
target_audience: International pharmacy graduates preparing for PEBC licensure in Canada.
Candidates seeking structured PEBC Evaluating Exam practice.
Anyone wanting to assess their readiness through full-length mock exams.

This course covers essential PPE measures, including hearing conservation, eye and face protection, hand safety, and respiratory protection. Each microlesson offers actionable skills for immediate application, enhancing your ability to respond to emergencies confidently and competently.
