FIRE FIGHTING DESIGN AUTOMATIC GAS SYSTE: FIRE FIGHTING DESIGN AUTOMATIC GAS SYSTEM
FIRE FIGHTING DESIGN AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER: FIRE FIGHTING DESIGN AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER SYSTEM

requirements: LAPTOP
AUTOCAD PROGRAM
courses.description:
- Fire Definition, Causes & How to suppress.
- Codes & Standards for Fire fighting design &
installation.


- Occupancy Hazards Classifications.


- Types of Building Occupancies.


- Manual Fire fighting Systems ( Landing Valves – Hydrants – Portable Extinguishers )
- Automatic Gas Suppression System (Co2 – FM200).
- SPRINKLER SYSTEM


1. Sprinkler Floor Control Valve (Zone Control Unit).


2. Fire Water Sprinkler Classification.


3. Water Sprinkler Distribution.


4. Sprinkler systems


A - Wet Pipe Sprinkler System.
B - Dry Pipe Sprinkler System.
C - Pre-action Sprinkler System.
D - Deluge Sprinkler System.


- Main Components of Fire fighting Water Network.
A - Water Source & Pumping Station.
B - Pipe Types & Testing of pipes.
C - Valves at Fire Water Network.


- Hydraulic Calculation using :
(FIRE ELITE SOFTWARE)
Automatic Sprinkler Systems
Time is essential in the control of fire. Automatic sprinkler systems are one of the most reliable methods available for controlling fires. Today's automatic fire sprinkler systems offer state of the art protection of life and property from the effects of fire. Sprinkler heads are now available which are twenty times more sensitive to fire than they were ten years ago.
A sprinkler head is really an automatic (open once only) tap. The sprinkler head is connected to a pressurised water system. When the fire heats up the sprinkler head, it opens at a pre-set temperature, thus allowing pressurised water to be sprayed both down onto the fire and also up to cool the hot smoky layer and the building structure above the fire. This spray also wets combustible material in the vicinity of the fire, making it difficult to ignite, thereby slowing down or preventing fire spread and growth.
When a sprinkler head operates, the water pressure in the system drops, activating an alarm which often automatically calls the fire service via a telephone connection.
Some people say sprinklers cause a lot of water damage. As has been explained, only those sprinkler heads heated by the fire operate; all sprinklers in a building do not operate at once. Usually non-fire water damage only occurs if the occupants carelessly damage the system. Firefighters use much more water than a sprinkler system. The combined damage from a fire and the water used by firefighters dramatically exceeds that likely from a properly installed sprinkler system.
Because, historically, complete extinguishment of fires has not been achieved, it is traditional to consider that sprinklers only control fire growth until intervention occurs by the fire service. Today, some sprinkler systems are designed for early suppression and are considered to have failed if they do not extinguish the fire.
Sprinkler systems are usually installed in high or large buildings and high fire hazard occupancies. Statistics show that in a majority of cases where sprinklers are installed the fire has been controlled by one sprinkler head alone.
target_audience: MECHANICAL ENGINEERS
مهندس ميكانيكا

courses.description:
Breathing is the process of moving air out and in the lungs to facilitate gas exchange with the internal environment. mostly to flush out carbon dioxide and bring in oxygen. Breathing is important for life that usually occurs without much thought, when we breath immediately our blood cells receive oxygen and it also release carbon dioxide. We most clearly understand that carbon dioxide is a waste product that carried back through your body and exhaled. The convenience of our breathing or how we breath easily show how the body is functioning because poor breathing has a ripple effect on the health of the individual and is a great contribution in so many sickness. We must remember that improper breathing  can greatly upset the body and can be a contributing factor of depression, anxiety, panic attacks, emotional disturbances and fatigue, this must be taken care of so that it will not lead to more severe problem for the entire body and the body mechanism. Breathing exercise is very good for the body and help to make the body very strong example belly breathing can aid in the reduction of stress in the body system, this can be practice frequently in a relax mode to ensure that the body mechanism is relax so the maximum effect or gains can be obtained by the body to reduce the stress.
Breathing has a relationship with our mood, due to this some professionals believe that they can aid  to bring about a particular mood by adopting a certain breathing pattern, it is believe  that deeper breathing has a way to encourage a relax mood that will help in refreshing the body and change facial mood of the person. During my morning exercise when i breath continuously l can feel that the heart is working well and the body is more energize. This morning exercise make me feel strong through out the entire body. Breathing in the altitude has a special working in the body above a certain space the body mechanism change to suit the conditions in the sky to help the body work well.

courses.description:
First aid for teenagers


The course is ideal for all teenagers to equip teenagers with the skills to help themselves, family and/or friends if faced with a medical emergency. The course is also suitable for all teenagers and can be especially useful if they are taking part in a Sports Leaderships Awards or the Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme.


This course is designed to give you the knowledge to learn how to keep yourself and others safe and to know how to help should an accident happen.  The course consists of videos that encourage you to practice the skills you are learning. There are numerous handouts you can download and keep for future reference as well as short tests to check your learning after various sections. We will keep you entertained and engaged throughout and will always be on hand to help answer any questions you have - just email info@emtfirstaid.com or use the Q&A section. The course is fully compatible with all computers and mobile devices. You will be able to stop and start as often as you like and on completion you will be able to print your Certificate.


The Author has made every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information contained within the course, however this course is merely a guide and the Author does not accept any liability or responsibility for any inaccuracies or for any mistreatment or misdiagnosis of any person, however caused.


EMT First Aid and Lifeguard Training provides this course for guidance and it is not in any way a substitute for medical advice. EMT First Aid and Lifeguard Training is not responsible or liable for any diagnosis made, or actions taken based on this course. We strongly recommend that you attend a practical First Aid course to practice the skills taught in this course and to fully understand what to do in a medical emergency.


Please be aware that the information is correct at the time of filming June 2021 and relates only to UK Resuscitation and First Aid guidelines. If you are outside the UK please refer to your countries guidelines and governing board.
target_audience: All teenagers who want to learn first aid skills

courses.description:
Erste Hilfe bei Kindern, Kleinkindern und Babies
Lerne Notfallsituationen richtig einzuschätzen und richtig zu handeln


Kindernotfälle - Weisst du was zu tun ? Hier kannst du es lernen. Einfach und unkompliziert!

In diesem Kurs lernst du die Anzeichen der wichtigsten Kindernotfälle und vor allem lernst du, was zu tun ist. Ich arbeite in diesem Kurs mit vielen Video aus der Praxis, damit du einen guten Einblick in die Thematik bekommst.
Der erste Teil des Kurses besteht aus einem klassischen Basic Life Support Kurs bei Kindern und Kleinkindern. Die Inhalte unterrichte ich nach den neuesten Massnahmen des Europäischen Wiederbelebungsrates von 2021. Die Richtlinien sind international anerkannt.


Hier sind die Themen:


Beurteilung der Situation
Die Notrufnummern
Wann muss ein Notarzt gerufen werden
Verschlucken von Fremdkörpern
Ohnmacht und der Unterschied zur Bewusstlosigkeit

Wiederbelebung bei Kindern
Wiederbelebung bei Kleinkindern und Babies
Anwendung eines Defibrillators
Krampfanfälle / Epilepsie, Unterschiede
Fieberkrampf
Kinderbisse
Pseudokrupp
Allergien


Zwischen den Lektionen findest du jeweils einen kurzen Test, um dein Wissen zu überprüfen. Ausserdem findest du zum Abschluss eine Lernkontrolle. Du hast ausserdem die Möglichkeit bei mir ein Kurszertifikat anzufordern.
Unterrichtsziel:
Die Teilnehmenden können bei kleinen und großen Kindernotfällen reagieren, wenden die Basismassnahmen der Wiederbelebung (BLS), inkl. automatischer, externer Defibrillation (AED) unter Beachtung der eigenen Sicherheit in unterschiedlichen Situationen an.






Bist du bereit? Dann lass und loslegen! Ich würde mich freuen, dich im Kurs zu sehen.


Bis gleich, Simone

requirements: An open mind to learning about new ways of viewing situations
courses.description:
By taking this course, you are demonstrating a proactive commitment to learning how to prevent accidents in all areas of life, both at home and at work. Accident prevention is not merely about following rules; it's about developing situational awareness of potential risks and fostering a safety-conscious mindset in every activity you undertake. Whether you're a business professional, a parent, or someone managing a household, understanding safety protocols and accident prevention strategies can significantly reduce the likelihood of harm to yourself and others.
This course will equip you with essential knowledge on how to recognize hazards before they become serious issues. It will teach you how to identify risks that might go unnoticed in your daily routines and provide you with the tools and strategies needed to address them effectively. Additionally, you’ll learn about the common causes of accidents in different environments and how to mitigate those risks through proper planning, behavioral changes, and adopting safety technologies.
Commitment to safety extends beyond the workplace. Applying what you learn in your personal life can help ensure a safer home environment by reducing risks such as falls, burns, electrical shocks, and more. Ultimately, this course is about taking responsibility for your surroundings, fostering a culture of safety, and becoming a proactive advocate for accident prevention in all aspects of life.
target_audience: People who work in Home, Office and Construction site environments.

___________________________________________________________________________________________
Yazarın Önsözü
Dünyada milyonlarca yıldır, milyarlarca insan yaşamış. Bunların çok büyük çoğunluğu hiç yangınla karşı karşıya kalmadan bir ömür geçirmiş. Ancak, çok az sayıda da olsa bazı insanlar yangınlarla karşılaşmış, üzülmüş, yaralanmış, sakat kalmış veya hayatlarını kaybetmiştir. Dilerim, hiç yangınla karşılaşmadan, başınız bile ağrımadan bir ömür sürersiniz.


Yine de belki karşılaşırsanız endişesini taşıdığım için yazıyorum bu basit ama önemli bilgileri. Bilinsin ama, dilerim kullanma ortamı doğmasın. Ama bir yangınla karşı karşıya kaldığınızda verdiğim bilgiler sayesinde kazasız belasız atlatırsanız, bunda benim de katkım olduğu için mutlu olurum.


Bir de, itfaiye ile ilgili pek konuşulmayan, bilinmediği sanılan birkaç konuya değindim. Böylesine kıyıda köşede bırakılmış bir meslek grubunun sorunlarını ilgilenenler bilsin istedim. Burada yazılanlar hayal ürünü değil, maalesef gerçektir.


Amacım ne olabilir ki? Memurluğumun son dört yılını geçirdiğim İstanbul İtfaiyesi'nde, çağımıza yaklaşılması için çok çaba gösterdim. Yönetim kadrolarına anlatamadım. Bir de yazılı deniyorum. Umarım anlaşılır. Yangın ve İtfaiyecilik konusunda tüm insanların amacı birdir diye düşünüyorum:
YANGINSIZ BİR YAŞAM


Seslendiren : Fatih ŞAHİN


Saygılarımla / Fatih ŞAHİN
IV. Seviye Yangın Güvenliği Eğitmeni
Yangından Korunma Danışmanı

courses.title: First Aid online -Learn how to save a life today.
courses.bio: Learn CPR and FirstAid online. Firstaid to a stroke, blood clot in the heart, and much more.
objectives: Learn for to get the heart going again
Get knowledge about the body’s vital functions
Learn how to react to a stroke
If someone is chocking you will know how to help

Introduction: Symptoms and First Aid for a Heart Attack
Symptoms and First Aid for Stroke

requirements: None
courses.description:
Every second counts in an emergency. What if you could be the one who makes the difference — the one who stays calm, takes action, and saves a life?
In this essential first aid course, you’ll learn how to respond quickly and effectively to the most critical medical emergencies. We start with CPR – a vital skill that keeps blood and oxygen flowing until professional help arrives. It’s not complicated, and you don’t need a medical background to do it right. With a little practice, you’ll be ready.
You’ll also learn how to use an Automated External Defibrillator, or AED. This device is simple, safe, and gives clear instructions as you go. In a cardiac arrest, it can restart a heart and dramatically improve survival chances.
We’ll teach you to recognize the signs of a stroke using the FAST method: face drooping, arm weakness, speech difficulty, and time to call for help. Knowing these signs can save precious minutes — and brain cells.
Finally, we cover how to spot and respond to a heart attack, including early warning signs that many people miss.
This training takes just one hour. One hour to learn how to stay calm, take control, and save lives. And you'll be able to evaluate by completing quizzes.
Are you ready to step up?
target_audience: Everyone who wants to be able to save life’s and be confident in the ability to help others

requirements: This course does not require a medical professional level of knowledge; everyone can be their own family doctor!
courses.description:
Are you tired of relying on medications for pain relief? Would you like to learn how to manage common ailments such as headaches, neck pain, chest discomfort, and even chronic conditions using simple, effective techniques? This course introduces you to the powerful world of acupressure, an ancient healing method rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM). You’ll discover how to use acupressure to relieve pain, boost your body’s natural healing processes, and address a variety of health issues—all without the need for expensive or specialized equipment.
This course focuses on pain management, one of the areas where TCM and acupressure truly shine. From headaches and neck pain to chest pain, abdominal discomfort, and joint pain, you will learn how to target specific acupoints to alleviate symptoms quickly and effectively.
Key Features of the Course:
Practical & Simple: Learn how to perform acupressure with just your hands or a simple tool like a stick—no acupuncture needles required!
Scientifically Valid and Rigorous: Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) is not an ancient form of superstition or witchcraft; rather, it is a scientifically validated system of healing. All acupressure techniques and TCM principles are supported by peer-reviewed research and SCI-level academic studies, confirming their effectiveness and safety. This course combines ancient wisdom with modern science, offering you a truly evidence-based approach to pain relief and wellness.
Immediate Relief for Common Ailments: Whether it’s a migraine, palpitations, or wrist pain, you’ll gain the skills to address discomfort in real time.
Chronic Pain Solutions: This course also teaches how acupressure can help with long-term, difficult-to-treat conditions, offering a holistic approach to pain management.
Beginner-Friendly: Starting with the basics of meridian theory and acupressure points, this course is designed for those new to TCM, with no prior knowledge needed.
By the end of this course, you’ll feel confident in using acupressure techniques to handle everyday health issues, while understanding the scientific basis behind these ancient practices.
target_audience: Anyone interested in medicine, health, Chinese culture, Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), and the Chinese language, especially those who want to learn about wellness and emergency first aid.

requirements: Não é necessário experiências anteriores, basta ter a vontade de fazer seu PGR de forma simples e direto ao ponto
courses.description:
Este curso lhe mostrará de forma prática como elaborar um Programa de Gerenciamento de Riscos Ocupacionais (PGR) de acordo com o que está regulamentado na NR1 (Portaria Nº 6.730, de 9 de março de 2020).
O Programa de Gerenciamento de Riscos tem como objetivo prevenir e controlar a ocorrência de acidentes e desencadeamentos de doenças que possam ocorrer durante as atividades laborais de uma empresa.
O PGR é importantíssimo para as organização e busca monitorar e subsidiar a implementação de ações que visem a prevenção de acidentes e a promoção da saúde dos trabalhadores.
A NR-01 diz que a organização deve desenvolver ações em saúde ocupacional dos trabalhadores integradas às demais medidas de prevenção em SST, de acordo com os riscos gerados pelo trabalho. Além disso, um bom PGR deve ser elaborado com a correta classificação dos riscos e é crucial a elaboração de plano de ação indicando as medidas de prevenção a serem adotadas pela empresa, na sequência definido um cronograma a ser seguido, formas de acompanhamento e aferição de resultados.
O curso está dividido em 10 módulos e disponibilizará a você:
- Dois modelos de PGR;
- Dois modelos de inventário de riscos e plano de ação;
- Um modelo de relatório de avaliação de riscos.
target_audience: Técnicos e Engenheiros de Segurança do Trabalho
Profissionais interessados em entender mais sobre PGR
Consultores de processos e gestão em Saúde e Segurança do Trabalho

courses.title: Disaster and Emergency Preparation - France
courses.bio: Resources and skills for English speakers in France
requirements: Interest in living in, or visiting, France
courses.description:
French speakers in France have access to countless resources for managing large scale disasters and personal emergencies.
But visitors and new residents who come to France with limited language skills struggle as they become acclimated to an unfamiliar culture. This struggle can be dangerous, even fatal, when immigrants and visiting guests face disastrous circumstances.
To make life a little easier for English-speaking residents and visitors, this course provides a brief overview of resources, skills, and risks that individuals and families face in navigating life in L'Hexagone.
Here you'll find resources that will provide relief for yourself, your family, and the community at large when when you face crises, both on a national, large-scale level and in your personal and family circumstances. It also covers the basics of psychological first aid, so that you can be useful to others when disaster strikes.
This free course contains five lessons answering questions such as What is a disaster, and why should I care? How risky is France? How does the Government respond? What should I do in the immediate aftermath of a disaster? How can I help others when a disaster hits? How can my family and I prepare for emergencies before they strike?
target_audience: Current and future English-speaking residents of, and visitors to, France

courses.title: Health and Safety: Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) Awareness
courses.bio: Safeguarding Women and Children | Women's Health | Child Safety | FGM Awareness | Genital Health | Health and Safety
objectives: Understand the history and prevalence of Female Genital Mutilation.
Explore the laws and policies aimed at preventing FGM.
Recognize the health issues linked to FGM.
Learn the roles of professionals in protecting vulnerable individuals.
Discover how to work collaboratively to prevent FGM.
Grasp safeguarding practices for children and women at risk.
requirements: This Female Genital Mutilation Awareness course doesn't require prior experience and is suitable for diverse learners. To study the course, all you need is a passion for learning and a good understanding of English, numeracy, and IT skills.
courses.description:
➥ Make A Difference!
Did you know 1 in 5 girls and women worldwide has undergone FGM? Don't be a bystander. Equip yourself with the knowledge to prevent this harmful practice. Learn to recognize the signs, understand the risks, and take action. This course will empower you to protect children and women from FGM. Enroll now!


❖ What is Covered in this Course?
This course provides crucial FGM Awareness for professionals and individuals wanting to understand and prevent Female Genital Mutilation (FGM). You will gain essential knowledge of Health and Safety principles related to FGM, and how it impacts women and children globally.
Introduction to Female Genital Mutilation (FGM): Learn what FGM is, its types, and the global context.
Laws and Policies: Understand the legal framework around FGM and Health and Safety measures in various countries.
History & Prevalence: Discover the historical and cultural reasons for FGM, as well as its widespread practice.
Health Issues Associated with FGM: Learn about the serious health risks and long-term effects of FGM on women and girls.
Roles and Responsibilities of Professionals: Understand the roles of healthcare providers, social workers, and educators in combating FGM.
Working Together to Prevent FGM: Learn how different sectors can collaborate to protect women and children from FGM.
Safeguarding Children & Women: Learn safeguarding techniques to protect vulnerable individuals from the harmful practice of FGM.
By the end of this course, you will be well-equipped with the tools and knowledge to help prevent FGM, support those affected, and comply with Health and Safety standards in relevant fields.


❖ Why Learn About this Topic?
FGM is a global human rights issue that affects millions of women and girls worldwide. It can lead to severe physical and emotional harm. Health and Safety professionals, social workers, educators, and medical staff play a critical role in preventing FGM and supporting victims. By understanding FGM Awareness, you can make a tangible difference in protecting women and children from this harmful practice. This course will help you take proactive steps to identify and report instances of FGM, offering guidance on both prevention and intervention.


❖ Reasons Why You Should Choose this Course
Understand the different types of FGM and the global prevalence of this practice.
Learn about the serious health risks associated with Female Genital Mutilation.
Gain a thorough understanding of the laws and policies surrounding FGM.
Know your role as a professional in preventing FGM and safeguarding children.
Learn how to work together with other professionals to combat FGM.
A flexible study plan designed for office-goers, so you can learn at your own pace.
Ideal for social workers, healthcare providers, and anyone involved in Health and Safety or safeguarding.


❖ Our Promise to You:
We promise that by the end of this course, you will feel confident in your ability to recognize, report, and prevent Female Genital Mutilation. You’ll understand the Health and Safety implications of FGM and be equipped to take action to protect women and children. Our goal is to give you the knowledge and tools to make a positive impact and safeguard vulnerable individuals from FGM.


❖ Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):
Q1: What is Female Genital Mutilation (FGM)?
A1: FGM refers to procedures that involve the partial or total removal of the external female genitalia for non-medical reasons, often causing long-term physical and emotional damage.
Q2: Why is FGM practiced?
A2: FGM is practiced for various cultural, religious, and social reasons, often based on tradition, and is falsely believed to preserve chastity or enhance fertility.
Q3: Are there any health consequences of FGM?
A3: Yes, FGM can cause severe health complications including infections, chronic pain, childbirth complications, and mental health issues.
Q4: Is FGM illegal?
A4: Yes, FGM is illegal in many countries, including the UK, USA, and across the European Union. However, it is still practiced in certain regions.
Q5: Are there any prerequisites for this course?
A5: No, this course is suitable for anyone interested in learning about FGM and its prevention, regardless of prior knowledge or experience.

❖ Recent Student Review:
"This course was eye-opening. I learned so much about Female Genital Mutilation and how important FGM Awareness is in preventing this harmful practice. As a healthcare worker, this knowledge is essential in my role. I feel better prepared to help protect women and children from FGM." – Sarah M.
target_audience: Healthcare professionals working with at-risk populations.
Social workers handling cases of vulnerable children and women.
Teachers and educators involved in safeguarding responsibilities.
Law enforcement and legal professionals focused on child protection.
Anyone 16 years or older wanting to take the course.
Individuals looking for a related career.
Professionals seeking to enhance skills at this field.

courses.description:
Während der Corona  Pandemie und aufgrund der seit dem 16.01.2021 geltende Testverordnung (TestV) des Bundesgesundheitsministeriums unterstützen wir Sie mit dieser fachärztlichen Unterweisung  für medizinisches Fachpersonal (Pflegekräfte, MFA, RA/RS/NFS) und Laien gem. TestV bei der Durchführung und Auswertung von Corona-Antigen-Schnelltests.
Die Teilnahme per Smartphone, Tablet oder Computer ist zeitlich und örtlich jederzeit durchführbar und deshalb denkbar unkompliziert.
Zur Nachvollziehbarkeit der Teilnahme und Einhaltung der Qualitätskriterien einer persönlichen ärztlichen Unterweisung ist es notwendig, dass jede/r Teilnehmer/in zur Bestätigung der Teilnahme einen eigenen Zugang zum Videokurs erhält. Die gemeinsame Nutzung eines Endgerätes gleichzeitig durch mehrere Teilnehmer ist deshalb nicht möglich.
Jeder Teilnehmer/in erhält im Anschluss eine ärztlich unterschriebene Teilnahmebestätigung. Bei Erfüllung der Kriterien der TestV kann ggf. ein Antrag bei der zuständigen Kassenärztlichen Vereinigung auf Kostenerstattung gestellt werden.
Der Kurs gliedert sich in folgende Bereiche auf:
Allgemeine Begrüßung
Das SARS-Covid-2 Virus, die Corona-Erkrankungen:
Grundlagen zum Virus, Übertragungswege, Inkubationszeit, Krankheitszeichen, Therapie, Dauer der Übertragungsfähigkeit
Die Testung:
Benötigtes Material, Anatomie der Atemwege, Vorführung und Besprechung eines Tests am Probanden, Durchführung eines Tests, Auswertung, Umgang mit der persönlichen Schutzausrüstung.
Die Testverordnung des Bundesministeriums für Gesundheit:
Erläuterungen der Grundlagen eines Anspruches auf Corona Testung in verschiedenen Situationen, Verweis auf Kostenträger
Abschlußtest mit 10 Fragen, von den 70% richtig beantwortet sein müssen.


Falls der Kurs nach Erhalt des ärztlichen Zeugnisses storniert wird, wird das Zeugnis beim zuständigen Gesundheitsamt für ungültig erklärt und im Original zurückgefordert.
target_audience: Jeder, der Corona-Tests in einem Testzentrum durchführen will und den Nachweis einer ärztlichen Unterweisung benötigt

Introducción a los primeros socorros para perros y gatos

Amor por los animales.
¡Y el deseo de querer cuidar a las mascotas y aprender técnicas para poder salvarles la vida!
courses.description:
Si amas a tu mascota este curso es para vos!!!
¿Sabes qué hacer si tu perro o tu gato tienen un accidente?
Aprende cómo responder ante situaciones imprevistas.  Descubre qué son y para qué sirven los primeros socorros para perros y gatos, adquiere las herramientas necesarias para socorrer a tu mascota en caso de que sea necesario, prepárate para prevenir enfermedades y accidentes.
Ideal para adiestradores, estudiantes de ciencias y medicina veterinarias, cuidadores, paseadores de perros, peluqueros caninos y convivientes de perros y gatos.
Este curso está diseñado para que los y las participantes puedan adquirir el conocimiento de cómo reconocer y actuar ante enfermedades súbitas y lesiones frecuentes en mascotas (perros y gatos) hasta que llegue el veterinario o puedan arribar al hospital veterinario.
Este programa de entrenamiento fue desarrollado por la red internacional de entrenamiento en desastres, emergencias y rescate AIDER.
OBJETIVOS:
Que los participantes logren:
• Conocer técnicas elementales de primeros socorros para perros y gatos.
• Conocer técnica elemental de RCP y OVA para perros y gatos.


PROGRAMA / CONTENIDOS:
• Parámetros vitales
• Seguridad en la escena
• Resucitación cardio-pulmonar
• Desobstrucción de la vía aérea
• Hemorragias
• Mordeduras

• Accidentes automovilísticos
• Convulsiones
• Diarrea y vómitos
• Dilatación torsión gástrica
• Intoxicaciones

Self Harm, Risky Behavior, Suicidal Intent

courses.description:
This is an excellent and thorough overview of suicide recognition and prevention. It is handled by the presenters in a sensitive yet confident style. I can see this being a very useful tool for professionals in the industry as well as anyone who cares about others. I highly recommend this suicide prevention course and know that I will certainly refer back to it many times to come in the future. -Student Review

What do you do when you suspect a person is suicidal? Do this course.
This comprehensive course is written and presented by two very experienced counsellors and covers everything from first response through to self-care.
The course is suitable for anyone who is in contact with a suicidal person and wants to up-skill in their ability to manage the situation. This may be lay-workers, parents, friends, police, ambulance staff, school teachers etc. Anyone!
Section 1: Self-awareness, stance, warnings.

Do this course, now, so you respond at the best of your ability if the opportunity arises, and know that you have lifetime access to this course for reference.

courses.title: Combating Workplace Violence
courses.bio: Protect Yourself and Your Co-Workers by Learning How to Recognize and Fight Workplace Violence
objectives: Learn to identify workplace violence and how it differs from other forms of violence, such as sexual harrassment
Learn to identify who can perpetrate workplace violence, including recognizing prominent risk factors
Learn to identify the warning signs indicating the potential for workplace violence
Learn to combat workplace violence with training, planning, and policy
Understand the importance of reporting workplace violence and knowing how to do so
Learn to protect yourself and coworkers from workplace violence
Learn to promote a harmonious workplace, including through the use of verbal judo to resolve conflicts
Increase your workplace safety and health skill set

Introduction: What is Difference in Sexual Harassment

requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
Workplace violence has been on the rise, according to the Center for Disease Control (CDC). Tension and stress have risen both inside and outside of the workplace. Over 100,000 people were hurt in workplace violence incidents according to a recent CDC survey, and 750 to 1,000 workers lose their lives to workplace violence every year.
This course will take you through how to recognize the warning signs, risk factors, and triggers that could result in a workplace incident. We teach our students to know how to spot the behaviors that suggest a propensity for violence and how to implement actions and policies to mitigate against such violence. We show supervisors how to employ strategies to combat workplace violence across an entire organization.
The best way to protect yourself and others from workplace violence is by understanding what triggers it and how to nip it in the bud before it begins.
This course is intended to provide safety and health training in compliance with Federal OSHA and State OSHA training requirements such as CalOSHA. If you have questions, you may ask our instructors, and they will respond to you within a short period of time, as outlined by the OSHA standards.
The training will cover all of the required elements outlined in Federal and State OSHA standards to ensure that your training meets or exceed the minimum required training. If your training has a time requirement, the content of the training has been designed to meet that requirement.
The training is developed by our in-house, real trainers with twenty years of experience working in the field and with real crews and are trusted by public agencies throughout California.
There are no prerequisites required for this course. The course will walk you through all of the elements required to be successful and complete any questions or quizzes, or testing that may be required.
target_audience: Anyone working with others, and of particular use for supervisors, safety managers, security personnel, and HR workers

courses.title: Code Enforcement Officer Safety Standards (SB 296)
courses.bio: Keep Yourself Safe as a Code Enforcement Officer in The Field
objectives: Learn the various safety trainings you should complete as a code enforcement officer, such as de-escalation, ladders, bloodborne pathogens, and heat illness.
Understand the impact of ergonomics on your body and how you can mitigate them in the field.
Learn to prepare for code enforcement visits, including reviewing the customer service database for past incidents and driving around the site beforehand.
Understand the importance of weapon retention in the field and how to best keep your weapon from falling into the wrong hands.
Learn how to deal with dogs when visiting an inspection site.
Learn the hazards involved in working in and around homeless encampments and how to protect yourself from those hazards.
Understand the importance of situational awareness, including the possibility of ambushes in the field and how to protect yourself from them.
Learn how to inspect your vehicle and drive safely in the field, how to avoid accidents, and what to do if you are involved in an accident.
Understand the various types of PPE you may need to use in the course of your job duties, and how to be prepared with the best PPE.
Learn why the medical surveillance program is crucial to your personal health on the job.
Learn the value of assessing structures for damage and how to identify weak buildings which could collapse and cause harm.
Learn how to safely remove contaminated gloves without exposing yourself to bloodborne pathogens or other harmful substances.
requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
"Code Enforcement Officer Safety Standards (SB 296)" is an essential online course designed for code enforcement officers who are committed to their safety and well-being while performing their duties in the field. This course satisfies the requirements of California's SB 296, which established that safety standards must be established for code enforcement officers.
While SB 296 is specific to California employees, this course includes a broad variety of safety topics that are crucial to code enforcement officers in any locale, inside or outside the state of California.
You will learn the importance of being situationally aware while on the job and why it is crucial you are trained in de-escalation and conflict resolution strategies.
As code enforcement requires training in an expansive set of disciplines, we include sections on such key topics as ladder safety, heat illness prevention, bloodborne pathogens, and personal protective equipment. We also include a section showing how to safely remove contaminated gloves using the Duck Dive method.
This course will provide you with strategies for combatting ergonomic injury hazards, which are common for code enforcement officers in the field. We will also discuss how to handle encounters with dogs and homeless encampments.
Personal safety is covered with recommendations for proper weapon retention and how to best prepare for a safe code enforcement visit ahead of time. Ambushes in the field are not uncommon, so we include a section on how to best position and protect yourself if you become a target.
This course will instruct you on recognizing signs of extensive damage in structures to avoid entering unsafe buildings. As vehicle operation is an essential job duty for any code enforcement officer, we discuss operating your vehicle safely and what to do should you be involved in an accident.
Medical surveillance and incident reporting are vital elements in any code enforcement employee safety program, so we also include basic training on these topics.
By the end of "Code Enforcement Officer Safety Standards (SB 296)," you will have a comprehensive understanding of the procedures and precautions needed to remain safe, confident, and prepared in any field environment. This training is your key to building a proactive approach to personal safety in code enforcement work.
We are a successful risk control and safety firm with decades of experience in the industry. Our course is prepared and led by our in-house industry experts utilizing practices applied in the field.
Please join us today to learn how to remain safe while working in the hazardous field of code enforcement.
target_audience: Anyone employed with code enforcement duties.
Those in emergency response occupations, particularly law enforcement.
Anyone looking to remain safe when entering construction worksites or inspection sites.

courses.title: Curso de Brigada de incêndio, seja um brigadista 2025
courses.bio: Brigadas de incêndio
objectives: Agregar conhecimento mínimo para os vigilantes e demais pessoas ligadas a área de segurança patrimonial no tocante a brigadas de incêndio.
Este curso visa preparar as pessoas para terem o conhecimento mínimo para atuar com equipamentos não letais
identificar itens ligados a segurança contra incêndios.
Realizar serviços ligados a área de segurança patrimonial com proteções contra incêndios.
requirements: Requisito mínimo, atuar em empresa que deseje possuir brigadistas.
courses.description:
Introdução ao Curso de Brigada de Incêndio
O risco de incêndios é uma preocupação constante em diversos ambientes, desde residenciais até industriais. Para garantir a segurança de pessoas e patrimônios, a formação de uma Brigada de Incêndio é essencial. Neste contexto, os cursos a distância (EAD) tornaram-se uma ferramenta eficaz para capacitar profissionais de maneira flexível e acessível. Este artigo explora a importância, o conteúdo e os benefícios de um curso de Brigada de Incêndio EAD.
Importância da Formação em Brigada de Incêndio
Prevenção e Mitigação de Riscos
A formação em Brigada de Incêndio é fundamental para prevenir e mitigar riscos relacionados a incêndios. Os participantes aprendem a identificar potenciais fontes de incêndio, avaliar riscos e adotar medidas proativas para evitar situações perigosas.
Ação Rápida e Eficiente em Emergências
A capacidade de agir rapidamente diante de uma situação de incêndio é crucial. Os cursos de Brigada de Incêndio EAD capacitam os participantes a executar procedimentos adequados, utilizar equipamentos de combate a incêndio e coordenar evacuações de maneira eficiente.
Conformidade com Regulamentações
Muitas regulamentações exigem a presença de brigadistas treinados em determinados tipos de edificações. Estar em conformidade com essas normas não apenas promove a segurança, mas também evita penalidades legais.
Conteúdo do Curso de Brigada de Incêndio EAD


Módulo 1: Introdução à Segurança contra Incêndios
Módulo 2: Combate a incêndio comentado
Módulo 3:Classes de Incêndio
Módulo 4: Agentes extintores
Módulo 5: Situações diversas
Módulo 6 - Métodos de extinção
Módulo 7 - EPI´s
Módulo 8 - Treinamento de Brigadas


Benefícios do Curso de Brigada de Incêndio EAD
Acessibilidade e Flexibilidade
Um dos principais benefícios dos cursos EAD é a flexibilidade oferecida aos participantes. Eles podem acessar o conteúdo a qualquer momento, adaptando o aprendizado à sua própria rotina.
Redução de Custos
Cursos EAD eliminam despesas relacionadas a deslocamento, hospedagem e materiais físicos. Isso torna a formação em Brigada de Incêndio mais acessível, especialmente para empresas que precisam treinar um grande número de funcionários.
Aprendizado Autodirigido
A natureza autodirigida dos cursos EAD permite que os participantes assumam o controle de seu aprendizado. Isso resulta em maior engajamento e retenção de conhecimento.
Atualizações Contínuas
Os cursos EAD podem ser facilmente atualizados para refletir mudanças nas normas de segurança e melhores práticas. Isso garante que os participantes estejam sempre atualizados quanto aos procedimentos mais recentes.
Conclusão
O curso de Brigada de Incêndio EAD oferece uma abordagem eficiente e eficaz para a formação de profissionais aptos a lidar com situações de emergência. A combinação de conteúdo abrangente, acessibilidade e benefícios financeiros faz desses cursos uma escolha valiosa para organizações e indivíduos comprometidos com a segurança contra incêndios.
Observação: A estrutura e o conteúdo deste exemplo podem ser ajustados para atender às necessidades específicas do curso ou da organização.
target_audience: Vigilantes patrimoniais, supervisores de serviços e segurança.

courses.title: Reanimación Cardiopulmonar (RCP) básica y Manejo OVACE
courses.bio: Aprende a salvar vidas de adultos, niños y lactantes ante una situación de paro cardiorrespiratorio y/o atragantamiento.
objectives: Aprender que son las enfermedades cardiovasculares, sus factores de riesgo y las estrategias de reducción de riesgo cardiovascular.
Establecer que es un paro cardiorrespiratorio y la cadena de supervivencia en adultos, niños y lactantes.
Aprender como aplicar la maniobra de Reanimación Cardiopulmonar por 1 y 2 reanimadores en una situación de emergencia.
Establecer que es una Obstrucción de la Vía Aérea por Cuerpo Extraño y reconocer una.
Aprender como aplicar la maniobra de Heimlich en una situación de emergencia.
Aprender a salvar vidas.

Enfermedades cardiovasculares: Factores de riesgo para el desarrollo de enfermedades cardiovasculares
Estrategias de reducción de riesgo cardiovascular
Paro Cardiorrespiratorio (PCR): Significado de RCP y su finalidad
Cadena de supervivencia de niños y lactantes
Obstrucción de la vía aérea por cuerpo e: OVACE y la aplicación de la Maniobra de Heimlich.
Consideraciones en el manejo de la vía a: Consideraciones en el manejo de la vía aérea

requirements: No es necesario disponer de conocimientos previos para tomar el curso.
courses.description:
Las enfermedades cardiovasculares (ECV) son la principal causa de muerte en todo el mundo. Cada año mueren más personas por ECV que por cualquier otra causa (Organización Mundial de la Salud, 2017).
De acuerdo a la actualización de estadísticas sobre enfermedades cardiacas y ataques o derrames cerebrales, año 2022, de la American Heart Association (AHA), las enfermedades cardiovasculares representaron aproximadamente 19.05 millones de muertes a nivel mundial en 2020.
A nivel nacional mueren 34 personas por cada 100.000 habitantes por Infarto agudo al miocardio y 31 personas por cada 100.000 habitantes por otras enfermedades hipertensivas (División de Salud, Ejercito de Chile, 2022).
El 28% de las muertes de Chile son responsabilidad de las enfermedades cardiovasculares (Universidad de Chile, 2021).
Este curso tiene el principal propósito de que el participante conozca los protocolos correspondientes para brindar los primeros auxilios necesarios mediante la maniobra de RCP (Reanimación Cardiopulmonar) y de Heimlich que le permita afrontar los decisivos primeros minutos en una situación de emergencia hasta la llegada de los profesionales de la salud, logrando enfrentar la situación con éxito, salvando vidas y disminuyendo la tasa de mortalidad asociada a los paros cardiorrespiratorios extrahospitalarios.
¿Qué esperas para aprender a salvar vidas y obtener tu certificado de competencias?
target_audience: Brigadas de emergencia, personal de seguridad, gerentes, supervisores, estudiantes y público en general.

courses.title: Basics Of Health, Safety & Environment Management System
courses.bio: Learn The Basics Of Health, Safety & Environment Management System that Will Protect People, Property and Environment
objectives: What Is Meant by Health, Safety, and Environment?
Hazard Identification and Risk Assessment
Fire Safety and Fire Prevention Techniques

Be able to read and understand English
courses.description:
For the last few decades, the industry has undergone tremendous changes, impacted by technological advances and changing attitudes about how things should happen in the best way possible.
One such change is the industry's growing emphasis on safety and health. Professionals realized that safety, productivity, and quality are inseparably linked.
To protect their employees on the job, companies are implementing programs beyond regulatory compliance.
In this course, the instructor from HSE-Q Training International presents safety as being actively managed with quality and productivity. In addition, he discusses the importance of fire safety.
The instructor highlights some of the industry's most notable safety and health hazards throughout this course—including fall hazards, traffic accidents, respiratory hazards, and fire hazards—and shares strategies for integrating safety, quality, and productivity.
This course involves a dedicated session for risk assessment. If risks are not managed correctly, they can hinder the success of your project. You could even have your project derailed entirely. This course teaches you how to anticipate, assess, and manage risk. Creating a risk management plan, outlining and categorizing risks, performing a qualitative and quantitative risk analysis, creating a response plan, monitoring progress, and ensuring projects stay within budget and timelines will enable you to manage your risks effectively.
Learners will be equipped with all the knowledge they will need to improve health & safety at their workplaces with the Basics Of Health, Safety & Environment Management System. Walking you through the basics to more specialized topics covers everything you need to know about and much more.
Discover tips and guidance that will steer you towards excellence, with six meticulously crafted modules designed by professional experts in Health, Safety, and Environment Management training. So whether you want to ace that job interview, grow your confidence in the workplace, or gain the skills for self-mastery, this HSE training course is tailor-made to help you achieve your true potential.
And if you find that this course is not equipping you with the knowledge that can help you to gain employable skills, claim your money back within 30 days of taking the course.
What's more, with the Basics of Health, Safety, and Environment Training Course, you'll get to know the ins and outs of the topic. There are no specific entry requirements for this course, which can be studied part-time or full-time and at your own pace. So, join this HSE Training Course today and master the safety essentials to ensure workplace safety.


There are six sections in this course, which cover various topics related to health, safety, and the environment.
In chapter 1. We will discuss - What Is Meant by Health, Safety, and Environment? This section will cover an overview of basic concepts, the need for health safety, and definitions of health, safety, and environment.
In chapter 2. During this course, we will discuss Hazard Identification and Risk Assessment, and learn how to carry out these tasks, as well as how to control risks in a hierarchical manner
Chapter 3. The topic is Fire Safety and Fire Prevention Techniques - which includes basic information about fire safety such as, what is fire, how it is made, and how it is extinguished
In chapter 4. The basic elements of behavioral safety will be discussed: What is Behavior, what is Behavior Observation, and the kinds of reinforcements that can occur.
In Chapter 5. The purpose of this lesson is to provide you with information about IOSH, OSHA, ISO 45001, and 14001, which are international organizations regulating and enforcing health safety laws.
Last but not least, in the last chapter, we will review some frequently asked questions regarding health, safety, and the environment.
If you complete the course, you will receive a certificate from Udemy that you can save and use for career advancement.
target_audience: Those who are working in organizations
Those who want to make a career in the field of Health, Safety, and Environment
Students who want to learn about Health, Safety, and Environment

First Aid 101 is your handy guide when it comes to saving lives anywhere and available at any time. Even without medical equipment or supplies, you’re still able to save someone’s life.

تم تصميم هذه الدورة لتقديم شرح مبسط وشامل لأهم المعايير الأمريكية الخاصة بالسلامة والصحة المهنية والمعروفة باسم OSHA، والتي تُطبق في بيئات العمل الصناعية حول العالم. تهدف الدورة إلى توعية المتدربين بأفضل الممارسات المهنية للوقاية من الحوادث والإصابات، وضمان بيئة عمل آمنة وفقًا لأعلى المعايير.


تتناول الدورة موضوعات متعددة، من ضمنها التعرف على أنواع المخاطر المحتملة في أماكن العمل، أساليب التقييم والتحكم فيها، كيفية تطبيق نظم السلامة، استخدام معدات الحماية الشخصية، إعداد خطط الطوارئ، والمسؤوليات القانونية للعاملين وأصحاب العمل. كما تساعد الدورة على فهم الحقوق الأساسية للعمال وفقًا لمعايير السلامة المعتمدة.


الدورة موجهة لكل من يعمل أو يطمح للعمل في المجالات الصناعية أو الإدارية أو الخدمية، سواء من ذوي الخبرة أو المبتدئين. لا تتطلب الدورة خلفية علمية متخصصة، مما يجعلها متاحة للجميع بسهولة ووضوح.


تُقدَّم الدورة باللغة العربية من خلال منصة Udemy، وتتميز بالوضوح وسهولة الشرح، مما يساعد المتدرب على استيعاب المعلومات بسهولة. في نهاية الدورة يحصل المتدرب على شهادة حضور إلكترونية، يمكن إضافتها إلى ملفه المهني، ودعم فرصه في الحصول على وظيفة في مجال السلامة والصحة المهنية. كما يمكنه إعادة مشاهدة الدروس في أي وقت.
وتُعتبر هذه الدورة مدخلًا مثاليًا لأي شخص يسعى لبناء مسار مهني في مجال السلامة المهنية

courses.title: Uso de Extintores y Prevención de incendios
courses.bio: Cómo accionar ante una emergencia cotidiana u en Ámbito laboral.
objectives: Incendio Teoría del triángulo
Tetaedro: tipos de combustible
Tipos de extintores portátiles
Mantenimiento básico de extintores
Cómo usar un extintor
Qué es un plan de emergencia

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa en el tema.
courses.description:
En este curso aprendera sobre el uso adecuado de extintores y de esta manera prevenir posibles incendios.
La presente formación se enmarca dentro de las exigencias legales solicitados por las legislaciones nacionales tales como la 19587 Decreto 351/79 en su capítulo 21 .
El curso consta de dos partes: Un módulo teorico y una evaluación. La carga horaria total se estima de 4 hs.
Modulo Nivel teórico:
Definición de fuego Incendio
Teoría del triángulo
Tetraedro Tipos de Combustibles.
Tipos de fuegos.
Tipos de agentes extintores.
Tipos de extintores portátiles.
Mantenimiento básico de extintores.
Cómo usar un extintor
Evaluación final:
Al finalizar estos contenidos, se realizará una evaluación final constatando lo aprendido. Será la que defina la aprobación y generación del certificado.
¿Quiénes somos?
Sates es una consultora en temas inherentes a la seguridad tales como respuesta a emergencias, prevención de Incendios y primeros auxilios.
Nuestros cursos buscan capacitar a la audiencia, tanto de profesionales en el ámbito de Seguridad e Higiene como a la comunidad.
Te invitamos a ver nuestra lista de cursos y sus respectivas certificaciones.
Lista de cursos:
Seguridad en autoelevadores
Lavado y desinfección de manos
Teoría del fuego
Seguridad en escuelas

Escribinos  y te acercamos los cursos en nuestro campus virtual.
Mail: info@satesconsultora.com

courses.title: CPR and AED
courses.bio: Learn basic life support for a casualty who is not breathing and unconscious - CPR

Chain of Survival and CPR: Chain of Survival and What is CPR
Primary Survey, CPR and Chain of Survival Quiz

requirements: None
courses.description:
This course is designed to give you the theoretical knowledge as to what to do if you find someone unconscious. This course is also an excellent First Aid Training package for people to gain invaluable knowledge at their own time and pace.
The course consists of illustrated step by step directions, flow charts, diagrams, videos and a short test yourself section fully compatible with all computers and mobile devices. You will be able to stop and start as often as you like.


It is impossible to cover all eventualities within this course, or to equip you with the knowledge and skills to appropriately diagnose and treat in unpredictable real life situations. If you suspect illness or injury, you should always seek immediate professional medical advice.
The Author has made every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information contained within the course, however this course is merely a guide and the Author does not accept any liability or responsibility for any inaccuracies or for any mistreatment or misdiagnosis of any person, however caused.
Course contents:
Unconscious and not breathing
Resuscitation - adult
Resuscitation – Child
Resuscitating a Baby
Compression only Resuscitation
Using an AED


EMT First Aid and Lifeguard Training provides this course for guidance and it is not in any way a substitute for medical advice. EMT First Aid and Lifeguard Training is not responsible or liable for any diagnosis made, or actions taken based on this course.  We strongly recommend that you attend a practical First Aid course to understand what to do in a medical emergency.
Please be aware that the information is correct at the time of filming and relates only to UK Resuscitation and First Aid guidelines. If you are outside the UK please refer to your countries guidelines and governing board.
target_audience: This course is suitable to any persons wanting to learn CPR, either for knowledge or as a refresher. This course is not suitable to persons who want a first aider qualification

courses.title: Dangerous Goods Handling
courses.bio: This course is aligned to the registered SAQA Unit Standard: Controlling hazardous/dangerous and dangerous goods.
objectives: Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of and be able to implement the specific statutory requirements relating to the handling of hazardous/dangerous goods.
Identify and classify hazardous and dangerous goods.
Handle and store hazardous/dangerous goods according to specified requirements.
Take the appropriate actions in the event of an accident or incident involving hazardous/dangerous goods.

MODULE 1: The Legal Framework of Handlin: The Occupational Health and Safety Act (No. 85 of 1993)
The Occupational Health and Safety Act (No. 85 of 1993) Part 1
The Occupational Health and Safety Act (No. 85 of 1993) Part 2
MODULE 3: Handling and Storing Hazardous: Impact protection and transfer of dangerous goods
Containers for bulk DGH and Ignition sources

requirements: Anyone with a computer or smart phone can enroll.
courses.description:
Welcome to this learning event!
The learning process involves new skills and results in the development of new behaviours. Many of us
have attended various learning programmes and/or courses over the years that resulted in us collecting
books, manuals and sometimes a head full of data but little knowledge and wisdom. For this learning
process to have meaning, you as the learner must be willing to take risks – to embrace new information,
to share your ideas in our “classrooms of life” where you can design your own learning experience.


At the end of the course the learner will be capable of handling and storing
hazardous/dangerous goods safely in accordance with national and international statutory
requirements in any freight handling environment.


This course is aligned to the registered SAQA Unit Standard: Controlling hazardous/dangerous and
dangerous goods. Please refer the Unit Standard on the next page.
Unit Standard ID: 8020
NQF Level (New): 04
Credits: 4
At the end of the course, the learner will be able to:
· Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of and be able to implement the specific statutory
requirements relating to the handling of hazardous/dangerous goods;
· Identify and classify hazardous/dangerous goods;
· Handle and store hazardous/dangerous goods according to specified requirements; and
· Take the appropriate actions in the event of an accident or incident involving hazardous/dangerous
goods.


If you are in disagreement with the outcome of the assessment also communicate this to the facilitator
who will make available to you our Appeals Procedure (A copy is available for your perusal with the
facilitator)
Remember that this learning opportunity is yours exclusively – EMBRACE it! We trust that you will learn
and grow with us. If there is any other way that we can assist you to maximise your learning’s please let
us know.
Yours in the Pursuit of Sustainable Skills Development
SKILLS
target_audience: People who work with the handling and storage of dangerous goods and material.
People who work with the transportation of dangerous goods and material.

courses.title: Temel İlk Yardım Eğitimi
courses.bio: Temel İlk Yardım Eğitiminin Teorik ve Pratik Olarak Uygulanması
objectives: Temel İlk Yardım Bilgileri
İlk Yardımda Teorik ve Uygulamalı Eğitim
Doğru Bilinen Yanlışlar
OED (Otomatik Eksternal Defibrilatör) Cihazı Tanıtımı ve Uygulanışı
requirements: Yoruma dayalı olmayarak bilgilerin basit ve kalıcı bir şekilde akılda kalması adına hem uygulamalı hem de teorik bilgilerde sizlerle buluşuyoruz.
courses.description:
Bu gün dünyada binlerce insan yanlış müdahale sonucu hayatını kaybetmekte ya da başkalarına bağımlı olarak yaşamlarını sürdürmektedir. İnsan yaşamının değerli olduğu olgusu bu durumda ortaya çıkmakta ve aslında görülen gerçek bilinçli ilk yardımın her canlı için ne kadar önemli olduğunu vurgulamaktadır.
Ülkemizde Depremler ve Afetler nedeniyle kalıcı yaralanmaların ve ölümlerin büyük bir kısmı, panik ve kargaşanın hâkim olduğu durumda, yanlış nakil sırasında gerçekleşmiş ve birçok insan yaşamını yitirmiştir. Her yıl binlerce kişi ev kazaları nedeniyle yaralanmakta ve Acil Servislere başvurmaktadır.
Çalışma hayatının en önemli sorunlarından biri olan iş kazaları gün geçtikçe birçok insanın yaşamını yitirmesine sebep olmuştur. Unutulmamalıdır ki her türlü Acil durumda bir insanın hayatını kurtarmak ve onun hayatta kalmasını sağlamak için ilk yardım öğrenmek herkesin sorumluluğudur.
Temel İlk Yardım eğitimimizde A dan Z ye her türlü konunun anlatımını bulabileceğiniz aynı zamanda Temel Yaşam Desteği ve Hayat Kurtarıcı Manevramızın uygulamalarına erişebileceğiniz bir içerik hazırladık. Daha çok sınavlara yönelik bilgilerin sizlerin akıllarında kalması adına net bir şekilde anlatış sergiledik. Son olarak OED (Otomatik Eksternal Defibrilatör) Cihazımızın tanıtımı yaparak eğitimimizi tamamladık.
İlk Yardım Eğitici Eğitmeninden sınava yönelik kapsamlı bir eğitime ne dersiniz ? Yoruma dayalı olmayarak bilgilerin basit ve kalıcı bir şekilde akılda kalması adına hem uygulamalı hem de teorik bilgilerde sizlerle buluşuyoruz.
NOT: EĞİTİM TEST SORULARI İÇİN ÖZELDEN ULAŞABİLİRSİNİZ.
target_audience: Kursumuz insan hayatına dokunmak isteyen herkese açıktır. Bilinçli ve doğru bir şekilde ilk yardım eğitimi alıp insan yaşamına dokunmanın hazzını yaşamak isteyen herkes bu ilk yardım eğitimine katılmalıdır.

İnsan hayatına değer veren duyarlı kişiler • Bilgilerini güncel tutmak isteyen sağlık öğrencileri • Küçük çocuk veya bebekleri olan anne ve babalar • Ehliyet ve güvenlik sınavlarına hazırlanan kişiler • Sertifikalı ilk yardım eğitimi alan sınavına girecek ve bilgilerini güncel tutmak isteyen kişiler • Mesleği gereği bu eğitimi almak isteyen kişiler

courses.bio: Manipulación Segura de Alimentos - Garantizando Higiene y Calidad en la Manipulación de Alimentos

Actuar frente a emergencias como intoxicaciones o fallos eléctricos

Módulo 1: Introducción a la Seguridad Al: Lección 1: ¿Por qué es crucial la manipulación segura?
Lección 2: Peligros biológicos, químicos y físicos
Lección 3: Normativas clave (OMS, FDA, Codex Alimentarius)
Lección 4: Caso real: Brotes por mala manipulación
Módulo 2: Higiene Personal y Entorno: Lección 6: Uso de uniformes y equipos de protección

Módulo 8: Casos Prácticos y Emergencias: Lección 28: Qué hacer ante una intoxicación

requirements: No necesitas conocimientos previos
solo conexión a internet y ganas de aprender
courses.description:
Curso completo de capacitación en inocuidad alimentaria para manipuladores, emprendedores y profesionales del rubro gastronómico.
La seguridad alimentaria no es una opción: es una responsabilidad.
En este curso aprenderás de manera clara, práctica y estructurada todo lo que necesitas para garantizar la correcta manipulación de los alimentos, proteger la salud de tus consumidores y cumplir con las normativas sanitarias vigentes a nivel nacional e internacional.
A lo largo de más de horas de contenido directo y sin relleno, abordaremos los fundamentos de la higiene alimentaria, los riesgos biológicos, físicos y químicos, las buenas prácticas en la cocina, el almacenamiento correcto de los alimentos y cómo evitar la contaminación cruzada. Además, aprenderás cómo actuar ante emergencias como cortes de energía o intoxicaciones, y conocerás los criterios de inspección sanitaria, certificaciones como HACCP e ISO 22000, y cómo preparar tu cocina para superar auditorías sin inconvenientes.
Incluye actividades prácticas descargables, plantillas, checklist de limpieza, simulaciones y recursos extra que podrás aplicar desde el primer día en tu lugar de trabajo.
Este curso es ideal para cocineros, ayudantes de cocina, emprendedores gastronómicos, personal de comedores escolares, hospitales, guarderías, e incluso deliverys y food trucks.
Inscríbete hoy y recibe tu certificado de participación. Invierte en tu formación, evita sanciones y garantiza alimentos seguros para todos.
target_audience: Manipuladores de alimentos
Personal de cocina en restaurantes, hoteles y comedores escolares
Emprendedores gastronómicos
Estudiantes de nutrición, gastronomía y bromatología
Toda persona interesada en garantizar la higiene y calidad de los alimentos que prepara

courses.title: Advanced First Aid: Learn CPR, choking, injuries and more
courses.bio: First aid course for those with no prior medical experience who wish to learn how to perform basic life saving treatment
objectives: Advanced first aid treatment for emergency medical situations.
requirements: There are no prerequisites required for this course.
courses.description:
This course provides knowledge on how to perform basic life saving treatment to people without a medical background. There are many scenarios that may occur in one’s life time that will require emergency medical interventions. This course provides you with the skills and knowledge to engage in life-saving interventions if there are no qualified medical professionals in the vicinity.
This course starts by covering foundational aspects of emergency medical interventions, such as, a first aid introduction and basic anatomy and pathophysiology. This foundation is vital as it builds one’s knowledge and confidence when placed in a situation where life-saving medical intervention is necessary. By understanding what malfunctioned in the body and how the learned interventions can help alleviate or fix the problem.
Once the course leaders are confident in your understanding of the foundation they will begin to explain and demonstrate all the steps of emergency Cardiac Pulmonary Resuscitation (CPR). This part of the course will ensure that you understand and can successfully perform each step.
At this point within the course, one will understand basic anatomy and physiology related to emergency interventions and will be competent in performing CPR.  Next, the instructor will review the different medical emergencies that may occur, and the treatment that an unlicensed clinician can provide.
In addition, this course will cover Traumatic Injuries and how to treat them. The instructor will discuss how to approach each patient, the correct chronological steps of interventions, and the specific interventions for different injuries.
When you are finished this course, you will no longer be worried about not knowing what to do in the event of a medical emergency.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to be able to provide life saving treatment to those around them.

courses.description:
Sztuka rozmowy z osobą z demencją – praktyczny poradnik w 30 krokach
Komunikacja z osobą cierpiącą na demencję może być wyzwaniem, ale odpowiednie podejście może znacząco poprawić jakość codziennego życia chorego i jego opiekuna. Ten kurs to praktyczny przewodnik, który dostarcza 30 sprawdzonych wskazówek pomagających w skutecznym porozumiewaniu się z osobą na każdym etapie choroby.
Co zyskasz, biorąc udział w kursie?
Nauczysz się, jak dostosować język do możliwości chorego, aby uniknąć nieporozumień.
Dowiesz się, jak unikać stresujących sytuacji i tworzyć bezpieczne, przewidywalne otoczenie.
Poznasz techniki, które pomagają w skutecznej komunikacji.
Zdobędziesz umiejętności radzenia sobie z trudnymi sytuacjami, takimi jak powtarzanie tych samych pytań, frustracja czy lęk chorego.
Otrzymasz praktyczne wskazówki dotyczące codziennej opieki, w tym utrzymywania stałej rutyny, zapewnienia higieny, aktywizacji umysłowej i fizycznej chorego.
Dodatkowe materiały
Każdy uczestnik kursu otrzyma dostęp do e-boków zawierających tematy wykładów oraz 10 ogólnych zasad, które pomogą rodzinom i opiekunom w codziennym funkcjonowaniu z osobami cierpiącymi na demencję. Znajdują się w nim wskazówki dotyczące organizacji dnia, dbania o bezpieczeństwo oraz wsparcia emocjonalnego dla chorego i opiekuna.
Dla kogo jest ten kurs?
Opiekunów osób z demencją – rodzinnych.
Członków rodzin, którzy chcą lepiej zrozumieć, jak wspierać chorego.
Wszystkich, którzy chcą zdobyć praktyczną wiedzę na temat komunikacji z osobami dotkniętymi demencją.
Zdobyta wiedza pomoże w codziennej opiece, poprawi komfort życia chorego i ułatwi budowanie relacji opartej na zrozumieniu i szacunku. Dołącz do kursu i poznaj skuteczne strategie komunikacji.
Uwaga: Każdy chory jest indywidualnością dlatego też wykłady i poradniki mają charakter edukacyjny i w żaden sposób nie zastępują konsultacji z lekarzem, terapeutą czy też specjalistycznej opieki. Zaleca się wydrukowanie e-boków, skonsultowanie zawartych w nich wskazówek z lekarzem lub terapeutą prowadzącym oraz dostosowanie tych wskazówek do indywidualnych potrzeb chorego.
target_audience: Kurs jest przeznaczony dla **domowników, opiekunów rodzinnych oraz profesjonalnych opiekunów**, którzy chcą skutecznie komunikować się z osobami cierpiącymi na demencję. Idealny dla każdego, kto pragnie lepiej zrozumieć potrzeby chorego i stworzyć wspierające, spokojne środowisko.

courses.title: Active Shooter Training for Educators
courses.bio: How to survive an active shooter event in schools
objectives: Learn the traits of an active shooter
Learn how to best protect yourself in a classroom against an active shooter
Learn how to assess your school site for active shooter safety
Learn the best methods to increase your chance of survival in an active shooter event
Learn what triggers Run, Hide, Fight
requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
This course is intended to provide safety and health training in compliance with Federal OSHA and State OSHA, FEMA, and FBI training requirements as they relate to Emergency Prep and dealing with Active Shooters. If you have questions, you may ask our instructors and they will respond to you within a short period of time as outlined by the OSHA standards.  While we will be focusing in on the Run, Hide, Fight protocol, this training goes well beyond the basics and explains how to best increase your chances of survival in an Active Shooter Event.
The training will cover all of the required elements outlined in Federal and State OSHA standards to ensure that your training meets or exceed the minimum required training. If your training has a time-requirement, the content of the training has been designed to meet that requirement.
The training is developed by our in-house, real trainers with twenty years of experience, working in the field and with actual crews and is trusted by public agencies throughout California.
There are no prerequisites required for this course. The course will walk you through all of the elements required to be successful and complete any questions or quizzes or testing that may be required.
target_audience: Educators working in public and private schools
Volunteers working in public and private schools
PTA Members working on public and private school sites
Substitute teachers working at public and private schools

objectives: ہمیں آگ سے حفاظت سیکھنے کی ضرورت کیوں ہے؟

آگ کی درجہ بندی ، اور برطانیہ اور امریکی معیار کا فرق

ان سوالات کے جوابات جو فائر سیفٹی پڑھتے ہوئے عام طور پر آپ کے ذہن میں آتے ہیں

courses.description:
فائر سیفٹی بنیادی آگاہی سیشن
یہ ایک بنیادی لیول کا کورس ہے جس کو کرنے کے بعد آپ یہ جان سکھیں گے کہ


ہمیں اسے سیکھنے کی ضرورت کیوں ہے؟
آگ سے بچنے کے لئے ، آگ اور گرم آلات کو محفوظ طریقے سے استعمال کرنے ، لوگوں اور املاک کو محفوظ بنانے کے لئے۔

کلاس ، سیکھنے کا طریقہ ، برطانوی اور امریکی درجہ بندی کا معیار۔
کیسے آگ بجھائی جاتی ہے؟

اس کے ساتھ ساتھ اس کورس کو مختلف حالات حاضرہ کے حوالے سے اپ ڈیٹ کیا جاتا ہے، مثال کے طور پر کسی بھی بڑے حادثے اور آگ کے واقعے کے بعد اس کی تحقیقات اور اسباب پر ڈسکشن کے حوالے سے ویڈیو اپ لوڈ کی جاتی ہے تاکہ طلباء کو موجودہ واقعات کے حوالے سے معلومات میسر رہیں۔


یہ کورس کرنے کے بعد آپ اس قابل ہوسکیں گے کہ فائر سیفٹی  یعنی کہ آگ سے حفاظت کے موضوع پر بنیادی معلومات حاصل کرسکیں۔
آپ ایک طالب علم ہوں یا ایک پروفیشنل، یا ایک انجینئر، یہ کورس آپ کو وہ معلومات دیگا جس کے بعد آپ اپنی کمپنی میں فائر سیفٹی میں اپنا رول ادا کر سکیں گے۔


اس کورس کو کرنے کے لئے آپ کو اردو کا پڑھنا، سمجھنا آنا چاہیئے۔


--

وہ افراد جو سیفٹی کی فیلڈ میں اپنے کام کے تجربے کی آن لائن سند حاصل کرنا چاہتے ہیں
