requirements: No previous training or special materials are required
courses.description:
Knowing the Basic Life Support (BLS) process is critical in responding to life-threatening emergencies. The newest BLS course guidelines focus on performing several tasks simultaneously with a group process that promotes efficiency and minimizes errors. Additionally, the course covers first aid.
First aid refers to the emergency or immediate care you should provide when a person is injured or ill until complete medical treatment is available. For minor conditions, first aid care may be enough. For serious problems, first aid care should be continued until more advanced care becomes available. The decision to act appropriately with first aid can mean the difference between life and death. Begin by introducing yourself to the injured or ill person. Explain that you are a first aid provider and are willing to help. The person must permit you to help them; wait to touch them until they agree to be helped. If you encounter a confused person or someone critically injured or ill, you can assume they would want you to help them. This is known as “implied consent.”
Knowing the process of First Aid is critical in responding to life-threatening emergencies. The newest First Aid course guidelines focus on doing several tasks simultaneously with a group process that promotes efficiency and minimizes errors.
This course will teach participants how to perform life support techniques, including chest compressions, basic airway management, rescue breathing, and the use of an AED for defibrillation.
The course package includes:
A First Aid instructional presentation
A BLS instructional presentation
CPR, AED, & First Aid, and BLS Provider Handbooks
Note: This course is for Basic Life Support and CPR, AED, and First Aid training.
target_audience: Health Care Professionals
Medical Students
Nursing and Allied Health Care Students
Emergency Responders
Anyone who wants to be prepared in a medical emergency

courses.title: Bloodborne Pathogens for Tattoo Artists - Safe Body Art Act
courses.bio: Learn How To Protect Yourself From Bloodborne Pathogens In The Tattoo Facility
objectives: Learn to be aware of the hazards of exposure to bloodborne pathogens
Learn the three types of bloodborne pathogens (BBP) OSHA identifies in the standard for BBP
Learn the basics of the OSHA bloodborne pathogen (BBP) standard, including your written BBP plan and what you are required to divulge to employees and clients
Learn the importance of cleanliness in the shop, including the use of proper PPE and cleaning equipment and protocols
Understand the proper disposal of needles and the utilization of sharps containers in the shop
Become adept at the use and removal of gloves via the duck dive method and the importance of proper handwashing
Learn the bloodborne pathogen hazards specific to working in a tattoo parlor and working as a tattoo artist, and how to protect yourself from them

Introduction: Read the CalOSHA Title 8, Section 5193 BBP Standard
Read the California Safe Body Art Act
Read the Federal OSHA BBP Standard

requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
In the dynamic and creative world of tattoo artistry, safety and hygiene are paramount.  Compliant with CA Body Art Act.
"Bloodborne Pathogens for Tattoo Artists" is an essential online course designed specifically for tattoo artists and professionals working in or around tattoo parlors and shops. This comprehensive course delves into the critical importance of understanding and mitigating the risks associated with exposure to bloodborne pathogens (BBP).
In this course, we cover the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) regulations concerning BBP, including identifying the three primary types highlighted in OSHA standards. Participants will learn the importance of having a properly written and reviewed plan for BBP exposure in place, including what key information needs to be made available to both employees and clients.
Additional key topics include the significance and availability of the Hepatitis B vaccine, proper disposal methods for needles and sharps utilizing sharps containers, and maintaining a pristine work environment through rigorous cleanliness practices. Our course emphasizes the correct utilization of personal protective equipment (PPE), such as gloves, safety goggles, and specialized cleaning agents, to safeguard against exposure in tattooing operations.
Participants will also learn essential techniques for thorough handwashing and the safe removal of gloves exposed to BBP, employing the recommended "duck dive" method for maximum protection.
We are a successful risk control and safety firm with decades of experience in the industry. Our course is prepared and led by our in-house industry experts utilizing practices applied in the field.
Equip yourself with the knowledge and skills necessary to uphold the highest safety and hygiene standards in the tattooing profession.
Join us in this vital course and prioritize the well-being of yourself and your clients in your artistic endeavors.
target_audience: Tattoo artists
Anyone who works in a tattoo parlor or around tattooing operations
Anyone who is a customer of a tattoo parlor or whose occupation requires they enter a tattoo parlor (eg., health inspector)

تهدف هذه الدورة إلى نقل الوعي والمعرفة للناس والتي تتعلق بالإسعافات الأولية، بهدف ضمان توفر المعلومات التي تساعد على إنقاذ الحياة بشكل كاف، وذلك من خلال دروس تعطيهم المهارات اللازمة لتكوين ثقة كبيرة تساعدهم على التدخل على الأرض عندما يتم الحاجة لهذا

courses.title: Working at Heights (Fall Arrest) Management
courses.bio: The learner will understand management of working at heights
objectives: Manage work at elevated positions/fall arrest operations with this online course.
Get to know the key laws and rules for working at heights.
Understand how to assess risks and apply the right height safety measures.
Choose and care for the correct PPE to keep your team protected.
requirements: Anyone with a computer or smart phone can enroll.
Learners should be familiar with work done at heights.
courses.description:
This programme is aligned to the registered SAQA Unit Standard: Monitor, report and make recommendations on the requirements applicable to permit to work systems in a working environment. Once completed successfully you will receive a certificate of competency for the relevant South Africa Qualifications Authority Unit Standard, accredited through the South African Institute of Occupational Safety and Health.

Unit Standard ID: 120359NQF Level: 4Credits: 4


This course will teach you all you need to know surrounding the safety legislation with working at heights, what is required in terms of equipment, training, risk assessment procedures ad fall arrest requirements. Allowing you to be fully versed in what is needed


Once completed successfully you will receive a certificate of competency for the relevant South Africa Qualifications Authority Unit Standard, accredited through the South African Institute of Occupational Safety and Health.


Throughout this course you will learn :


· Manage work at elevated positions


· Complete a risk assessment with detailed knowledge pertaining to work at heights


· Select the correct PPE and maintain and store accordingly


· Understand and apply relevant legislation


Please note that before a learner proceeds on this learning programme, he/she should meet the following requirements as per
the relevant unit standard (please refer next page):
Communication at NQF Level 3
Mathematical Literacy at NQF Level 3
Unit Standard: Provide risk based primary emergency care/ first aid in the work place: SAQA ID 120496
Unit Standard: Respond to, implement and manage emergencies according to an emergency action plan in a workplace: SAQA ID
– 120329
Unit Standard: Demonstrate knowledge pertaining to fires in working places; SAQ ID 120331
target_audience: Anyone looking to learn how to manage working at heights.
Ideal for those needing to manage workers using scaffolding and operating on tall structures.

courses.title: Seguridad Industrial Trabajos con Andamios ISO 45001:2018
courses.bio: Seguridad con Andamios
objectives: Tener las competencias necesarias para reconocer un Andamio seguro para el trabajo.
Ser capaz de transmitir información de Seguridad Industrial referente a Andamios a los trabajadores.
Identificar oportunidades de mejora en los trabajos con andamios.
Llenar permisos de trabajo referente a andamios.
requirements: Es necesario tener una formación académica para mejor comprensión de los ejemplos.
courses.description:
Aprende a identificar un Andamio Seguro para el Trabajo dentro de la organización, mediante las inspecciones oportunas de seguridad, en el curso podrás ver de forma sencilla cuales son los pasos necesarios para elaborar un permiso de trabajo de andamios, identificar posibles fallas, corroborar certificación de los andamios, características componentes, almacenamiento y más.
Aprenderás en que trabajos es necesario ocupar andamios, características y actos inseguros relacionados esto para bajar la probabilidad de accidentes y bajar los días de paralización de obra.
Establecer las condiciones mínimas de seguridad para los trabajadores que hacen trabajos con andamios, esto para tener un lugar de trabajo seguro para los trabajadores.
Muchas veces no se tiene personal capacitado, no se revisa las herramientas o no se tiene un personal competente que vea los temas específicos de seguridad Industrial, es por eso que debemos capacitarnos constantemente referente a estos temas. Todos son bienvenidos para que puedan aprender.
El curso esta elaborado a detalle para que pueda ser de fácil compresión, con ejemplos para que sea mas entendible, cabe recalcar que no se pretende suplantar a una capacitación practica, sino complementar de tal forma abordar los temas referentes a la mejora continua tanto de profesional como de la organización.
target_audience: Supervisores, Gerente, Jefes de Obra y Estudiantes.

courses.title: Green Medicine Chest: Natural Medicines for the Whole Family
courses.bio: Herbs, Homeopathic Remedies, Essential Oils and Flower Essences for Home Care and Fist Aid
objectives: Discover how to use natural medicines (herbs, essential oils, flower essences, and homeopathic remedies) for common illnesses and first aid conditions
Practice working with four levels of natural medicines
Analyze the five most common pitfalls (and ways to avoid them) in working with natural medicines
Evaluate practical home care cases
Practice choosing homeopathic remedies with “homeopathic charades”
Identify four important factors for making natural medicine recommendations
Evaluate practical home care cases
Create recommendations for home care situations by applying your new knowledge of natural medicines
Discover how to make and use flower essences
Learn how potent essential oils are and how to use them safely for adults and children.

Section 3: Herbs, Botanical Medicines: Local Herbs in Your Backyard - Additional content
What medicinal plants grow within 50 miles of wher you live?
Green Medicine Chest Summary of Remedies
Essential Oils: Essential Oils for the Whole Family
Think about a recent illness and what essential oil(s) you could have used.
Homeopathy (Homeopathic medicines): How to dose a homeopathic remedy
What homeopathic remedy would I have used?
Flower Essences: Flower Essences for the Whole Family
Common Conditions, a Review: How to make and use a castor oil pack
Think about a recent illness or accident and how you addressed that situation
Review Cases from the beginning of the course

requirements: No medical training required, just your passion and interest in caring for your family with safe, effective natural medicines
courses.description:
The Green Medicine Chest: Natural Medicines for the Whole Family supports you in developing new "reflexes," so you can address common conditions and many home first aid situations safely and effectively, with natural medicines. Dr. Judith Boice first developed this course to train survey crews for the National Forest Service. She continued to refine the information presented here over 30 years in clinical practice. She also practicesd using the Green Medicine Chest as a single mother raising twin boys.
This course will guide you in how to use four levels of plant medicines:
herbs
essential oils
homeopathic remedies
flower essences
The Green Medicine Chest: Natural Medicines for the Whole Family is for you if you
· have ever felt helpless caring for a sick child with a high fever or an earache in the middle of the night
· are frustrated with relying on doctors of any stripe for your health care and want to become your own reliable “home health advisor”
· are confused and overwhelmed by the contradictory information about supplements and how to find the highest quality, most effective natural medicines available


I have had health issues since birth and have worked very hard throughout my life to build vitality. My passion is supporting people to have the level of health they desire and speeding up their journey so it doesn’t require 20 or 30 years, like it did for me.
My passion is working with medicines from the Earth, that are aligned with your body’s native intelligence.
“Green” medicines can resolve many common illnesses or home emergencies without a trip to the ER or a doctor’s office.
Thank goodness doctors and hospitals are there for true emergencies. Many of those visits, though, may be unnecessary if you are well trained in using natural medicines.
As someone who doctors your family with natural medicines, and who aspires to be as self-sufficient as possible, you deserve to have the tools and support you require to use Green medicines, the sustainable medicines of the Earth, to safely and successfully care for your family’s health. .
Access the Green Medicine Chest®, right in your own home, with award-winning author and teacher, Dr. Judith Boice.
target_audience: Parents, especially new moms, who want to care for their family's common conditions and home first aid situations safely and effectivlely with natural medicines.
Healthcare providers who want to learn natural medicines to recommend for common homecare and first aid emergencies.

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
一般的な研修や書籍では「この言動はパワハラになります」といったNG行為ばかりが前面に出ていて、今の管理職の皆さんは萎縮と戸惑いを感じています。
「こうしてはダメ」「こういう言い方はできない」といった禁止事項ではなく「こうすればいい」という望ましい指示・命令・注意・指摘の仕方、コミュニケーションの方法を実践すれば、ハラスメント行為になりようがありません。
本コースはハラスメント、職場の人間関係他、カウンセリングを20年以上行っている心理カウンセラーが15年の研修講師の経験も含め、パワハラ、モラハラ、カスハラなど、ハラスメント行為者のパーソナリティーを心理学をベースに分析し、その対処法について網羅しています。
「この言動はハラスメントになる」といったNG行為だけでなく、望ましいマネジメント、必要な指示・命令・注意の考え方とその方法を知ることで、しっかりとしたリーダーシップが取れ、萎縮や迷いを払拭できます。
特に1000名以上の企業にお勤めの方、一般社員・管理職・経営幹部それぞれの方（お立場）にも役立つレクチャーあり。
20年以上ハラスメントや職場の人間関係、コミュニケーションに関する相談やセミナー・研修を実施してきた講師が自らの専門性と経験を元にわかりやすく網羅したコースです。
target_audience: 社内のハラスメント対策を実施する人
ハラスメント被害を回避したい人
ハラスメント問題を防止したい人
ハラスメント問題の処理、対応の仕方を学びたい人
サイコパス、攻撃的・支配的な人間の心理を理解し、対処したい人
職場の人間関係・コミュニケーションスキルを学びたい人

courses.title: OSHA Safety Training: Hazardous Materials
courses.bio: The Best Training Course On Hazardous Materials Based On OSHA Guidelines for Young and Experiences Safety Professionals
objectives: Identification of hazardous material and how one can be exposed and affected by them
Identification of hazards associated with hazardous materials, including injuries and ill-health issues that may occur
Describe methods and techniques for elimination of physical hazards of hazardous materials
Describe methods and techniques for elimination of health hazards of hazardous materials
The hierarchy of controls (Elimination, Substitution, Engineering Controls, Administrative Controls, PPEs)
HAZMAT Checklist / Worksheet including Hazard identification, evaluation and controlling
The student will be able to describe preventative/protective measures for hazardous materials found in the workplace.

Introduction: Introduction To And Types Of Hazardous Materials (HAZMAT)
Controlling of Physical Hazards / Hierarchy of Controls
Detailed Elaboration of Hierarchy of Controls & Process Safety Management (PSM)

requirements: Student must be able to understand English
Introductory knowledge of industrial health, safety required
courses.description:
Those who work in the industry and want to improve their working knowledge came across hazardous materials in their everyday work. These materials can include some chemicals, biohazards, pressurized cylinders and sometimes locations going and working into it can be graded as hazardous like (confines spaces). OSHA 10 Hours Outreach Training contains various sections and hazardous materials (HAZMAT) is one of them.
In this training in 01 hours of this video content, I have tried to summarize and elaborate the OSHA guidelines about Hazardous Materials. The complete standard is Hazardous Materials standard, 29 CFR 1910 Subpart H which is referred and information has been taken from that standard, however since the standard is large enough, here we have taken important points and notes from that.
If you want to improve your knowledge, take this course, there are also some downloadable resources which include a hazardous chemical register which you can download in this training, and an e-book which I have found very helpful during my own working in the industry.
You must do this course whether:
You are a fresh safety professional and want to increase your knowledge of Hazardous Materials
You are an experienced health and safety professional and want to learn OSHA Guidelines
You are a student and going to learn about Chemical Safety
You are an HSE Professional, Safety Officer, Safety Engineer, HAZMAT Store Incharge, this course will help you
If you have an interest in HSE and you are working in HSE/Safety as a professional then you definitely need to update yourself and OSHA guidelines are the best resources for your professional development in EHS. Hazmat studies are essential if you are working as HSE Engineers and Managers. Apart from Hazardous materials, this course will also focus on Hazardous Waste handling and Process Safety Management.
Click on Add to cart and Happy Learning!
target_audience: HSE Professionals who are interacting with hazardous materials
Lab workers working in laboratory with chemicals and bio hazards
Industrial workers who are concerned with chemicals and flammables
Students who want to learn about hazardous materials, their evaluation and control techniques
In-house trainers who want to increase their knowledge on the subject matter
Professionals who want to learn OSHA guidelines

courses.title: Essential guide to survival in the wilderness with nothing
courses.bio: Develop the only real security in an insecure world, with tried and tested survival skills and real connection to nature
objectives: Completion of this course will give you the essential information for wilderness survival. You will know the survival basics, shelter, water, fire food.
We recommend lots of outdoor practice to rely on the skills taught on the course
The course will also introduce you to some of the Nature connection skills.
The skills will increase your self-confidence and your enjoyment of Nature.

Fire: Bow drill fire woods & Tinder types
Wild food: The secret to finding food anywhere 'The Big 4'

requirements: There is no previous experience needed. You will however want access to the outdoors to try all your new found skills out in.
courses.description:
The essential guide to survival in the wilderness will teach you life saving skills for outdoor survival. Just by viewing the lecture survival priorities you stand a 50% greater chance of survival, we have set it as a free lecture so this information is available to any one.
The course will inspire you to spend time outdoors and begin to learn natures secrets. With practice your experience of being outdoors will be changed forever as you feel confident connected and part of nature.
This course is based on 19 years of teaching experience, over which time Thomas has taught thousands of students and helped to establish 10 other schools teaching these skills, The course aims to give you a feeling of one to one instruction on these basic survival subjects. Shelter, water, fire, food, and an introduction to nature awareness subjects such as Tracking and natural movement or stalking. There is a large emphasis on wild edible and medicinal plants and trees also covering some of their utilitarian uses.
The course we hope will inspire life long learning in the outdoors. The material presented is usually taught over a weekend and that is quite an intense experience. We recommend watching the lectures on a particular subject and then spending some time out doors trying out the skills or downloading it to your mobile device and watching it out in nature!
There are over three and a half hours of lectures though we recommend you take your time with each subject. You will find there is enough information to keep you going with your own experiments for years.
target_audience: These skills have been passed down from our ancestors and are suitable for all inhabitants of planet Earth. We recommend this course for students from 11 years to 99. We have taught these skills to people from 4 years old to 74.

courses.title: Inocuidad Alimentaria. Retos, responsabilidades y estrategia
courses.bio: Inocuidad de alimentos. Peligros en la industria y áreas de procesamiento. Retos, responsabilidades y estrategias.
objectives: Qué es la inocuidad alimentaria y cuales son los peligros que se pueden presentar en la industria y areas de procesamiento de alimentos.
Cuáles son los retos a los que se enfrenta la industria alimentaria para garantizar la inocuidad
Quíenes son los responsables de garantizar la inocuidad alimentaria
Cuáles son las estrategias para garantizar la inocuidad alimentaria
Cómo seleccionar un sistema de certificación

Inocuidad alimentaria: Peligros que pueden presentarse en la industria y áreas de alimentos.
Principales microorganismos patogénicos asociados a los alimentos.
Factores que influyen en la supervivencia y multiplicación de los microorganismo
Retos a los que se enfrenta la industria: Retos a los que se enfrenta la industria y el sector de alimentos en general.
Responsables de garantizar la inocuidad: Responsables de garantizar la inocuidad alimentaria.
Estrategias con las que cuenta la indust: Estrategias con las que cuenta la industria para garantizar la inocuidad.

requirements: Solo necesitarás conocimientos básicos de biología
courses.description:
Este curso está diseñado para estudiantes de pre-grado y post-grado del área de ciencia y tecnología de alimentos, y para todas aquellas personas que trabajan o quieren trabajar en industrias de alimentos, servicios de manipulación y preparación de alimentos y el sector de alimentos en general.
Consta de 5 sesiones que van desde una introducción que le permite conocer a los participantes cuál es la importancia y la necesidad de realizar este curso para garantizar la inocuidad, pasando luego a todos los conocimientos básicos e indispensables en el tema de inocuidad alimentaria, hasta llegar a los retos que enfrenta la industria de alimentos y el sector de alimentos en general para garantizar la inocuidad, quién o quienes son los responsables de garantizar la inocuidad a lo largo de la cadena alimentaria y cuáles son las estrategias con las que cuenta la industria para poder garantizarla. Así mismo, suministra información acerca de las normas y sistemas de certificación de la inocuidad y como seleccionar cuál es el más apropiado para la empresa.
Aprender a través de este curso te resultará muy fácil, ya que tiene una estructura que va desde lo básico hasta lo más complejo. Además, te proporciona información que podrás aprovechar directamente en tu lugar de trabajo.
target_audience: Estudiantes y personal que labora en industrias de alimentos o áreas de manipulación y procesamiento de alimentos.

courses.bio: تقييم المخاطر في بيئة العمل
objectives: تقييم المخاطر في بيئة العمل

تقييم مخاطر السلامة والصحة المهنية هي من اهم الخطوات المتبعة في سبيل خلق بيئة عمل امنه لتجنب الخسارة في الارواح والممتلكات , وهي ايضا من المتطلبات القانونية فى جميع قوانين العمل. • تشرح هذه الدورة أساسيات السلامة والصحة المهنية وفائدتها للمؤسسات, وكيفية عمل تقييم مخاطر إحترافى وبطريقة علمية. • الشرح باللغة العربية مع وجود بعض المصطلحات باللغة الإنجليزية مع بيان معناها اولا بأول. • الدورة عبارة عن 27 محاضرة فيديو جودة عالية مع إختبار يقيس مستوي المتدرب. • مدة المحاضرات أربع ساعات . • وسوف تتعلم في هذه الدورة الاتي: الأسباب الرئيسية لوقوع الحوادث والإصابات. • أهمية تقييم المخاطر في بيئة العمل. • كيف تخطط لتقييم المخاطر. • مصادر الخطر في بيئة العمل ( لائحة إسترشادية). • نموذج الجبن السويسري لأسباب الحادث وتعدد طبقات الحماية. • تقليل المخاطر إلي أقل ما يمكن عمليا ALARP • المراحل الخمس لتقييم المخاطر • هرم التحكم في المخاطر Hierarchy ) ( • تطبيقات عملية علي كيفية إزالة الخطر. • تطبيقات عملية علي كيفية إستبدال الخطر. • تطبيقات عملية علي كيفية التحكم الهندسي. • تطبيقات عملية علي كيفية التحكم الإداري. • شرح مدي تأثير مهمات الوقاية علي الإحتمالية أو الشده • التحسين المستمر لتقييم المخاطر. • كيف يتم تقييم المخاطر بطريقة فعالة. • تطبيق عملي لتقييم مخاطر نشاط معين. • تحليل مخاطر المهام الوظيفية ((JHA. • السجل الإحصائي لإصابات العمل. • مثال عملي علي حساب السجل الإحصائي للمؤسسة. • تصنيف المخاطر وتحديد أولويتها (نموذج باريتو). بعد إنتهائك من الدراسة ستصبح قادرا على إعداد تقييم المخاطر بشكل علمى و عملي

requirements: Willingness to Learn
courses.description:
LATEST: Course Updated Again for April 1st, 2023


In The Real World, Most People Don't Have A Fully Stocked Retreat They Can Escape To. Even If You've Planned Ahead And You Do, There's No Guarantee That You'll Leave In Time Or That You'll Be Able To Make It There.
Your First Plan Must Be To Survive In Place. And In the 1st step in Survival is to have a Bug-Out Bag
Are You Prepared? Dont Wait 'Till SHTF
More  and more people are becoming interested survival thanks in no small  part to those hyper reality television shows. So many networks are  putting out these days people are getting prepared for all sorts of  disasters, everything from an earthquake to an electromagnetic pulse  (EMP) global economic collapse hurricanes, tsunamis, typhoons, and  anything in between.
30 Day 100% Risk Free Offer!
As people are feeling more and more uncertain about  what the future will hold. So they want to be prepared, and part of  being prepared means having a "bug out bag."
A  bug out bag is a bag or container containing everything that you would  need to survive for a minimum of 48 hours in your given environment. A  bug out bag usually contains food, water, a small medical kits.
Achieve a Better and Safer Quality Of Life With More Freedom and Confidence
Any  other medication that may be required a blanket or sleeping bag some way  of making shelter such as a 50 gallon drum bag or a tarp.
Some method  of fire starting and water purification such as iodine tablets, and  anything else that you think that you might need in an emergency  situation, and contrary to what television would have you believe a bug  out bag does not need to be (although it can be).
What You'll learn in This Bug Out Bag Course:
How to select the appropriate backpack, rucksack or container for your situation and environment that fits your body type vehicle, and/or needs
How to select a water bottle, canteen and water purification system that is best for your situation environment and personal preference
How to select the appropriate food for your bug out bag so that you will have all of the nutrition and calories necessary to survive your emergency situation in as much comfort as possible
How to supplement your bug out bag supplies and things from the environment such as wild berries, frogs and rabbits
How to choose the best fire starting implement, such as matches played and steel or friction, as well as an appropriately sized cooking pot
How to select the appropriate style and type of clothing for your bug out bag to be used in case of emergency or a spare change of clothes
How to build a primitive shelter from a tarp plastic bag or dead leaves and branches, as well as how to choose a first aid kit appropriate to your medical needs
How to choose the appropriate hygiene tools for your bug out bag
.. and much, much more!
So, you've read this far! Thank you.
Tactically outfitted  as though you are Rambo going on a secret mission and they bug out bag  is not restricted to an extreme worst-case scenario. Like the zombie  apocalypse, where you are going to have to "bug out." (Hence the name)  and move to a safer location a bug out bag can be kept in the car or  truck and used during a snowstorm or blackout or windstorm orientation  get a flat tire in the middle of nowhere and have to walk for help, or  any other emergency situation.
Click the "Take This Course" button, on the top right because every hour you delay is jeopardizing not only your Safety but the Safety of Those You love!!!...Scroll up and Enroll Now!
It is not restricted to one scenario and  is definitely not one-size-fits-all. A bug out bag must be customized  for your personal needs and operational environment so that like the Boy  Scouts you are "always prepared."
SEE WHAT STUDENTS ARE SAYING...
"An excellent course on how to be prepared I am one of those persons who believe that you can never be too prepared and taking this course made me feel much more confident regarding my potential of survival. There is plenty of detailed information on things you need to have in your bug out bag and, most important, why you need to have them. It is a great course if you are interested in learning about how to be prepared for unexpected situations. It is not a simple list of items you should have in your bag, but also how to use them and how to get access to the things you need to survive." Debbi Samuels
"Great course I really enjoyed the material in this course, it was well thought out and had very good suggestions in it. I liked how the instructor went into just enough detail without getting too in depth keeping the course a manageable length. I liked how the material was laid out as well, specifying the most important parts and the why as well as what. I thought the instructor was quite knowledgeable and had good information. He spoke clearly and relative to the slide material. The lectures were quite enjoyable and the addition of text material added greatly to the course." Mrs Lisa Court
"Whether its for broadening knowledge base or self preparedness this course is perfect for you This course was fun!I found that the class is perfect for those into survivalistic expeditions; man (woman) against nature. The BOB was a great addition to outdoor activities. I loved all the how tos and tips that were covered; not because it was part of the material but because the reasoning was sound. I did not get the feel that this course was set to sell products which is always a plus. I have read other books and other courses that half way through the sales pitch is inserted and that smile of “oh yeah cool" becomes the look of utter disdain. This course is exempt from that. I gives you a basic foundation with space to adjust to fit each person and incident need. This is the type of information I welcome, one with space to change it up since every incident comes in variety of cause and effects. Its a great class for those outdoorsy people, safety folk, and for disaster preparedness across the board. Highly recommended." Mr. X
Bug-Out Bags are a type of survival kit designed to allow its owner to survive at least three days in the event of emergency, typically evacuating from a disaster zone.
As Bug-Out Bags have a finite amount of space and the weight of the bag must be worn through potentially life threatening situations, it is of critical importance that survivalists put a lot of thought into exactly what they include in their bag.
Think about these things for a minute…
What would you do if there was a terrorist attack that caused mass chaos and panic, and all the stores and places of food were closed? Do you want to be the one that is begging your neighbors, friends, or family for help? Do you want to be shipped off to a FEMA “camp?"
Could you provide for your family if severe weather like hurricanes, snowstorms or a flood caused your area to go into a panic -- buying up everything off of stores and creating shortages? What if the stores were empty for weeks… or months?
Could you protect your family if there were massive power outages or rolling blackouts or brownouts -- disrupting electricity and making it nearly impossible to get food from stores or provide heat or energy in your home?
What would happen if the road system was destroyed by floods or other natural disasters in your area? Could you survive without food or other essentials for weeks?
Could you protect and provide for your family if an earthquake hit and the area was devastated?
Forgetting to include a certain item (or enough of it), or carrying too many things can all result in a tragic outcome during an emergency. Remember that Bug-Out Bags are designed specifically to sustain a survivalist for at least seventy two hours while they reach their evacuation location, whether it is one's home, a cabin in the woods or their grandparents homestead farm.
Deciding or forgetting to include any items on this bug out bag list could mean life or death. Having supplies is only part of the solution though. If you don't have a good plan in place all of your supplies will mean nothing.
Give yourself a fresh start by enrolling in this life-changing course now.Every moment you delay, your  jeopardizing  your survival . Simple as that.
“WARNING: Your Survival Could Depend On Your Next Choice"
P.S. We're living in some of the craziest times in history and many experts agree that it's not a matter of “if" but “when" you will face an emergency that is beyond what you and your family have prepared for. There's a famous truism among instructors getting soldiers ready for war.
“When the bullets start flying, you WON'T rise to the occasion. You will perform half as well as you did during your best training."

courses.description:

Behavior-Based Safety is perhaps the newest hazards control system, it works side by side with other safety controls, in the present-day learning BBS is mandatory if you want to excel in the field of HSE and increase HSE performance in your firm.
OSHA recommends practices for safety and health programs that include the involvement of employees and managers in safety and hazard identification and assessment, and the BBS program fulfills this requirement.
This is one of the essential courses that one must attend in the process of gaining his expertise in the field of health and safety.
This is an advanced level course and to carry forward you must be having some preliminary knowledge about working of the health and safety management system in the industries and in offices. This course is beneficial for those individuals who are already working in the field of health and safety and want to implement Behavior-Based Safety in their organizations, beneficial for team leads and supervisors who are managing a team of people and counter their different behaviors on daily basis, apart from this, even if you belong to a different department other than health and safety this course will help you to increase your knowledge about the Behavior-Based Safety.

courses.title: HAZWOPER 8 Hour Annual Refresher
courses.bio: Stay OSHA-compliant with HAZWOPER refresher training in PPE, hazard ID, decontamination, and emergency response
objectives: Reinforce understanding of hazardous substance risks and how to identify chemical, physical, and biological hazards in the workplace.
Review proper use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and ensure workers can select, inspect, and use PPE appropriately for hazardous environments.
Demonstrate knowledge of emergency response procedures, including spill containment, decontamination, evacuation, and first aid protocols.
Refresh knowledge of regulatory requirements under OSHA HAZWOPER standards and the worker's role in maintaining site safety and compliance.
requirements: Completion of a HAZWOPER 40-Hour or 24-Hour initial training course, in accordance with OSHA 29 CFR 1910.120.
courses.description:
The HAZWOPER 8-Hour Annual Refresher course meets OSHA’s requirement under 29 CFR 1910.120 for workers involved in hazardous waste operations and emergency response. This training is required each year to ensure workers maintain safety awareness and stay compliant with federal regulations.
In this course, students will review key topics essential to safe work in hazardous environments. Areas covered include hazard recognition, personal protective equipment (PPE), chemical and physical hazard controls, decontamination procedures, and emergency response planning. Additional focus is given to communication protocols, the Incident Command System (ICS), evacuation procedures, and post-incident reporting.
Designed for general site workers, emergency responders, and supervisors who have already completed the initial HAZWOPER training, this refresher provides a practical and comprehensive review to reinforce safety responsibilities and update knowledge on regulatory changes.
Participants will also revisit proper PPE selection and use, learn how to respond to chemical spills and releases, and understand how to use monitoring equipment and interpret exposure data. The course helps promote a culture of safety through consistent training, awareness, and compliance.
Upon completion, students will receive a certificate verifying they have met the OSHA requirement for annual refresher training. This course ensures that workers remain prepared, informed, and ready to respond safely in hazardous waste operations.
target_audience: Hazardous waste site workers
Emergency responders dealing with chemical spills or toxic releases
Cleanup crews at contaminated sites
Industrial workers handling hazardous substances
Environmental contractors and consultants
Waste treatment or disposal workers
Utility workers near hazardous areas

courses.title: ASP / CSP Exam Preparation - Fire Prevention and Protection
courses.bio: Occupational Health and Safety
courses.description:
This comprehensive training course is designed to equip Associate Safety Professionals (ASPs) and Certified Safety Professionals (CSPs) with the essential knowledge and skills to effectively manage fire protection programs within their organizations. Participants will gain a deep understanding of fire prevention, detection, suppression, and response strategies, enabling them to identify and mitigate fire hazards, comply with relevant regulations, and ensure workplace safety.
Key Learning Objectives
Fire Safety Fundamentals:
Understand the principles of fire behavior, including the fire triangle and the four stages of fire development.
Learn about common causes of fires in industrial, commercial, and residential settings.
Fire Prevention and Protection Measures:
Explore fire prevention strategies, such as hazard identification, risk assessment, and the implementation of preventive measures.
Study fire protection systems, including sprinkler systems, fire alarms, and fire extinguishers, and their proper installation, maintenance, and testing.
Fire Detection and Response:
Learn about various fire detection technologies, including smoke detectors, heat detectors, and flame detectors.
Develop effective fire emergency response plans, including evacuation procedures, firefighting techniques, and post-fire investigations.
Fire Safety Regulations and Standards:
Gain a comprehensive understanding of relevant fire safety regulations, codes, and standards, such as NFPA, OSHA, and local building codes.
Learn how to ensure compliance with these regulations and standards.
Fire Investigation and Analysis:
Explore the process of conducting fire investigations, including evidence collection, analysis, and determination of the cause and origin of fires.
Develop skills in documenting and reporting fire investigation findings.
Target Audience
This course is ideal for:
Associate Safety Professionals (ASPs)
Certified Safety Professionals (CSPs)
Safety managers
Risk managers
Facility managers
Fire safety officers
Course Benefits
Enhanced knowledge of fire safety principles and practices
Improved ability to identify and mitigate fire hazards
Increased confidence in managing fire protection programs
Enhanced compliance with fire safety regulations
Improved emergency response capabilities
target_audience: Associate Safety Professionals (ASPs)
Certified Safety Professionals (CSPs)
Safety Managers
Risk Managers
Fire safety Officers

courses.title: 次の一歩が変わる！ ランニング革命を起こすテーピング講座
courses.bio: 足を守り、走りを進化させる！次世代キネシオテーピング術
objectives: 疲労軽減でランニング効率が向上。正しいテーピングで足の負担を軽減し、長距離を楽に走れるようになる。
怪我のリスクを大幅に低減。脚への負担を分散し、ランナーが悩みがちな膝や足首の怪我を予防できる。
フォームの改善。テーピングが自然な姿勢をサポートし、効率的なランニングフォームを実現。
自己記録更新の後押し。疲労や痛みを抑えることで、より高いパフォーマンスを発揮しやすくなる。
即効性のあるサポート。大会前や練習前にテーピングをするだけで、すぐに効果を実感できる。
ランニング後のリカバリー促進。疲労軽減だけでなく、運動後の回復を早めるためのテーピング技術も習得できる。
初心者でも安心して走れる。初心者ランナーが怪我の不安を減らし、安心してランニングを楽しめるようになる。
セルフケアスキルの向上。自分でできるケア方法を学び、トレーニング後の体調管理に役立てられる
ランニング仲間との共有。学んだテクニックをチームや友人と共有し、みんなでパフォーマンスを向上させられる。
ランナーとしての自信がアップ。身体のコンディションを最適に保つ方法を知ることで、自信を持ってランニングに取り組める。
requirements: ハサミとキネシオロジーテープ（５.０）が必要です。ご自身でご用意ください。アマゾンや楽天で購入可能です。
courses.description:
この講座では、ランナーのためのプロ仕様のキネシオテーピング技術を学びます。
膝、太もも、ふくらはぎ、ハムストリング、足底筋、肩、腕など、ランニングで酷使される部位を徹底解説し、それぞれのテーピングの貼り方を動画でわかりやすく説明。
テーピングを活用することで、ケガを予防し、痛みを軽減し、パフォーマンスを向上させることが可能になります。
自己ベストを更新したい方、快適にランニングを楽しみたい方に最適な講座です！
Transform Your Stride! The KinesioTaping Course for a Running Revolution
This course teaches professional-grade kinesio taping techniques for runners.
We provide in-depth explanations and video demonstrations on taping methods for the knees, thighs, calves, hamstrings, plantar muscles, shoulders, and arms—all essential areas for runners.
By applying these taping techniques, you can prevent injuries, reduce pain, and enhance your performance.
Perfect for those aiming to break their personal records or simply enjoy a more comfortable run!
Transforme sua corrida! Curso de Bandagem Kinesio para uma Revolução na Corrida
Este curso ensina técnicas profissionais de bandagem kinesio para corredores.
Explicamos detalhadamente e demonstramos em vídeo como aplicar a fita nos joelhos, coxas, panturrilhas, isquiotibiais, músculos plantares, ombros e braços – áreas essenciais para quem corre.
Com a aplicação correta da bandagem, você pode prevenir lesões, reduzir dores e melhorar seu desempenho.
Ideal para quem deseja bater recordes pessoais ou simplesmente correr com mais conforto!
Измени свой бег! Революционный курс кинезиотейпирования для бегунов
Этот курс обучает профессиональным техникам кинезиотейпирования для бегунов.
Мы подробно объясняем и демонстрируем на видео, как правильно накладывать тейп на колени, бедра, икры, подколенные сухожилия, подошвенные мышцы, плечи и руки – ключевые зоны для бегунов.
С правильным использованием тейпирования вы сможете предотвращать травмы, уменьшать боль и улучшать свои результаты.
Отлично подходит для тех, кто хочет установить личные рекорды или просто наслаждаться комфортным бегом!
Verändere deinen Lauf! Der revolutionäre Kinesiologietaping-Kurs für Läufer
Dieser Kurs vermittelt professionelle Kinesiologietaping-Techniken speziell für Läufer.
Wir bieten detaillierte Erklärungen und Videodemonstrationen zur Anwendung des Tapes an den Knien, Oberschenkeln, Waden, Hamstrings, Fußsohlenmuskeln, Schultern und Armen – entscheidende Bereiche für Läufer.
Durch die richtige Anwendung des Tapings kannst du Verletzungen vorbeugen, Schmerzen reduzieren und deine Leistung steigern.
Perfekt für alle, die ihre persönlichen Bestzeiten verbessern oder einfach schmerzfrei und effizient laufen möchten!
target_audience: この教材は、ランナーのパフォーマンス向上や健康維持に大きく寄与する内容であり、受講者が目標を達成するための強力なサポートとなります。

courses.title: Health, safety and security for holistic practitioners
courses.bio: Support your professional training with core learning.
objectives: Students who are studying or who are qualified holistic therapists, or other employees, will know about health and safety at work in the UK.
Students will learn about health, safety and workplace security to ensure maintaining high standards.
Students will be able to identify hazards and remedy these.
Students will know the statutory legislation to ensure health, safety and security of work areas.
Students will learn about dealing with fire, waste and other essentials in the workplace enviroment.
Students will learn about keeping safe when working alone.
requirements: There are no prerequisites for taking this course, however students may be enrolled onto, or have completed holistic treatment training courses.
courses.description:
Introduction:
There is a key component to all workplace environments, whether in a room in your own home or a separate, commercial building.  Health, safety and security is crucial to ensuring your own well-being and that of your clients and any other people who may visit your establishment.
In the UK under common law and legal Acts and Statues an obligation is upon the business owner, employees and all to ensure they take measures to maintain safety, health and security.  In this course students learn the fundamentals to practice...
Are you taking on line holistic therapy courses and feel there are some missing pieces?  Or do you live in another country and interested in working in the UK, or maybe just interested in the UK's health and safety system?  Well this course provides specific teaching of Health and safety in the UK for holistic therapists working in a clinic or salon but this is applicable to all UK employees.  Anyone outside the UK can still benefit and even share what health and safety is like in their home country - this course aims to assist you in improving the health and safety of your workplace wherever you are.  There course will be added to over time and updated whenever legislation and regulations are changed/amended.
What do you learn in this course?
Employers duties
The workplace
Risk assessment, identifying hazards, taking action
Accidents, incidents and injuries
Waste disposal
Lone working
What do you receive with this course?
Students will receive:
Life time access to the course recordings and updates
Support in the Q and A section of the platform
Supportive message available
Course Certification
Students will receive a Udemy course certificate of completion.
target_audience: This course aims to assist students in the UK to know and understand their legal and lawful obligations to maintaining health, safety and security in their workplace.
This course can support students in other areas of the world to understand best practices around health, safety and security in the workplace.

Spot hazards early and keep your team informed.

Learn what safety documents you need and how to use them.

Unit Standard ID: 120359NQF Level: 4Credits: 4


This course will cover the law and requirements of a health and safety representative, their roles and responsibilities and functions within the workplace and the health and safety committee


Once completed successfully you will receive a certificate of competency for the relevant South Africa Qualifications Authority Unit Standard, accredited through the South African Institute of Occupational Safety and Health.


Throughout this course you will discover:


The legislation
Risk assessments
How to inform staff of risks ad hazards
How to define hazards and risks

Please note that before a learner proceeds on this learning programme, he/she should meet the following requirements as per
the relevant unit standard (please refer next page):

courses.title: ISO 45001 Health & Safety: Lead Auditor - 500 Exam Questions
courses.bio: Prepare for the ISO 45001 Lead Auditor exam with 500 practice questions and detailed explanations for each answer.
courses.description:
Prepare for the ISO 45001 Health & Safety: Lead Auditor certification with this focused set of exam practice tests. This course includes 5 full-length practice exams, providing a total of 500 questions, each followed by a clear explanation. The practice questions are aligned with ISO 45001 standards and cover the requirements, processes, and auditing principles needed for effective Occupational Health and Safety (OH&S) auditing.
The questions are designed to reflect the structure and style of the actual Lead Auditor exam. Each test helps you check your understanding of ISO 45001 and build confidence before attempting certification.
This course includes various question formats, such as:
Multiple choice questions
Fill-in-the-gap questions
True/False statements
Real-world scenario-based questions
These question types simulate realistic exam content and help assess your ability to apply ISO 45001 requirements in practical situations.
Topics covered in the practice exams include:
ISO 45001 structure, clauses, and terminology
Context of the organization and stakeholder analysis
Leadership, roles, and worker participation in OH&S
Risk identification, assessment, and control measures
Legal and compliance requirements in occupational safety
OH&S objectives, performance tracking, and continuous improvement
Incident investigation and corrective actions
Internal audit process and auditor responsibilities
Audit planning, execution, and reporting techniques
Certification process and audit follow-up actions
Each question includes an explanation that reinforces the learning objective and helps you understand the rationale behind the correct answer. Explanations provide insight into ISO 45001 clause references and practical application of health and safety management system auditing.
These quizzes are useful as part of a structured exam preparation plan. You can use them to assess your knowledge, focus on weaker areas, and simulate the timing and pressure of the actual exam.
To maximize the benefit of this course, it is recommended that you also review ISO 45001 documentation, take official training, and study supplementary materials such as audit case studies and implementation guides.
Disclaimer:
This practice test is an independent resource and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by ISO or any official certification body. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
This course is designed to help Lead Auditor candidates strengthen their understanding of ISO 45001, improve auditing skills, and build the confidence needed to succeed in the certification exam. Use it as a practical tool in your study plan to measure progress and apply the standard in realistic audit scenarios.
target_audience: Professionals aiming to become certified lead auditors for occupational health and safety management systems.
Individuals responsible for implementing, managing, or improving workplace health and safety systems.
Those conducting internal audits or assessing compliance with ISO 45001 standards.
Consultants or professionals who support organizations in achieving and maintaining ISO certifications.
Learners seeking structured practice and real-world scenarios to enhance their exam readiness and auditing skills.

courses.title: OSHA Compliance - Excavation and Trenching
courses.bio: A Practical Guide to Excavation Hazards & Controls under 29 CFR 1926 Subpart P
objectives: Understand key definitions, dangers, and the legal framework governing trenching and excavation operations.
Learn how preplanning reduces risk and improves compliance.
Explore the protective systems and how to implement them correctly.
Address additional trenching risks beyond cave-ins and how to manage them.

Introduction to Trenching and Excavation: The Role of the Competent Person
Protective Systems Against Cave-Ins: Installing and Removing Protective Systems Safely

requirements: Basic knowledge of construction safety (recommended, not mandatory)
courses.description:
Working in or around trenches is among the most dangerous tasks in construction. Every year, dozens of workers are killed and many more injured due to trench collapses and other excavation-related hazards. This online, interactive course provides a comprehensive understanding of OSHA's Trenching and Excavation requirements under 29 CFR 1926 Subpart P.
Designed for those who want to work smarter and safer, this course goes beyond just regulations. It breaks down real-life hazards, teaches how to prevent cave-ins, and shows how to spot and fix common violations that lead to tragic outcomes. Participants will learn about protective systems (sloping, shielding, shoring), soil classification, access/egress rules, inspection requirements, and how to recognize signs of imminent danger in excavation work.
Whether you're in the field or in a supervisory role, this course helps you build confidence, competence, and compliance; the three pillars of excavation safety. This self-paced, mobile-friendly format makes it easy to learn anytime, anywhere. Plus, you’ll earn a certificate of completion you can proudly share. By the end of the training, you’ll be equipped to make informed safety decisions, create safer work plans, and protect lives on-site; yours and your team’s. You’ll walk away not only with knowledge, but with the practical skills to apply it immediately in your workplace.
target_audience: Construction Workers involved in trenching or excavation
Site Supervisors & Foremen
Safety Officers & HSE Coordinators
Utility Installers, Plumbers, and Road Workers
Civil Engineers and Field Inspectors
New hires working in underground construction or pipeline projects

Te invito a realizar este importantísimo curso, donde aprenderás a conocer el Cuerpo Humano, a través de una serie de clases interactivas, dinámicas, precisas y agradables.
Todos sabemos, que en los tiempos recientes podemos encontrar en la web diversa información sobre el cuerpo humano. No obstante, profesionales de la medicina con 6 años de carrera en una universidad reconocida (ULA), la hemos estudiado detalladamente para extraer de ella lo mejor, lo más significativo y así poder ofrecerla a través de este curso, de manera bien estructurada, pedagógica e ilustrativa. Espero que al finalizar el curso, puedan reconocer fácilmente las estructuras fundamentales del Cuerpo Humano con su correspondiente funcionamiento. No lo dudes, anímate y comienza ya este interesante curso. Gracias.

courses.title: pierwsza pomoc przedmedyczna
courses.bio: Naucz się jak bezpiecznie, skutecznie i szybko udzielać pierwszej pomocy
objectives: zasady udzielania pierwszej pomocy
prawa i obowiązki dotyczące pierwszej pomocy

resuscytacja i działanie podczas zakrztu: pomoc z tłumu i telefony ratunkowe
obracanie poszkodowanego i pytania ze schematu SAMPLE
Choroby cywilizacyjne i często pojawiają: Postępowanie z osobami chorymi na cukrzyce

requirements: kurs dla każdego
courses.description:
Dzięki temu kursowi odczarowane zostaną zasady pierwszej pomocy.
Nie ma się czego bać - niesienie pomocy potrzebującemu człowiekowi powinno być odruchem, a każda osoba powinna znać zasady udzielania pierwszej pomocy, by podejmowane działania były sprawne i skuteczne.
Warto też pamiętać o tym, że zgodnie z polskim prawem pracy nałożono na pracodawców obowiązek zapewnienia środków niezbędnych do udzielania pierwszej pomocy w nagłych wypadkach. Pracodawca powinien także zadbać, aby zespół był przeszkolony z zakresu pierwszej pomocy, gdyż brak takich umiejętności wśród załogi może mieć tragiczne konsekwencje.
Nieudzielenie pierwszej pomocy jest przestępstwem. Zgodnie z treścią art 162 Kodeksu Karnego: „Kto człowiekowi znajdującemu się w położeniu grożącym bezpośrednim niebezpieczeństwem utraty życia albo ciężkiego uszczerbku na zdrowiu nie udziela pomocy, mogąc jej udzielić bez narażenia siebie lub innej osoby na niebezpieczeństwo utraty życia albo ciężkiego uszczerbku na zdrowiu,
podlega karze pozbawienia wolności do lat 3.”
Nasze szkolenie obejmuje najczęstsze sytuacje. Omawiamy między innymi:
· Zasady Bezpiecznego prowadzenia akcji ratunkowej.
· Resuscytacja krążeniowo-oddechowa w tym, resuscytacja dziecka i niemowlęcia.
· Zadławienia u dziecka.
· Pierwszą pomoc przy krwotokach.
· Pierwszą pomoc przy złamaniach.
· Pierwszą pomoc przy porażeniu prądem.
· Zasady postępowania przy utracie przytomności lub napadzie drgawkowym.
target_audience: kurs dla każdego

courses.title: Essential Skills for Family Caregivers
courses.bio: Learn Essential Family Caregiving Techniques

Transporting an Older Adult: Assisting In and Out of Vehicles
Transporting an Older Adult - Check Your Knowledge

requirements: No prior knowledge required. This is a family caregiver class for all levels of experience.
courses.description:
Being a family caregiver can be deeply emotionally satisfying. At times, it can also be stressful and overwhelming. Caregiving is a big commitment and older adults may need a wide range of different types of assistance.
This CareAcademy class was created to provide family caregivers with essential tips and support to make this part of life a little easier to navigate.
By the end of this class, you will be able to:
Explain the importance of maintaining a clean environment for both yourself and your loved one.
Demonstrate proper handwashing techniques.
Assist your loved one with getting dressed.
Assist your loved one with a bath in bed.
Demonstrate proper body mechanics when assisting with moving or transporting your loved one.
Safely assist your loved one in and out of a vehicle.
Identify the different modified diets that a medical professional may recommend for your loved one.
Practice ways to make mealtime comfortable for your loved one and to help him or her stay healthy.
Practice communication strategies for loved ones with hearing impairment.
Practice strategies for managing caregiver stress.
Identify options for seeking in-home care for your loved one.
About us: CareAcademy provides home care and home health agencies with a best-in-class online education platform that delivers engaging video-based classes and real-world scenarios that walk through aspects of the caregiver experience. We now train thousands of caregivers each month, helping them deliver the best care possible. Best of all, we provide the extra set of hands Agencies need to manage caregiver training so they can acquire and retain the talent needed to grow their business.
target_audience: Family caregivers or anyone interested in learning some essential skills to take care of a loved one.

courses.title: Emergency Management: Mastering Cardiac Arrest Management
courses.bio: Understanding Cardiac Arrest | Causes of Cardiac Arrest | Recognizing Signs & Symptoms | When to Initiate CPR
objectives: Understand the Pathophysiology of Cardiac Arrest
Recognize and Diagnose Cardiac Arrest
Perform High-Quality Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR)
Enhance Teamwork and Communication in Resuscitation
requirements: Basic Medical or Healthcare Knowledge
Basic Life Support (BLS) Knowledge (Recommended but Not Mandatory)
courses.description:
This course provides a comprehensive, evidence-based approach to managing cardiac arrest, ensuring that healthcare professionals and first responders can effectively recognize, respond to, and resuscitate patients.
This Course on Emergency Management or Emergency Medicine for Cardiac Arrest is designed for everyone. It teaches how to manage emergencies related to cardiac arrest and what actions to take if you find someone in cardiac arrest. The course is designed to cover all the topics within a short period of time, which is 30 Minutes of learning.
Welcome! In this 30-minute course, you will be able to learn:
Introduction to Cardiac Arrest
Understanding Cardiac Arrest: Definition & Pathophysiology
Causes of Cardiac Arrest
Recognizing Cardiac Arrest: Signs & Symptoms
The Chain of Survival & Immediate Response
Assessing an Unresponsive Patient: When to Initiate CPR
Activating Emergency Response & Team Dynamics in Resuscitation
Compression Techniques & Ventilation Strategies
Automated External Defibrillator (AED): When & How to Use It
Common CPR Mistakes & How to Avoid Them
Shockable vs. Non-Shockable Rhythms: ECG Interpretation in Cardiac Arrest
Defibrillation & Electrical Therapy: Guidelines for Effective Shocks
Medications in Cardiac Arrest: Epinephrine, Amiodarone & More
Key Takeaways: What Every Rescuer Must Remember




This structured approach ensures a comprehensive, step-by-step learning experience for healthcare professionals, emergency responders, and students, equipping them with life-saving skills in cardiac arrest management.
target_audience: Medical, nursing, paramedic, or allied health students with an interest in emergency medicine. Clinicians, first responders, or medical personnel working in emergency rooms (ER), intensive care units (ICU), or pre-hospital settings.

courses.description:
Hazardous materials (HAZMAT) are present in nearly every industry, from construction and manufacturing to healthcare and logistics. Understanding how to safely handle, store, and manage these substances is crucial for workplace safety and regulatory compliance. This comprehensive OSHA Hazardous Materials course, based on OSHA 1910 Subpart H, equips you with the essential knowledge and practical skills to identify, assess, and control hazards associated with hazardous substances.
In this course, you will learn to recognize different types of hazardous materials and how exposure can occur in workplace settings. You’ll explore the risks associated with hazardous substances, including the potential injuries and long-term health effects they can cause. Our expert-led training will guide you through industry best practices to eliminate or reduce both physical and health hazards, ensuring a safer work environment for everyone.
Whether you are a safety professional, supervisor, emergency responder, or someone working in an environment where hazardous materials are present, this course provides valuable insights to enhance your knowledge and compliance with OSHA regulations. You’ll gain real-world applications, case studies, and practical safety measures to implement immediately in your workplace.
By the end of this course, you will have the confidence to navigate OSHA’s hazardous materials standards, improve workplace safety, and contribute to a stronger culture of compliance. Enroll today and take the next step toward mastering hazardous material safety while advancing your career in occupational health and safety!
target_audience: Safety Officers & HSE Professionals – Those responsible for OSHA compliance and workplace safety
Supervisors & Managers – Those overseeing teams handling hazardous materials

courses.title: Integrated Pest Management (IPM) Safety
courses.bio: How to Run a Safe and Compliant IPM Program
objectives: Learn the basic requirements of an Integrated Pest Management (IPM) program.
Understand the concept of using the least effective pesticide to mitigate the health and environmental impacts of pesticide usage.
Learn the requirements for posting and notification for when you perform pesticide applications, including emergency applications.
Learn what pesticides you can use, and which ones are illegal or exempt from use.
Learn what usage information to track for your records, and how to submit your annual report to the Department of Pesticide Regulations (DPR).
Learn how hazard communication relates to IPM, including safety data sheets and labels for your pesticides.
Learn what NOT to do when applying pesticides.
Understand the important of wearing PPE, including respirators.
Learn how to treat someone who is exposed to pesticides
Learn what the medical surveillance program is and how it relates to IPM
Learn how to track pests
Learn how to remove contaminated gloves without exposing yourself to hazardous pesticides.
requirements: No experience necessary. Everyone welcome.
courses.description:
"Integrated Pest Management (IPM) Safety" is an essential online course designed for those involved in managing or overseeing an IPM program in California. This course will provide you with a thorough understanding of the regulations and best practices to ensure a safe and effective pest control strategy that complies with California laws.
The course begins by defining what IPM is and explaining the Healthy Schools Act of 2000, which sets the foundational guidelines for safely managing pests in school environments. You'll learn about the necessary notifications, postings, and annual reporting required under IPM to maintain transparency, safety, and regulatory compliance.
We will dive into the types of pesticides, focusing on understanding which ones are legal to use under California regulations and which are not. You will learn about the hazards associated with pesticides, including the health risks, such as exposure to toxic chemicals, and the methods by which pesticides can enter the body. We cover the relationship between IPM and hazard communication, including proper labeling and the importance of having up-to-date safety data sheets for all pesticides in use.
The course then covers critical safety measures, including the necessity of operating eye-wash stations and knowing their locations. You will learn the importance of understanding how to treat someone exposed to pesticides and providing first aid.
Proper use and selection of personal protective equipment (PPE), including respirators, along with training and fit-testing requirements, are also thoroughly covered. This section is linked to the importance of a medical surveillance program and why regular monitoring of workers’ health is crucial. The importance of proper decontamination procedures, such as removing contaminated clothing and ensuring it does not contaminate vehicles or homes, is emphasized to protect workers’ families from secondary exposure.
We will discuss the practical aspects of running an IPM program, including effective methods for tracking pests, using engineering controls, and developing safe work practices to limit pesticide exposure. This includes going into detail about what NOT to do when applying pesticides, including behaviors that could lead to exposure to employees, student populations, the community as a whole, and the local environment.
Finally, you'll gain practical skills in safely managing pesticides, including a section on the Duck Dive method for removing contaminated gloves without exposing yourself to harmful chemicals.
By the end of this course, you will have a well-rounded understanding of the intricacies involved in running a safe and compliant IPM program, from regulatory knowledge to hands-on safety practices, ensuring the protection of all individuals involved and the environment.
We are a successful risk control and safety firm with decades of experience in the industry. Our course is prepared and led by our in-house industry experts utilizing practices applied in the field.
Enroll today and stay ahead in prioritizing health and safety in the ever-evolving landscape of occupational hazards.
target_audience: Administrators and department heads responsible for the implementation of an IPM program, particularly at school school districts.
Supervisors and workers involved in the application of pesticides.
Anyone who works around pesticides or at job sites where pesticides may be applied.

Safety and health fundamentals
دورة أساسيات السلامة والصحة المهنية


إدارة السلامة والصحة المهنية (أوشا) هي وكالة تابعة لوزارة العمل في الولايات المتحدة. قام الكونغرس بإنشاء الوكالة تحت قانون «السلامة والصحة المهنية»


السلامة المهنية وقانون الصحة يسمحان لأوشا من إصدار لوائح الصحة والسلامة في مكان العمل. هذه اللوائح تشمل قيوداً على درجة التعرض للمواد الكيميائية وقدرة الموظف في الوصول إلى المعلومات والمتطلبات اللازمة لاستخدام معدات الحماية الشخصية والمتطلبات اللازمة لإجراءات السلامة


يقصد بالصحة و السلامة المهنية تحقيق معايير تلزم كلا من العامل و صاحب العمل باتخاذ التدابير التي من شأنها التقليل من وقوع المخاطر و الإصابات في بيئة العمل ، ومن خلال هذا الكورس سيتم شرح معايير الأوشا العالمية الخاصة بتحقيق السلامة والصحة المهنية في مواقع العمل

وانواع المهمات الشخصية للحماية من المخاطر المتعددة

أي شخص مهتم بفهم وتطبيق معايير السلامة والصحة المهنية طبقاً لمعايير الأوشا
جميع الأشخاص الراغبين في الحصول على تدريب متقدم طبقاً لمعايير الأوشا

Hayvan Isırıkları ve Böcek Sokmalarında: Hayvan Isırıkları ve Böcek Sokmalarında İlk Yardım

requirements: Hiçbir Gereksinim Yoktur.
courses.description:
Hayat sürprizlerle doludur. Ne yazık ki bu sürprizler her zaman keyifli olmayabilir. Kaza, yaralanma veya ani sağlık sorunları gibi acil durumlar, her an karşımıza çıkabilir. Peki, bu gibi kritik anlarda ne yapmanız gerektiğini biliyor musunuz? Soğukkanlı kalmak ve doğru müdahaleyi yapmak, bir hayat kurtarabilir. Bu seminer, tam da bu farkındalıkla hazırlandı.
“İlk Yardım Semineri”, temel ilk yardım bilgilerini kazandırmak ve bu bilgileri günlük yaşamda güvenle kullanabilmenizi sağlamak amacıyla oluşturulmuştur. Deneyimli uzman eğitmenimiz eşliğinde, ilk yardımın temel prensiplerini öğrenerek hem kendinize hem de çevrenizdekilere güvenli ve etkili şekilde yardımcı olmayı öğreneceksiniz.
Eğitim kapsamında; bilinç kontrolü nasıl yapılır, solunum yolu tıkanmalarında nasıl müdahale edilir, kanama, yanık, kırık gibi travmalarda neler yapılmalı gibi birçok temel konuya değinilecektir. Ayrıca, temel yaşam desteği (CPR), boğulma durumları, kalp krizi, epilepsi ve benzeri acil sağlık olaylarında uygulanacak ilk adımlar detaylı şekilde aktarılacaktır.
Bu seminer yalnızca bilgi vermekle kalmaz; aynı zamanda sizi daha hazırlıklı, daha farkında ve daha cesur bir birey haline getirir. İlk yardım sadece sağlık çalışanlarının değil, herkesin bilmesi gereken bir yaşam becerisidir. Çünkü bir acil durum anında, sağlık ekipleri olay yerine ulaşana kadar geçen her saniye çok kıymetlidir — ve o saniyeler sizin bilginizle hayat kurtarabilir.
Kendinizi, sevdiklerinizi ve toplumu korumak için bu seminere katılın. Bilgiyle donanın, bilinçle hareket edin ve her an herkesin bir kahraman olabileceğini siz de görün.
Şimdi kaydolun, hayat kurtaran yolculuğunuza hemen başlayın!

requirements: No se necesita experiencia ni conocimiento previo
courses.description:
Descripción del curso
Mal de Ojo: La guía definitiva
¡Míralo ya mismo desde la comodidad de tu hogar o desde donde desees!
¿Te sientes vulnerable ante las energías negativas que te rodean?  ¿Quieres aprender a protegerte y a sanarte del Mal de Ojo y de otros ataques psíquicos?  ¿Quieres descubrir los secretos de la autodefensa psíquica y la seguridad espiritual?
Si tu respuesta es sí, entonces este curso es para ti.
Mal de Ojo: La guía definitiva es un curso online pregrabado que te enseñará todo lo que necesitas saber sobre el Mal de Ojo, un fenómeno que afecta a millones de personas en el mundo y que puede causar graves daños a tu salud, tu bienestar y tu prosperidad.
Que aprenderás
En este curso aprenderás:
Qué es el Mal de Ojo y cómo reconocer sus síntomas y efectos.
Qué es un ataque psíquico y cómo diferenciarlo de otras causas de malestar.
De dónde puede provenir el Mal de Ojo y quiénes pueden ser los responsables.
Cómo evitar lanzar el Mal de Ojo a nadie más, ya sea intencional o accidentalmente.
Cómo protegerte y defenderte del Mal de Ojo y de otros ataques psíquicos usando diversos métodos y herramientas, como la cinta roja, la mano de Hamsa, el libro de salmos, los mantras y más.
Cómo curarte y liberarte del Mal de Ojo y de otros ataques psíquicos usando técnicas de limpieza, sanación y restauración de tu energía y tu poder personal.
Cómo prevenir y combatir el Mal de Ojo y los ataques psíquicos en tu familia, tus amigos y tus mascotas.
Qué dice la Torá al respecto del Mal de Ojo y cómo aplicar sus enseñanzas a tu vida.
Este curso está diseñado para cualquier persona que quiera mejorar su vida y su felicidad, liberándose de las influencias negativas que le impiden alcanzar sus sueños y metas.
No importa si crees o no en el Mal de Ojo, este curso te dará las herramientas y los conocimientos que necesitas para estar seguro y tranquilo en un mundo lleno de desafíos y amenazas.
El curso tiene una duración de aproximadamente 90 minutos y está dividido en 7 secciones o capítulos
. Podrás acceder al curso desde cualquier dispositivo y a tu propio ritmo, y tendrás acceso de por vida al contenido y a las actualizaciones.
Además de las clases, el curso incluye material complementarios con plegarias para protegerte del Mal de Ojo.
Estos son los temas de cada capítulo:
Capítulo 1: Introducción al Mal de Ojo.
Capítulo 2: El Mal de Ojo en la Torá.
Capítulo 3: El Mal de Ojo en los Profetas, la Mishná, el Talmud, el Zohar y otras fuentes.
Capítulo 4: ¿Cómo funciona el Mal de Ojo?
Capítulo 5: Amuletos y otras formas de protección y curación.
Capítulo 6: Conceptos generales sobre el Mal de Ojo.
Capítulo 7: Preguntas y respuestas sobre el Mal de Ojo.
No dejes pasar esta oportunidad única de aprender todo sobre el Mal de Ojo y cómo protegerte y curarte de él. Inscríbete hoy mismo y empieza a disfrutar de una vida más plena, segura y feliz.
Mal de Ojo: La guía definitiva. El curso que cambiará tu vida.
Certificación
Se otorga certificado de finalización del curso.
target_audience: Cualquiera que esté siendo atacado por fuerzas psíquicas o por el Mal de Ojo.
Cualquiera que quiera protegerse a sí mismo y a sus seres queridos del Mal de Ojo.

Quien quiera servir al Creador correctamente y Conocer sus Misterios
Para todo público curioso por entender este fénomeno

Understand the meaning of electrons , wires , combustion , electricity , fuel,
courses.description:
Dear students '


This course has been developed as the need of safety has become more needed. Safety has become an important issue and part of business as well.
There is a great deal of demand on safety courses at work place. Safety according to the new legislations in many countries have become a part of the workers rights. Organizations that ignore safety of workers  could and will be prosecuted by law.
This course is  a guide that starts by defining safety ,  health , risk , hazard and accident from a safety point of view and describing the relation between these terms and states the differences as well.
This course has been designed to be understood easily as the language and the contents have been simplified.
The hazards mentioned in this course are the most common ones. There are many other hazards which will be discussed in more detailed course.
It is important to understand the concept of risk in order to implement the suitable preventive measures.
It is also important to know what steps to take before an accident happens and what steps to take in case of some accidents.
The course consists of videos animated in order to make it easier to understand. the regular , typical , board and teacher image is fading as
animated videos can give better effect. The animated videos have less words but with more meaningful gest.
